description.hltext_display: China's coal imports up 9.1% in Nov
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - China's coal imports climbed 9.1% year on year to 13.88 million metric tons in November this year, according to the statistics released by the General Administration of Customs today.
The country's coal exports were 1.28 million metric tons last month. Net coal imports in China stood at 12.6 million metric tons in the month.
In November, China imported 8,273 metric tons of coke, 22% less than in the same month of last year.
In the first ten months of this year, China's saw its net coal imports surge 51% year on year to 118 million metric tons, according to figures released by the National Development and Reform Commission earlier.
In 2009, China imported 127 million metric tons of coal and exported 22.4 million metric tons of coal, with net coal imports exceeding 100 million metric tons.

description.hltext_display: Sideshow: LiLo probed in rehab assault
description.author: Tirdad Derakhshani
description.content:
Disney sweetie turned Hollywood ingenue Lindsay Lohan in legal trouble? Say it ain't so! LiLo, 24, who has only two weeks left in her court-ordered sojourn at the Betty Ford Center in Rancho Mirage, Calif., may find herself behind bars. Police say the Parent Trap star is being investigated for allegedly assaulting an unnamed female employee at the rehab.
TMZ says the Dec. 12 incident was sparked when the employee chided LiLo for returning late after spending the night at a local bar. The employee says she was attacked when she insisted LiLo take a drug and alcohol test. No arrests have been made.
TMZ says LiLo and her roommates recently were reprimanded for having a drunken party ("the booze was flowing") at one of the rehab's satellite houses.
LiLo was sent to rehab by Los Angeles Superior Court Judge Elden S. Fox, who has vowed to send the Mean Girls star to jail if she messes up while on probation.Tinseltown's biggest moneymakers Leonardo DiCaprio had a titanic year, landing atop Forbes' annual list of highest-grossing actors. Leo starred in Shutter Island and Inception, which made a combined $1.billion at the box office. (Leo will make more than $50 mil for Inception alone.) Second place belongs to Mia Wasikowska, who played the title role in Alice in Wonderland. It drew $billion. Her second flick this year, The Kids Are All Right, made $29 mil. Alice costar Johnny Depp, whose other 2010 piece was The Tourist, is at No. 3.
Love conquers all . . . "They swore I was the guy who would never" marry, Bret Michaels tells People.
They were wrong: The rocker proposed to his gf of 16 years, Kristi Gibson, Monday night on his VHreality show. "It feels awesome," says Bret. 'Dallas' without J.R.!? Here's a deep existential question: Would Dallas be Dallas if it didn't star Larry Hagman as that much beloved spiritual guru J.R. Ewing? That grotesque scenario seemed close to becoming a reality last week, when news spread that TNT had failed to sign Hagman for its Dallas redux.
Don't believe the rumors, says TV Guide mag. Hagman sure doesn't: "I hadn't heard about that, huh!" the 79-year-old TV legend tells TV Guide when told of the rumors.
Negotiations, TV Guide says, are still on.
He's a dreamy vamp, all right Have you spent sleepless nights gnashing your teeth and wondering whether Kristen Stewart is getting her money's worth when it comes to romance?
Fear not, says Christina Ricci, who costars with Kristen's bf, Robert Pattinson, in Bel Ami. RoPa, Ricci tells Rachael Ray, is a "good kisser." Lest you get the wrong impression, Ricci quickly adds, "he's a lovely human being also. . . . He's just, like, a silly, fun guy. We laughed a lot. He makes fun of himself all the time. He's adorable." Finally, I can sleep soundly.
Get ready for Queen Kate . . . Queen Elizabeth II, 84, has the ultimate wedding gift for her grandson Prince William: her throne. So claims Christopher Anderson's megahyped bodice-ripper William and Kate: A Royal Love Story, published Tuesday.
Anderson cites Anonymous Insider, who says the queen is considering giving up the British throne to her son Prince Charles, 62, after William marries his sweetie, Kate Middleton. William would then be next in line. (He and his wife would be King William V and Queen Catherine.)
The Biz in ShowBiz Julie Taymor's $65 mil Broadway musical, Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark, suffered its fourth accident Monday when an actor identified by Anonymous Sources as Christopher Tierney was taken to a hospital after falling 30 feet during an aerial stunt. No comments from producers.
Paul Reubens, 58, is back on top! And back on TV. HBO on Tuesday announced that next month it will film performances of Reubens' hit stage show, The Pee-wee Herman Show on Broadway, for a special to air later in the year. The show, which features John Moody and Drew Powell, is based in part on Reubens' fab children's show, Pee-wee's Playhouse.
Al Pacino's Shylock won't be forced to leave Broadway on Jan. 9 as previously announced. Variety says the Public Theater's staging of the Bard's The Merchant of Venice has done so well it will return for an extended run Feb. to 20. Variety also says Billy Zane and Jack Huston have signed to costar with Sienna Miller and Danny Huston in Bernard Rose's next pic, Two Jacks. The pic, about a Hollywood tycoon and his family, is loosely (I'll say!) adapted from Leo Tolstoy's story "Two Hussars." Larry King: I have loved three people Larry King may be done with his CNN chat show, but he's definitely not done with love.
The famously bespectacled, suspender-sporting lothario, who has been married eight times (take that, Henry VIII!), told Erica Hill Tuesday on CBS's The Early Show that he loved only three of his wives. "I think in my life I have loved three people. Married all three," Larry said. "The other marriages, I wasn't in love. It was the thing to do, but in love - really in love - three people: current one and two others." The current one would be Shawn Southwick, whom Larry wed in '97, and whom he was set to divorce this summer. They've since reconciled. "There was a big difference in our ages that might have had something to do with it," says Larry, who at 77 is 26 years older. "But I'm not an expert on marriage." Today's other legal briefs The Savannah Morning News says Food Network celeb chef Paula Deen's housekeeper, one Mary Alice White, has been sentenced to 18 months in prison for stealing jewelry from Deen's Georgia h

description.hltext_display: Jak dál v� boji proti korupci a organizovanému zločinu
description.content:
Jak dál v boji proti korupci a organizovanému zločinu
KSČM dlouhodobě upozorňuje na celkově neutěšenou, dokonce přímo kritickou situaci, která obecně souvisí s vnitřní bezpečností a veřejným pořádkem na území České republiky.
V tomto smyslu jsme se při různých příležitostech vyjadřovali i ke všem výročním zprávám, které uvádějí specializované policejní útvary. Jaká je ale skutečnost a jak celou situaci KSČM vnímá?
Na úrovni vlády, policie, státního zastupitelství, justice, vězeňství a dalších institucí byla v minulosti přijata řada opatření, dokumentů, právních norem, a nutno říci, že ne špatných. Převážná většina z nich je nasměrována správně a odráží se v nich skutečnosti, které přináší poznatkový fond k této problematice. Zmíním jenom ty základní, jako je Koncepce boje proti organizovanému zločinu, některé vývody byly obsaženy i ve zprávách státního zastupitelství a za zmínku stojí i velmi vypovídající závěrečná zpráva Institutu pro kriminologii a sociální prevenci pod názvem Obrana proti ohrožení společnosti závažnými formami trestné činnosti.
Bohužel práce s těmito dokumenty, jejich využívání a samotná realizace přijatých opatření je značně nepřehledná, neefektivní, podle mne i nedůsledná a jeví se to tak, že není vůle ani faktická schopnost vládních struktur docílit potřebného zintenzivnění boje s organizovaným zločinem a korupcí v ČR. Za jednu z nejnebezpečnějších oblastí, vedle korupce, propojení politiky a byznysu a naprosto neprůhledného prostředí lobbingu, lze považovat snahu organizovaného zločinu pronikat do policie a justice, a tak narušovat nebo zcela paralyzovat jejich fungování.
V programovém prohlášení vlády a ve vystoupeních ministra vnitra Radka Johna je často zmiňováno, že v boji s organizovaným zločinem a korupcí se chce v příštích letech zaměřit na lepší práci specializovaných policejních útvarů, ochranu lidí, kteří s touto formou kriminality bojují, a na efektivnější zabavování výnosů z trestné činnosti. Nakolik jsou tyto cíle naplňovány, ukazují současné problémy právě na ministerstvu vnitra, obrany, životního prostředí, ale i v samotné policii, která se potýká s vysokou fluktuací a tím odvislé kvality a profesionality pracovníků na příslušných úsecích. Nechci zacházet do podrobností v hodnocení stavu policie, justice nebo státního zastupitelství, protože to zaznělo mnohokrát. Spíše bych chtěl naznačit, jaká vidím do budoucnosti východiska z tohoto stavu.
Podle mého názoru je třeba lepší koordinace jednotlivých útvarů, které se zabývají danou problematikou. To znamená Útvaru pro odhalování organizovaného zločinu (ÚOOZ), Národní protidrogové centrály (NPC) a Útvaru pro odhalování korupce a finanční kriminality (ÚOKFK). V této souvislosti vytvořit Národní kriminální úřad s celorepublikovou působností - tady velmi doporučuji, aby se tento záměr realizoval. Nelze jít pouze cestou nárůstu počtu různých koordinačních center, různých zastřešujících »nadútvarů« a manažerských funkcí, ale naopak cestou zabezpečení počtu výkonných policistů, kteří takzvaně budou »konat«. Dále zabránit úniku informací směrem k organizovanému zločinu. Přijmout komplexní a systémová opatření na základě důkladného vyhodnocení stávající praxe.
V rámci takzvaných nelegislativních nástrojů boje s organizovaným zločinem jsem toho názoru, že je třeba zkonkretizovat systém prevence a dalšího vzdělávání zástupců orgánů ČR, zabývajících se prosazováním práva. I tato potřeba je v řadě dokumentů uváděna, ale opět, bohužel, pouze v obecné rovině.
To je podle mého názoru jen několik námětů pro další činnost v efektivnosti boje proti organizovanému zločinu a korupci.
Zdeněk MARŠÍČEK, stínový ministr vnitra (KSČM)
22. 12. 2010Zdeněk MARŠÍČEK

description.hltext_display: وفاق سطيف الجزائري يتوج بكأس اتحاد شمال إفريقيا بعد فوزه على النصر الليبي
description.content:
توج نادي وفاق سطيف الجزائري لكرة القدم بكأس اتحاد شمال إفريقيا للفرق الحائزة على الكؤوس بعد فوزه مساء أمس الثلاثاء /21 ديسمبر الحالي/، على نادي النصر الليبي بملعب 8 مايو في مدينة سطيف، (300 كلم شرق الجزائر العاصمة)، بثلاثة أهداف مقابل هدفين.
وكان الوفاق فاز في مباراة الذهاب التي جرت في 9 ديسمبر في ليبيا بثلاثة أهداف مقابل هدف واحد.
وسجل أهداف الوفاق في الشوط الأول من المباراة اللاعب حسين مترف في الدقيقة الخامسة ومصطفى جاليط في الدقيقة 35 والدقيقة 37، بينما سجل نادي النصر هدفيه في الشوط الثاني عن طريق اللاعب أنيس زغب في الدقيقة 65 وإيغو إيفوسا النيجيري في الدقيقة 76.
وسيطر الوفاق على مجريات الشوط الأول بامتياز، لكنه تراخى في الشوط الثاني ما مكن الفريق الضيف من تسجيل هدفين، إلا أن العودة القوية للوفاق كادت أن تكلل بأهداف أخرى من خلال عدة فرص خطيرة.
يذكر أن مباراة الكأس أدارها الحكم المغربي هشام تازي بمساعدة مواطنيه عبد العزيز مهراجي وعبد الله فيلالي.

description.hltext_display: Beiqi Foton Motor leads commercial vehicle sales in Nov: CAAM
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - Beiqi Foton Motor Co Ltd<600166>, a Beijing-based vehicle maker, sold a total of 55,800 commercial vehicles in China last month, ranking first in the top ten automaker list released by the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers.
Dongfeng Automobile Co Ltd<600006> ranked second with sales of 52,800 commercial vehicles, followed by Faw Car Co Ltd<000800> with 33,400 units, Shenyang Jinbei Automotive Co Ltd<600609> with 20,500 units, Sinotruk Group with 19,500 units, Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Co Ltd<600418> with 18,600 units, Jiangling Motors Corp Ltd<000550><200550> with 16,700 units, Chongqing Changan Automobile Co Ltd<000625><200625> with 13,900 units, Shandong KAMA Automobile Manufacturing Co Ltd with 9,900 units and Great Wall Motor Co Ltd<2333> with 9,300 units.
In November, the combined commercial vehicle sales volume of the ten automakers amounted to 250,400 units, accounting for 70% of the total commercial vehicle sales in the country.
Shanghai General Motors Co Ltd, a joint venture between General Motors and Shanghai Automotive Industry Corp or SAIC, topped Chinese passenger vehicle sales with sales of 102,400 units last month.

description.hltext_display: 英机场回击批评拒绝军队协助 民众改乘火车(图)
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
不少民众放弃飞机改乘火车出行。
伦敦希斯罗机场为受困乘客搭起帐篷。
中新网12月22日电 据英国媒体报道，暴雪严寒天气导致欧洲众多机场部分瘫痪，数千名乘客被困，欧洲各大机场正在努力帮助被困乘客脱困。英国机场管理部门反驳欧委会的批评，称他们已经在尽力而为。希斯罗机场还拒绝了英国政府派军队协助的要求。
再三袭击的暴雪、低于零摄氏度的冰冻天气迫使欧洲各大机场取消大量航班，数千名准备回家过圣诞节的乘客出行受阻。
对欧洲委员会批评各大机场状况混乱，机场运营商辩护称，他们一直在尽力处理危机。
伦敦希斯罗机场是受这次冰雪天气影响最大的机场，该机场官员断然拒绝了英国政府派军队协助乘客脱困的请求。
机场运营商英国机场管理局表示，两个跑道现在均已开放，但警告称，“航空公司正在大幅减少航班，他们让一些飞机与机组人员原地待命。”
英国航空公司称，听从英国机场管理局的指示，在格林尼治标准时间23日早上6点前，只运行希斯罗机场预定三分之一的航班。
其他欧洲国家的机场也遭遇瘫痪状态。
在爱尔兰，都柏林机场管理局称，至少在格林尼治标准时间22日早上8点前，将关闭机场。
在德国，由于恶劣天气，法兰克福机场在21日取消了近1300个航班中的550个航班。
法国航空公司称，21日，约5000名乘客被迫在巴黎戴高乐机场过夜，其中4000人准备飞往英国。
在瑞典，斯堪的纳维亚航空公司称，飞往伦敦希斯罗机场的航班问题最多。
很多乘客准备放弃飞机改乘火车出行。但是欧洲之星高速列车公司却建议乘客退票留在家中过节。
不过铁路专家沃尔玛尔(Christian Wolmar)说，真正的问题不是出在恶劣天气上，而是出在拙劣的管理上。
他说：“欧洲之星应该为自身感到羞愧。”“加开列车是可行的，但是他们无法将列车或乘务人员部署到位。这是解释不通的。”

description.hltext_display: Holly jolly zombies
description.author: Sharon Eberson
description.content:
Right up there with discovering Kreepy Karen Christmas ornaments for a festive take on Night of the Living Dead are a litter of zombie Hello Kitty holiday decorations.
A noted zombie-phile explained why books such as Michael Spradlin's It's Beginning to Feel a Lot Like Zombies: A Book of Zombie Christmas Carols and such sites as online lessons drawing zombie Santas crop up this time of year. "Hey, who says the holidays aren't scary?" says Bucks County author Jonathan Maberry, whose latest book is Wanted Undead or Alive: Vampire Hunters and Other Kick-Ass Enemies of Evil (Citadel Press), with coauthor Janice Gable Bashman. "Let's face it, A Christmas Carol is a pretty scary ghost story. The Grinch is a monster story. A lot of holiday stories are frightening. "A lot of holiday stories build on fears of all kinds to make the characters [and the readers and viewers] feel weak, lost, vulnerable, helpless . . . and yet hopeful. So, instead of a gun-toting hero rushing in to save the day, we have Santa, or a reformed Grinch, or a collection of well-intentioned ghosts. . . . "Some of the best horror stories aren't about monsters, and zombie stories are definitely not about zombies. Not the good ones, anyway. They're about people who . . . escape and/or overcome a great and terrible event. They're survivor stories. Some even have happy endings. Of a sort." Maberry's first zombie novel, Patient Zero, was all about preventing a zombie apocalypse. "My most recent, Rot & Ruin, deals with teenagers growing up in a post-zombie apocalyptic world and discovering that they may have a real future. One worth living. "So . . . hope? Yeah, good holiday gift." A hot property in Hollywood is Max Brooks' World War Z, a zombie apocalypse survival story with political overtones that has Brad Pitt and director Marc Foster (The Kite Runner, Quantum of Solace) attached. The Internet Movie Data Base lists the film as in "preproduction." If you can't wait to see who survives and how, there's an all-star audiobook of the novel, with voices including Alan Alda, Mark Hamill, John Turturro, Carl and Rob Reiner, and the author, son of Mel Brooks, as the narrator.
The current success of the cable-TV gorefest The Walking Dead - released appropriately on Halloween, but still going strong for AMC - has put the genre in the fast lane recently.
Writing for The New York Times earlier this month, author Chuck Klosterman (Eating the Dinosaur and Sex, Drugs, and Cocoa Puffs) noted that the undead are a growth industry "with no glass ceiling." "Roughly 5.3 million people watched the first episode of The Walking Dead on AMC, a stunning 83 percent more than the 2.9 million who watched the Season 4 premiere of Mad Men. This means," Klosterman wrote, "there are at least 2.4 million cable-ready Americans who might prefer watching Christina Hendricks if she were an animated corpse." A longtime zombie Pittsburgher John Russo, 71, was at the start of the zombie craze - and he's still there. He will soon direct a movie of his own screenplay, adapted from his Escape of the Living Dead comic-books series (Avatar Press).
In a recent phone conversation, he said that, combining Christmas and frights, as he did in the low-budget Santa Claws, was more about deciding on a theme that, at the time, hadn't been overdone. Plus, he liked the pun.
He explains that the formula that he and George Romero created back in the 1960s, combining several monster myths to make zombies flesh-eaters, catapulted them into the realm of werewolves and vampires for folks who love a good scare.
Spradlin didn't just jump on the bandwagon when he wrote his book of zombie carols. His fascination had been brewing over time and resulted in lyrics such as these from It's Beginning to Feel a Lot Like Zombies (accompanied by creepy ink illustrations by Jeff Weigel):
Zombie the Snowman was a jolly, happy ghoul,
With a corncob pipe and some boy's nose
And two eyes he got at school. ...
You get the idea. "Zombie movies freaked me out as a kid, and when I started writing, I knew I was going to write about them someday," the author said by e-mail. "And as zombies became more and more popular, I realized that no one had ever done a Mad Magazine-style parody of anything zombie. One of the things I loved about [Mad creators] is how they would take a trend, a movie, or a popular television show and make fun of it - Star Trek would become a Broadway musical. Starsky & Hutch would become an epic poem. . . . That was my idea as I approached both It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Zombies and Every Zombie Eats Somebody Sometime." Living Dead Dolls To Spradlin, the holidays seemed like a happy time ripe for carnivorous carols.
No wonder, then, that among the line of Living Dead Dolls is Nohell (get it?), "in a festive red-and-white holiday dress with real bells on her boots. . . . This 10-inch-tall Living Dead Doll comes in a specially colored coffin," on sale at tfaw.com for $26.99.
If the idea of a coffin under the Christmas tree isn't your thing, but zombies are, another literary excursion into zombieland is Undead (Kensington), Russo's novelizations of Night of the Living Dead and Return of the Living D

event_or_fact.property: combining Christmas and frights, as he did in the low-budget Santa Claws, was more about deciding on a theme that, at the time, hadn't been overdone.

the formula that he and George Romero created back in the 1960s, combining several monster myths to make zombies flesh-eaters, catapulted them into the realm of werewolves and vampires for folks who love a good scare.
Hey, who says the holidays aren't scary?

description.hltext_display: Slovenské Kocúrkovo
description.content:
Problém bratislavského Parku kultúry a oddychu je, možno povedať, okrajový, lokálny a nepodstatný.
Už možno päťdesiat kilometrov od Bratislavy sa obyvatelia miest a obcí len čudujú, prečo sa mu venuje v tlači aj v televízii toľko pozornosti. Faktom však je, že táto budova, ktorá pre Bratislavčanov dlhé desaťročia symbolizovala jeden z najväčších a najvýznamnejších stánkov nielen zábavy, ale aj kultúry, má zrátané dni. Postaral sa o to predovšetkým bývalý bratislavský primátor za Kresťanskodemokratické hnutie Andrej Ďurkovský, ktorý má hlavný podiel na tom, že pozemky pod bratislavským PKO, ktoré patrili mestu, odpredal developerom a tým aj budúcim investorom J&T Real Estate, a. s., ktorí plánujú premeniť aj túto časť nábrežia Dunaja na raj tých, ktorí nemajú hlboko do vrecka. Aké úplatky a iné finančné benefity boli v pozadí, môžeme len hádať. Momentálne sa to dokázať nedá (ako v mnohých iných podobných prípadoch). Keďže Andreja Ďurkovského už fakticky nahradil vo funkcii novozvolený primátor Milan Ftáčnik, urobil tento pán ešte tesne pred odchodom narýchlo krok, ktorým vypovedal zmluvy všetkým firmám, ktoré v priestoroch PKO sídlili. Nie nadarmo demonštranti dožadujúci sa zachovať budovu PKO žiadali Ďurkovského odsúdenie. Asi vedia svoje.
Typické pre slovenskú scénu však je, čo všetko sa okolo budovy PKO v posledných dňoch odohralo. Okrem občianskych aktivistov sem totiž prichádzali protestovať novozvolený primátor Milan Ftáčnik, ba dokonca aj minister vnútra Daniel Lipšic a samotná premiérka slovenskej vlády Iveta Radičová. Možno teda povedať, že ide o najvyšších predstaviteľov nielen Bratislavy, ale aj slovenskej vlády. Chýba vari už len slovenský prezident Ivan Gašparovič. Naivným pozorovateľom by sa mohlo zdať, že proti takémuto zastúpeniu v radoch obrancov budovy musí byť na Slovensku každý krátky. Opak je však pravdou. Víťazia investori, ktorí celé okolie PKO už stihli oplotiť a stráži ho súkromná bezpečnostná služba, ktorá v jednom prípade do areálu nepustila ani nového primátora Ftáčnika. Pod rúškom noci demontovali vzácne sklené vitráže národného umelca Janka Alexyho a previezli ich do depozitu, a začali s demontážou veľkého obrazu vo vstupnej hale. Noviny pred niekoľkými dňami priniesli správu o tom, že Iveta Radičová vybavila pre budovu PKO milosť. V skutočnosti však ide len o »podmienečný trest« – do konca februára sa vraj s objektom nebude hýbať, ale súčasne sa v ňom už nebudú uskutočňovať žiadne kultúrne podujatia. Po tomto termíne prisľúbil investor zmeniť plány svojho budúceho veľdiela, ktoré tam mieni vybudovať s tým, že doň zakomponuje a tým zachová aspoň vstupnú halu pôvodnej budovy. Bývalá tzv. estrádna hala, ktorá hostila mnohých slávnych domácich aj zahraničných umelcov, sa však musí, žiaľ, premeniť na ruiny, rovnako ako protiľahlá malá sála s unikátnym tanečným parketom, ktorá ešte nedávno slúžila okrem iného aj na priame televízne prenosy tanečných súťaží. Pochopiteľne, že v tejto súvislosti už zrušili viacero podujatí, ktoré sa mali v PKO uskutočniť do konca tohto roka. Pred časom investor vyslovil možnosť spätného odpredaja pozemku pod budovou PKO mestu, samozrejme, za oveľa vyššiu sumu. Na to však mestský rozpočet nemá. teda vyzerá tak, že najvyšší predstavitelia mesta, ba aj štátu ťahajú za kratší koniec a zatiaľ sú iba figúrkami vo vopred prehranej hre. Prečo? Lebo peniaze majú v tejto krajine absolútnu moc. To všetko ostatné je zanedbateľná, ba až smiešna nostalgia nehodiaca sa do plánov budovateľov svetlejších zajtrajškov pre elitu národa. Že jedna zo súkromných slovenských televízii nazvala PKO socialistickou stavbou (zrejme aby ukázala, že takéto niečo už u nás nemá miesto), ani netreba komentovať.
Ľubomír TREFNÝ, Bratislava
Čtenářské hodnocení
Doporučili byste tento článek ostatním?
(1 - určitě ne | 4 - nevím | 7 - určitě ano)
1234567
Hodnocení: pro článek zatím nikdo nehlasoval

description.hltext_display: Chinese firms raise a record of US$ 4 bln in US IPO this year
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - Ossen Innovation Co, a Shanghai-based rare earth-coated steel materials maker, has raised US$22.5 million from an initial public offering on the Nasdaq Stock Market, thus bringing the total number of Chinese firms that list in the U.S. to a record 41 with a combined fundraising size of US$4 billion, sources reported.
According to the report, the number exceeded the 37 completed in 2007. Chinese companies took up almost 25% of the IPOs completed in the U.S. this year.
Three of the ten best performing IPOs on the New York exchanges have come from China this year, and those Chinese firms gained more than twice as much as other newly U.S. listed companies on the first day of trading.
On Dec.8, Youku.com Inc, a Chinese online video provider debuted on the New York Stock Exchange and saw its share skyrocket 168.59% in its first day of trading. In the same day, Dangdang.com, China's leading online bookseller surged 86.93% on its debut in New York.
Though Chinese firms' U.S. IPOs have climbed an average of 16% in first-day trading this year, compared to a 6.8% gain from all other U.S. offerings, Youku, Dangdang and IsoftStone Holdings Ltd, a Beijing-based information technology service provider, are the only ones to advance more than 5% since the Chinese government said on Nov. 17 that it may impose measures to curb inflation.

description.hltext_display: 'True Grit,' the Coens' wry biblical western
description.author: Steven Rea
description.content:
Are the Coen Brothers going biblical on us?
Although True Grit, Joel and Ethan Coen's artfully wrought and agreeably wry western, is based on Charles Portis' 1968 novel, the film's quotations from the Old Testament, literal and metaphorical, are everywhere. Some of these references, too, hail from Portis' book, but after tackling the trials of Job in A Serious Man, it appears that the moviemaking siblings have taken an especially keen interest in the venerable Christian and Hebrew texts.
True Grit begins, in fact, with an epigram out of Proverbs 28:1: "The wicked flee when none pursueth. . . . " The rest of that line the Coens leave offscreen, but it's worth noting because it speaks to the nature of True Grit's impossibly plucky heroine: " . . . but the righteous are as bold as a lion." Mattie Ross, all of 14, and played with sublime certitude by newcomer Hailee Steinfeld, is that bold lioness. As True Grit begins, the pigtailed girl has arrived in Fort Smith, Ark., to collect the body of her dead father, and to hire a bounty hunter to go after the killer. She fully intends to join in the chase, and the early scenes of Mattie haggling with a stable owner, questioning the bill for her father's coffin, and dogging the one-eyed gunslinger who she's got in mind for the job, reveal just how composed and confident this pip-squeak is. Her acuity, her gumption, her way with words . . . if 2010 has been a great year for women's roles, and it has, then it's essential to put Mattie Ross up there near the top of the list. (And she's a good three years younger than Ree Dolly, the brave backwoods teenager of Winter's Bone.)
As folks who remember John Wayne in the original True Grit well know, the name of the U.S. marshal that Mattie offers to employ is Rooster Cogburn. Jeff Bridges - whose previous collaboration with the Coens produced cinema's iconic stoner, Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski - plays Cogburn with eyepatch and baggy long johns, and with a gruff, grizzled conviction. Cogburn, it can be argued, is a whole lot like Bad Blake - the booze-soaked country balladeer of Crazy Heart that won Bridges his long-overdue best-actor Oscar this year. Neither Blake nor Cogburn is at the top of his game, both keep a bottle (or two) close by out of necessity, and redemption comes in the form of a younger woman (Maggie Gyllenhaal in Crazy Heart) who expects better of the man than he's currently able to show.
(As for the Duke and his 1969 True Grit: The Coens have said that they did not revisit the earlier film - which won Wayne an Oscar - and that they wrote and conceived their version based wholly on Portis' prose. In a similar spirit, this reviewer will not cite the previous iteration again.)
And so, off Mattie and Rooster go - though that's not exactly how things start. Not to spoil one of the finer of many fine scenes the Coens have orchestrated, the girl and the marshal's ride-up doesn't officially begin until she's done some demanding equestrian work of her own, on a pony called Blackie.
And Mattie and Rooster aren't alone then, either: There's another lawman out to catch Tom Chaney, a rather comically florid Texas Ranger by the name of LaBoeuf (pronounced here as le beef). Matt Damon, sporting spurs and Stetson, imbues deadpan dignity to a part that's got considerable foolishness about it. His campside recollections of Ranger lore are particularly rich.
Josh Brolin shows up as Chaney, the coon in Mattie and Rooster's "coon hunt," and Brolin plays the murderer as a kind of dim but dangerous thug. But even he speaks with a kind of antique eloquence - the language in True Grit is one of the film's greatest pleasures. Even the crustiest of cowpokes talks in artful, winding sentences, with a formality and manner that do as much to take us back to the 1870s as do the period clothes and props.
True Grit is probably the least ironic picture in the Coen Brothers' worthy canon, but that doesn't mean it's devoid of their signature oddities, that it doesn't take a few dark, strange turns. The unexpected sight of a bear riding horseback, or the fidgety manner in which a defense attorney takes to the witness stand, or the offhand but lamentably truthful way in which blacks and American Indians are treated by the whites of the post-Civil War West - there are Coen-esque moments here, to be sure.
For some reason, True Grit got me thinking about The Lord of the Rings, too: another tale where an unlikely and seemingly ill-equipped protagonist rides off on an epic quest, aided, here and there, by curious men on horseback, and forced to face daunting challenges in the form of evildoers, serpents, and dark holes in the ground.
Of course, there are plenty of snakes and caves in the Bible, too.
True Grit ***1/2 (Out of four stars) Directed by Joel and Ethan Coen. With Jeff Bridges, Josh Brolin, Matt Damon, and Hailee Steinfeld. Distributed by Paramount Pictures.
Running time: 1 hour, 50 mins.
Parent's guide: PG-13 (violence, cussin', adult themes)
Playing at: area theaters Contact movie critic Steven Rea at 215-854-5629 or srea@phillynews.com. Read his blog, "On Movies Online," at http://www.philly.com/philly/blogs/onmovies/

description.hltext_display: الصين – مقدونيا فرصة أخيرة لاختيار أعضاء الفريق الصيني المشارك في نهائيات كأس آسيا
description.content:
يصل منتخب الصين يوم 31 ديسمبر الحالي إلى قطر للمشاركة في نهائيات كاس آسيا التي ستقام خلال الفترة من 7 إلى 29 يناير 2011. وفي ظل الاستعدادات الأخيرة ستنطلق مباراة إحماء بين المنتخب الصيني والمنتخب المقدوني الساعة 19:30 يوم 22 ديسمبر الحالي في قوانغتشو .في حين تعتبر هذه الفرصة هي الأخيرة لإختيار مدرب المنتخب الصيني قاو هونغ بو التشكيل الأخير للفريق الذي سيشارك في نهائيات كأس افريقيا.
معرض الصور
ملاحظات
1. حافظوا على القوانين، والانظمة المعنية التى وضعتها جمهورية الصين الشعبية، وحافظوا على الاخلاق على الانترنت، وتحملوا كافة المسؤوليات القانونية الناتجة عن تصرفاتكم بصورة مباشرة وغير مباشرة.
2. لصحيفة الشعب اليومية اونلاين كافة الحقوق فى ادارة الاسماء المستعارة والرسائل المتروكة.
3. لصحيفة الشعب اليومية اونلاين الحق فى نقل واقتباس الكلمات التى تدلون بها على لوحة الرسائل المتروكة لصحيفة الشعب اليومية اونلاين داخل موقعها الالكترونى.
4. تفضلوا بابلاغ arabic@peopledaily.com.cn آراءكم فى اعمالنا الادارية اذا لزم الامر

description.hltext_display: Autor nástroje „na vodu“: Nápad většinou přijde mimo pracovní dobu
description.content:
Ján Turzo přijel na interaktivní výstavu Play s hudebním nástrojem s tajemným názvem. Jeho Čeřička zx se navíc i netradičně ovládá. K rozehrání je totiž třeba vodní hladina. "Byl bych rád, aby mé věci lákaly k používání. Například když vyrobím hudební nástroj, chtěl bych, aby se nástroj používal k hraní," tvrdí slovenský designér a umělecký kovář, jemuž pomáhal Matej Gyárfáš.
Čeřička Jána Turza foto: Archiv Play
1. Proč je podle vás pro lidi důležité používat fantazii a tvořivost?
Bez fantazie bychom dělali jen to, co se dá udělat.
2. Co ve vašem životě znamená tvoření a tvořivost?
Pro mě je důležitá samotná tvorba. To, co mě ale uspokojuje nejvíce, je, když má i výsledek - smysl.
3. Co vás ve vaší tvorbě nejvíce inspiruje, co bývá prvotním impulsem?
Potřeba něco změnit, ať už zvyk anebo věc.
4. Kdy a kde se vám většinou nejlépe tvoří a proč?
Rád tvořím v klidu a tichu, ale nápad většinou přijde mimo pracovnu a pracovní dobu.
5. Jakou technikou nejčastěji pracujete a které materiály vás nejvíce oslovují a proč?
Nejraději pracuji s pojmy - materiál k realizaci se už najde.
6. Co byste rád předal lidem prostřednictvím vašich děl?
Byl bych rád, aby mé věci lákaly k používání. Například když vyrobím hudební nástroj, chtěl bych, aby se nástroj používal k hraní.
7. K čemu dokáže výtvarné umění obecně inspirovat?
To je možná problém současného umění. Dnes je umění spíše inspirováno, než aby samo inspirovalo.
8. Co považujete za svůj dosavadní nejhezčí umělecký zážitek?
Těžko říci - jestli jsem ho zažil při koncertě, v přírodě, anebo v galerii - nevím.
9. Na co jiného než na "výtvarno" byste rád měl talent?
Na fotbal.
10. V jaké době (mimo té naší) byste chtěl žít, kdybyste si mohl vybrat – a proč?
Jsem spokojený s dobou, ve které žiji, ale občas mě štvou lidé.

description.hltext_display: Roger Deakins is the very famous cinematographer you've probably never heard of
description.content:
EVEN IF YOU don't know the name Roger Deakins, if you're a movie lover, you know his work.
Gary Oldman as Sid Vicious singing "My Way" in "Sid and Nancy." Steve Buscemi going into the wood-chipper in "Fargo." Tim Robbins crawling out of a pipe in "The Shawshank Redemption." All images courtesy of Deakins, the greatest cinematographer never to have won an Oscar (he's been nominated several times, twice in '08), although that may change next year after academy voters get a gander at "True Grit." (He also shot "Company Men," opening next month.)
Deakins is no Oscar hound, and he likes traveling under the radar. He once thought of raising his profile by becoming a director, until he tried it. "I tried to put a project together for a few months before I realized the error of my ways," he said, laughing. "I love being on set, but all the other stuff . . . that's not for me." Deakins likes anonymity, personally and artistically. The less you notice his technique, he says, the better he's done his job.
He came by that attitude 30 years ago in England, where he trained as a director of photography making documentaries, trying to capture reality with as few intrusive gestures as possible.
That work that got him hired by Alex Cox to shoot "Sid and Nancy," shot on the fly in some very fluid locations, including East L.A., where his training came in handy. "Alex decided he wanted to shoot this scene on railroad tracks, and they were live trains going by, so we just did it. We didn't have permits or anything. There was a bicycle cop watching us the whole time. It's one of those things - if you look like you've got permission, you can get away with a lot." Deakins went on to shoot Bob Rafelson's "Mountains of the Moon," then "Stormy Monday," then had a big Hollywood job with "Air America." It wasn't until 1990, though, that he met Joel and Ethan Coen, forming a creative partnership that has been a boon to all three, and to moviegoers everywhere. "We hit it off straight away on 'Barton Fink,' it just clicked. We have a similar take on life, I guess, a similar sense of humor," he said. Deakins, at home with the rough-and-tumble, make-it-up-as-you-go style of Cox and the documentaries, found the Coens worked in a completely different way, a way that he also liked. "I've never worked with anyone who does such preparation, so much storyboarding. Everything is really precise, and worked out in advance. That doesn't mean they always shoot it the way they planned it, but they have a plan going in," he said. Deakins developed the black-and-white look of "The Man Who Wasn't There," and spent three months working feverishly in darkrooms to figure out the right process to create the unique old-timey look of "O Brother, Where Art Thou?," arrived at just days before production. "They wanted the look of an old postcard. It wasn't easy. We had to figure out how to take the greens out of the image, but it finally worked." The Coens' strict sense of visual control is often strongly felt by viewers, and has led some critics to say the brothers' exacting style can overwhelm their characters. If that was ever true, they seem to have grown out of it.
Deakins shot the Coens' Oscar-winner, "No Country For Old Men," a movie that found the brothers working with a lot more flexibility - ditto "True Grit." "I think they're more relaxed. It's wrong to say they're more open to change, because they've always willing to change stuff, but they are much more comfortable working things out on location." Deakins was nominated for his "No Country" work, and also that same year for "The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford," a lowlight masterpiece.
He'll probably be nominated again, but Deakins, ever humble, isn't fretting over it.
I told Deakins that in a couple of decades of interviewing filmmakers, this is the first time anyone had offered me a cinematographer. Was he a little insulted, on behalf of cinematographers everywhere? "Not in the least," he said, laughing. "That's the business."

description.hltext_display: 陕西国土局长买卖9车续：副县长局长1人1辆越野
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
在网上论坛及博客中广泛转载的陕西省咸阳市彬县国土资源局局长冯启胜一年时间买卖9辆车，超标购置两辆豪华越野车的曝光帖子，经本报记者在彬县实地调查采访，内容基本属实，目前两辆豪华越野车一辆为局长冯启胜的座驾，另一辆被该县主管副县长乘用。
昨日上午，记者从车辆管理部门查询到，车牌号为陕DD0199的车辆归属彬县国土资源局，车牌号为陕DD0166的车辆归属彬县土地统征储备中心，两辆车均为“美国道奇公羊”酷威越野车，出厂日期都为2009年1月，上户挂牌日期2009年3月。记者从网上查询后获知，“美国道奇公羊”酷威越野车最低配置的市场销售价格为299900元。
采访期间，有彬县群众告诉记者，彬县国土局购买的两辆“美国道奇公羊”越野车彬县人都知道，在小县城内车头上银色的羊头标志非常醒目，购买的道奇公羊越野车一辆为冯局长的座驾，另一辆听说被冯局长送给县上主管国土资源的景副县长乘用，平时在县里冯局长坐的就是“公羊”，但去省市开会开的却是“现代”越野车。
记者在彬县国土资源局仍未见到冯局长，手机也无人接听。彬县国土资源局党组成员、分管办公室的李主任在局办公室向记者解释说冯局长又到市上开会去了，目前无法取得联系。据李主任证实，两辆“美国道奇公羊”越野车的确是局里去年年初购买的，彬县土地统征储备中心是彬县国土资源局下属的行政事业单位，车牌号为陕DD0199的道奇公羊越野车是冯局长乘用的，车牌号为陕DD0166的道奇公羊越野车被景副县长用着，购买车辆是经过县财政及相关部门审批了的。记者当即向对方索要审批的相关文件，李主任改口说自己没有见过，审批文件应该在县财政局。记者随后从彬县政府办工作人员处证实，县上主管国土资源的景副县长乘用的的确是辆道奇公羊越野车。
针对网帖所曝冯局长将原任局长购置的现代、陆霸两辆价值60多万的越野车予以更换，原配车辆局里人至今不知去向的说法，李主任表示现代越野车上缴给了县财政局，至于另外的那辆陆霸越野车的去向他本人还不了解。
据记者了解，彬县国土资源局局长冯启胜2009年1月才从礼泉县调任彬县国土资源局任职的，两辆“美国道奇公羊”酷威越野车的上户挂牌日期为2009年3月，基本上就是一到任就换的车，与网帖所曝内容相符。
彬县国土资源局局长冯启胜购置配备的“美国道奇公羊”酷威越野车是否超标，是否违规违纪？购车有无相关部门的审核批准？购车所用资金的来源？下属事业单位的车辆如何成了县领导的座驾？本报将继续予以跟踪报道。（吴琛 程风 来源：西部网)

description.hltext_display: China's SGCC acquires US$1-bln power assets in Brazil
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - State Grid Corp of China, the country's leading power grid operator, said that it has completed the takeover of seven Brazilian power transmission companies with investments totaling nearly US$1 billion, sources reported.
The power assets acquired included 16 500-kilovolt power lines totaling 3,173 kilometers and transformation stations in Brazil's southeastern coast. State Grid will provide power services mainly to the densely populated southeastern region, which includes major cities like Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo, the company said in a statement published on the website of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission.
In addition, the Chinese company secured 30-year operating rights, which could be extended by another 20 years with the approval of the Brazilian power authorities.
The acquisition, which marks the company's second major overseas foray after the purchase of Philippine transmission assets in 2009, is expected to bring in US$110 million in earnings each year and make the Chinese firm the fifth-largest power operator in the South American country.
In January last year, the Chinese power giant led a consortium to pay US$3.95 billion for a 25-year license to run part of the Philippine power transmission networks.

description.hltext_display: Dear Abby: Husband's sex life appears to involve only his remote
description.author: Dear Abby
description.content:
DEAR ABBY: I'm pretty sure my husband is addicted to adult porn movies. We have several pornographic DVDs in the house and I can tell when they have been moved. He denies he's watching them, so confronting him again will only make him more angry and possibly push him "underground." Our sex life, which used to be grand, has become almost nonexistent.
Do you have any suggestions?
- Suspicious in Florida
DEAR SUSPICIOUS: Yes. Rather than accuse your husband of being a porn addict, start a discussion about what has happened to your sex life. He may need to be examined by his doctor to determine if his problem could be physical. If that isn't the case, then marriage counseling with a licensed therapist might help.
However, it doesn't seem likely to me that a man who views only "several" adult DVDs is a porn addict.
Porn addicts are usually glued to their computers at every available spare moment.
DEAR ABBY: I am married for the second time and have two lovely stepsons in their early 20s.
Recently they told me that my sister "Gloria" (age 55) had asked them to remove their shirts during a holiday event several years ago. They were teenagers at the time. She told them she wanted to "at least look since she couldn't touch." After that, they no longer wanted to participate in family gatherings.
For the record, Gloria has a history of poor impulse control. She takes medication for it and also to control her temper.
She would verbally bait the older boy, who would then antagonize her until I stopped him from playing a battle of wits with an unarmed person.
My relationship with my sister has always been contentious. She used to beat me when I was a child. She was also controlling and tried to order everyone around.
Should I stop having family gatherings? Should I ask other relatives to police her? How do I confront her about the many things she has done?
Or should I stop associating with her?
- Vexed in Virginia
DEAR VEXED: Because your sister seems unable to distinguish between what is and isn't appropriate behavior, have a talk with her and tell her what you expect from her before the next family gathering.
I see little to be gained from a "confrontation" about what she did in the past.
If Gloria manages not to start trouble at the party, continue to include her.
If not, no law says you must. If you don't, be prepared for questions about her absence and answer them directly and honestly.
DEAR ABBY: I am a woman who is wondering what to say when someone calls me "sir" on the phone. I have heard my voice recorded, and I don't think I sound like a man. Still, it happens. It makes me feel angry and mortified. What do I say? - "Ma'am" in Cinnaminson, N.J. DEAR "MA'AM": You should say, "For your information, I'm a woman." That should clear up any confusion.
Dear Abby is written by Abigail Van Buren, also known as Jeanne Phillips, and was founded by her mother, Pauline Phillips. Write Dear Abby at www.DearAbby.com or Box 69440, Los Angeles, CA 90069.
To receive a collection of Abby's most memorable - and most frequently requested - poems and essays, send a business-sized, self-addressed envelope, plus check or money order for $6 (U.S. funds) to: Dear Abby - Keepers Booklet, Box 447, Mount Morris, IL 61054-0447. (Postage is included in the price.)

description.hltext_display: Recovery eludes smaller firms
description.content:
Max Mason, CEO of the Tauranga Chamber of Commerce. Photo / Mark Mckeown.
Just when local small- and medium-sized businesses thought they were getting over the economic hump, they are finding it harder than ever.
The latest Tauranga Chamber of Commerce survey shows business confidence is at its lowest level for more than a decade.
Only 23 per cent of respondents in Tauranga believe business conditions will improve over the next six months - and, in the wider area from Northland to Taupo, excluding Auckland, the response fell to 15 per cent (Auckland recorded 18 per cent).
Chamber chief executive Max Mason said many businesses had expected to deal with a downturn over a period of about one year but this had now turned into two years.
Many businesses had battened down the hatches and gone into survival mode - "expect more casualties in the New Year", Mr Mason said.
Robbie Neilson, a director with RHB Chartered Accountants, said: "If you had mentioned that three weeks ago, I would have disagreed. Businesses really thought there was an upswing but it's all changed in the past two to three weeks.
"We are getting more calls for help and some are going over the line into receivership or liquidation.
"Business is weird. Our insolvency division went reasonably quiet over September/October/November and our advisory team was flat out.
"People were starting to do transactions and maybe the economic situation had turned."
Now, the firm's insolvency staff are busy and will be working over the Christmas/New Year period.
They will be dealing with at least three major receiverships.
"Some people were hanging on until the end of the recession cycle but it hasn't got any better and they can't hang on any longer," Mr Neilson said.
"They use up all their capital, they don't get the sales and contracts they need to carry on and the banks will only support them for so long.
"I think we've got a two-tier economy at present. Some businesses are still spending money while some are simply surviving.
"I think the economic times will be difficult for the next two years."
Mr Mason said small- and medium-sized businesses were experiencing strong consumer reluctance to spend or make decisions.
He said respondents in the survey commented that in spite of the strong profit performance from the banking sector, it was hard to get bank support in difficult times.
The respondents expected to benefit from the 85,000 credit cards the Rugby World Cup (RWC) will bring to New Zealand next year but they also accepted that much of the infrastructure spend had already been made, and post-RWC there was little on the horizon domestically, Mr Mason said.
The ANZ December Quarterly Economic Forecast said the near-term outlook weakened compared with September and the recovery continued to be a hard slog.
"We expect strong growth to emerge in the second half of 2011, but off such a low base that times still won't feel great, with the level of total output not returning to its late-2007 peak until the end of next year," the ANZ economists said.
"No wonder people are grumpy. The five-year picture remains one of only modest growth, which reflects a sustained period of debt reduction and structural changes across the economy."

description.hltext_display: Rozdáváme hudební dárky. Hrajte o Jacksona, U2 i Whitney Houstonovou
description.content:
Nebuďte smutní, pokud vám nemá kdo nadělit vánoční dárek. Portál iDNES.cz dočasně přebírá roli Ježíška a pod stromeček vám přibalí hudební balíček, o nějž můžete hrát v soutěži.
Diskografie Whitney Houstonové foto: Lukáš Procházka, MF DNES
Nejprve jedna klasika z domova: album Vivaldianno. Pokud stále ještě nemáte platinovou desku dvojice Michal Dvořák a Jaroslav Svěcený, máme pro vás jeden kousek. Nahrávka, která spojuje Čtvero ročních dob Antonia Vivaldiho s rockovou hudbou a exotickými nástroji, se pyšní multiplatinovým prodejem. Oblibě se těšila i koncertní podoba projektu.
Pokud máte rádi irskou skupinu U2, nabízíme vám její tričko a desku No Line on the Horizon, kterou podporuje výpravným turné s otáčivým pódiem.
Šňůra, která začala v červnu 2009 ve Španělsku potrvá do července příštího roku, se stala nejvýdělečnějším koncertním projektem roku 2009 i 2010. Záznam z koncertu z kalifornské Pasadeny vyšel na DVD.
"Denní náklady turné se pohybují kolem 750 tisíc dolarů - zahrnují převoz a stavbu toho kosmického monstra (myšleno pódia, pozn. red.), jež existuje hned ve třech exemplářích, platy stovek lidí, kteří se kolem něj motají, jejich cestování, ubytování a tak dále a tak dále. Jenže pořád se to vyplácí: U2 loni odehráli čtyřiačtyřicet koncertů a všechny (!) byly úplně vyprodané. A nakonec, když to všechno utichlo, U2 spočítali hrubý příjem na nějakých tři sta milionů dolarů," píše v reportáži Adéla Dražanová z MF DNES.
Je-li vám milejší Madonna, i pro vás je tu triko a její zatím poslední nahrávka Hard Candy, s níž se představila loni v srpnu v Česku.
A královna popu, jak se dvaapadesátileté zpěvačce přezdívá, se pyšní pěkným rekordem. Sticky & Sweet turné bylo nejúspěšnějším turné sólového umělce v historii a vidělo ho více než 3,5 milionu fanoušků ve 32 zemích světa.
Rockovějšímu srdci udělá jistě radost album 21st Century Breakdown kapely Green Day. Američané ho letos představili tuzemským fanouškům v areálu pražského Výstaviště.
"Green Day dozajista překročili stín rockové show, své desky a turné k American Idiot ale nikoli. Jejich koncert měl silné momenty, stejně jako jejich písničky mají silné melodie. A přestože díky nim a vtahující komunikaci publikum odcházelo nadšené, kapela v Praze stále balancovala nad propastí vkusu mezi tím, zda chtějí být muzikanti, nebo se skoro ve čtyřiceti raději hodlají spolehnout na pubertální vtipy a v závěru už vážně otravné věčné hecování davu výkřikem hej - hou," napsal v recenzi Honza Vedral z MF DNES.
Pokud vás ale kritika neodradila a vy si koncert chcete připomenout alespoň podle písní z desky, máte šanci ji vyhrát a k tomu se navléknout do trička Green Day, které k vám k němu přidáme.
Pokud se vám stále těžko smiřuje s úmrtím Michaela Jacksona, nabízíme vám malou záplatu v podobě knihy Moonwalk s novým úvodem od Berryho Gordyho a doslovem od jednoho z původních editorů. Navíc dostanete i bílý svršek s logem filmu This Is It. Ten zachycuje zpěváka při přípravách comebackového koncertu, který už se ale bohužel nikdy nekonal.
Pro Whitney Houstonovou sice nebyl letošní rok ten z nejzdařilejších. Kvůli zdravotním potížím musela zrušit několik vystoupení, fanoušci ji ovšem podezřívali z opakovaného pádu do drogových hlubin. "Neuměla by pobavit ani mrtvou krysu," hodnotil zpěvaččino jarní vystoupení v australském sále Brisbane Entertainment Center jeden z přítomných v komentáři pod amatérsky natočeným videem, umístěným na YouTube.
Nicméně album I Look To You (2009) kritiku nadchla. Pokud ho chcete mít doma, zkuste své štěstí. Jako bonus přibalíme zpěvaččinu diskografii. A to už se přece opravdu vyplatí...

description.hltext_display: Odsudek pana Přemysla Sobotky
description.content:
Ve středu po ránu nám ranní blok zpravodajství na stanici ČT24 předhodil místopředsedu Senátu za ODS MUDr. Přemysla Sobotku.
Měl se vyjádřit ke kauze Drobil. Vyjádřil se. Podle jeho názoru konat musí nyní policie, ale zároveň velmi razantně odsoudil natáčení rozhovorů s nadřízenými ředitele Michálkem.
Ano, chápu, v tom je zakopaný pes. Kdyby si Michálek rozhovory nenatáčel, šlo by o »tvrzení proti tvrzení«, pokud by vůbec měl odvahu s odkrytím korupce na ministerstvu životního prostředí Michálek přijít. Pro Přemysla Sobotku, tedy pro ODS, je ono natáčení špatná zpráva. Nenechá se bagatelizovat. Nechá se ovšem, občanští demokraté stále mají své koně v justici, nepřipustit s odvoláním na české právo ono natáčení jako důkaz. Vše bude zdánlivě v pořádku a koalice se může dále v klidu podílet na moci.
Chápu i osobní zainteresovanost Přemysla Sobotky na nevyšetření kauzy anebo její odsunutí do zapomnění. Chce totiž kandidovat na prezidenta, a pokud by se korupčně-úplatkářská aféra potvrdila i soudně, pak by ho ne všichni poslanci koalice zřejmě volili, protože by se nechtěli namočit s korupční ODS. Mohlo by se to třeba Věcem veřejným stát osudným, a jak známo, VV jsou neřízenou střelou, manažersky řízeným subjektem, kde vnitřní demokracie neexistuje, vše podléhá zákonu peněz, a to by se straně Radka Johna v situaci posledního roku koaliční vlády líbit moc nemohlo. U ODS to totiž není jediná kauza. Má jich tolik, že se člověk nestačí divit, proč ji lidé ještě volí. Ani VV nejsou proti různým formám korupce však imunní. Proto musí problémy druhých akcentovat a tvářit se, že se právě jich nic netýká a stále omílat, že jsou jediní bojovníci proti korupci a že jen proto byli ochotni vstoupit do této vlády.
Pan Sobotka to všechno velmi dobře pochopil, proto tak odsoudil tajné nahrávání. Opakuji, nebylo-li by nahrávání, nebyl by ani případ Drobil, nebyl by vydíratelný (např. Věcmi veřejnými) premiér a celá ODS, či někdo by si z lukrativní zakázky mohl přivlastnit stamiliony a on sám by mohl mít stále vysokou naději na prezidentskou kandidaturu.
Čtenářské hodnocení
Doporučili byste tento článek ostatním?
(1 - určitě ne | 4 - nevím | 7 - určitě ano)
1234567

description.hltext_display: Car skids in water, driver killed (AAP)
description.content:
A driver has died after skidding in a pool of water while trying to overtake on a far north Queensland road.
Police said the man was trying to overtake another vehicle when his sedan hit a mass of water, skidded off the roadway and hit a tree on Davidson Road, Euramo, near Innisfail about 3.45pm (AEST) on Wednesday.
The man, believed to be in his 20s, died as a result of his injuries.
He was the only person in the car.

description.hltext_display: Tell Me About It: When he refuses to deal with his depression
description.author: Carolyn Hax
description.content:
Question: My boyfriend of three years and I recently broke up. I'm young (but an adult) and I keep hearing, "There are other fish in the sea," but I can't seem to get over him. He was my first love and, I hoped, my only love. We had such great chemistry, and we balanced each other out.
He has depression and goes through these funks. He refuses to go to the doctor to get help. His depression is the reason we broke up.
I miss him, and I want to help him. We talk every couple of weeks, but he does not want to get back together because he needs to focus on himself. I think about him 24/7 and worry about him constantly. What do I need to do to stop thinking and worrying about him? I'm in school, work full time, and have great friends and family. What else do I need?
Answer: Time and perspective, to start. Your breakup is recent, and recent breakups are painful, distracting, and confounding almost as a rule, for first loves and all the subsequent ones that matter. It might also help to know that first loves may have cornered the poetry market, but they don't own significance.
It sounds as if you could also use a more realistic view of what you can and can't do to "help" someone troubled. Obviously, people have profound effects on each other, and a person like you can captivate, inspire, motivate, entertain, etc., someone like your boyfriend. (To etc., or not to etc., that is the question. ...)
But you've been with him three years, and his answer to his depression is to refuse to deal with it: Please absorb this education in the limits of how much one person can do for another. And the limits of your "chemistry." And where this "only love" was really headed.
Undealt-with depression is part of his package deal, and it's going to remain so unless and until he's ready to change that.
Your grief will have to run its course, but you can help it along by realizing you accomplished all you could. He's focusing on himself; let him, please, and consider doing the same. Hold your imagined future, then release.
E-mail Carolyn at tellme@washpost.com.

description.hltext_display: Far Eastern New Century, Sinopec Yizheng to form mainland JV
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - Sinopec Yizheng Chemical Fibre Co Ltd<600871><1033>, a subsidiary of Sinopec Group, announced yesterday that it will team up with Far Eastern New Century Corp, the largest polyester maker by capacity in Taiwan, to set up a joint venture in Yizheng, Jiangsu Province, sources reported.
The JV, to be located in Yangzhou Chemical Industrial Park in Jiangsu Province, is estimated to involve an investment of RMB 3.8 billion. Far Eastern and Yizheng Chemical will hold a 60% and a 40% stake in the JV, respectively.
The two sides said in a joint statement that the new company is expected to produce 1 million tons of purified terephthalic acid per year.
However, the sources did not give the construction schedule and operation date.
Far Eastern, formerly known as Far Eastern Textile, is a unit of Far Eastern Group, one of Taiwan's premier business leaders. It listed on the Taiwan Stock Exchange in 1967.

description.hltext_display: Finland's version of a bad Santa
description.author: Steven Rea
description.content:
explores the dark side of the Santa Claus myth - if myth he is - and finds humor, and horror, lurking there.
Set in the breathtaking alpine ranges of northern Finland, writer-director Jalmari Helander's wicked yuletide fable starts with two kids sneaking around a top-secret archaeological dig. There is something, or someone, way down in the bowels of the earth, encased in wood and a massive block of ice. And there are hundreds of dead reindeer strewn across the fields nearby, mauled and bloodied, as if a horde of wolves had attacked. What's going on here?
Only wide-eyed Pietari (Onni Tommila), a boy whose father runs a slaughterhouse, seems to know.
Inspired by the lore of the demonic, horned counterpart to St. Nick - the Krampus - Rare Exports is a spooky adventure in which a band of blundering Finlandian men (no women here, it seems) run around with guns while the excavation's crew go missing, and then the children go missing, too.
It's not a matter of who's been naughty and who's been nice - just about everyone seems to be prey.
Never mind the pint-sized protagonist: Rare Exports - a tongue-in-cheek meditation on pagan fairy tales and their cultural resonances - isn't really suitable for younger filmgoers: Hacked-up body parts (animal and human), a cascade of profanity, and the sight of an army of naked, wizened men moving like zombies across the snowscape - this Santa Claus story is for a midnight movie crowd, not the kiddie matinees. *** (out of four stars) Directed by Jalmari Helander. With Onni Tommila, Jorma Tommila, Ilmari Jarvenpaa, and Christian Ellefsen. In English, and in Finnish with subtitles. Distributed by Oscilloscope Laboratories.
Running time: 1 hour, 20 mins.
Parent's guide: R (violence, profanity, nudity, adult themes)
Playing at: Ritz at the Bourse Contact movie critic Steven Rea at 215-854-5629 or srea@phillynews.com. Read his blog, "On Movies Online," at www.philly.com/philly/blogs/ onmovies/

description.hltext_display: The gift of being Jewish at Christmas
description.author: Sally Friedman
description.content:
I'm always touched.
Acquaintances stammer - avert their eyes - and then blurt out something like "Enjoy your holiday, too," when I wish them a Merry Christmas. "My" holiday's already come and gone. It's called Hanukkah, a minor one on the Jewish calendar, and a blip on the Jewish holiday radar screen, a pleasant but second-string festival. It's not the "Jewish Christmas." But here we are, a multicultural society, still struggling to understand one another's ways. And sometimes, we need road maps to guide us.
I'll never forget the neighbor, back in the days when we were all suburban pioneers, who was horrified that our children were "deprived" of Christmas. We could share so much as homesteaders, fighting crabgrass and learning the ropes of our new community together. We could compare notes on everything from potty-training to pot roasts.
But this woman simply could not comprehend why our three unfortunate daughters were deprived of that childhood rite of passage, a visit to - and from - Santa Claus. Her kids made that ritual visit to the local department store called Pomeroy's. They got dressed up and had their pictures taken.
And yes, it all seemed so glorious to three little Jewish girls who had no such excursion.
After all, what would be the harm of a little Christmas tree? this neighbor always mused. Not one of those towering ones, just something small and simple for the kids? She always invited our "deprived" little ones to see her family's tree, and that was fine. The tough part was when they came home to our treeless world. For a while there, I know our kids felt more deprived than ever.
I also know our neighbor meant well. I understand that her heart went out to Jill, Amy, and Nancy, who may as well have been Dickens urchins, so dreadful was their lot in life.
And you can bet that those daughters of ours caught right on, and clamored for the best of both worlds: A little Hanukkah and a little Christmas would have delighted them back in the days when Christmas envy was rampant.
And not just for them.
There were years when I felt our difference keenly, when Christmas was a lonely, almost melancholy time. After all, ours was the only house in the neighborhood without Christmas lights, and it always looked so forlorn in the wonderland of sparkle and glitter.
Our kids had no post-Christmas tales of stockings filled with candy canes and gaily wrapped gifts. There was no caroling around the piano.
There was, in fact, no Christmas at all at our house, a quite conscious decision, especially as our daughters got older and began establishing stronger Jewish identities. We wanted them to know certainty, not ambivalence. We wanted them to embrace their Judaism, even in December, when being different can be daunting.
Was it easy? Hardly.
Is it now? Yes - and no.
A movie and then some Chinese food is balm for the Jewish soul. Every comedian capitalizes on what has become that iconic Christmas Day for so many Jewish families.
There are alternatives. One year, we joined members of our synagogue and volunteered at the Ronald McDonald House in Camden, so staffers could have at least a part of the holiday off. It felt wonderful.
We recognize that as American Jews, we are both insiders and outsiders. In December, we're reminded that we live in a predominantly Christian country as a distinct minority.
But we also know - and so do our children and grandchildren - how truly blessed we are to breathe free as non-Christians. Our ancestors were hardly as fortunate.
So as Christmas swirls around us, I sometimes feel the old ghosts of discomfort. It happens when the lady at the dry cleaners starts wishing me a Merry Christmas - and then stops herself in horror. "It's OK," I tell her. "I'm not offended." And I'm not.
Maybe this political-correctness thing has gone too far. We are so fearful of trampling on one another's sensibilities that a simple greeting becomes a minefield, and the word Christmas is suddenly fraught with anxi

description.hltext_display: Over one million to benefit from power bill rebate next year
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR, (Bernama) - A total of 1,068,000 domestic consumers are to enjoy an electricity bill rebate estimated at RM138.48 million next year, Deputy Energy, Green Technology and Water Minister Noriah Kasnon said today.
The move is aimed at helping the low-income group to reduce monthly expenses, she said in reply to Senator Datuk Fatimah Hamat in the Dewan Negara.
She said Selangor had the highest number of domestic consumers to benefit from the rebate, at 150,000, followed by Johor (126,000), Perak (114,000), Kedah (99,000), Kuala Lumpur (94,000), Kelantan (69,000), Sarawak (69,000), Penang (68,000), Pahang (63,000), Sabah (62,000), Negeri Sembilan (53,000), Terengganu (50,000), Melaka (36,000), Perlis (11,000), and Putrajaya and Cyberjaya (4,000).
Noriah said that between January and October this year, the government spent RM116.24 million on rebate for consumers.
She said the rebate was only for consumers whose monthly electricity bill was less than RM20.

event_or_fact.property: Selangor had the highest number of domestic consumers to benefit from the rebate, at 150,000, followed by Johor (126,000), Perak (114,000), Kedah (99,000), Kuala Lumpur (94,000), Kelantan (69,000), Sarawak (69,000), Penang (68,000), Pahang (63,000), Sabah
The move is aimed at helping the low-income group to reduce monthly expenses
the rebate was only for consumers whose monthly electricity bill was less than RM20
between January and October this year, the government spent RM116.24 million on rebate for consumers.

description.hltext_display: Congress approves bill to limit shark-fin trade
description.content:
/scriptShark fins in a bag await delivery at a warehouse in Hong Kong. The fins are a delicacy in some cultures. (AFP/ file photo ) if(requestedWidth 0)} WASHINGTON Congress has approved a bill to limit the lucrative trade in shark fins, especially off the West Coast, as demand rises for shark- fin soup in Asia and other parts of the world.
The bill, approved this week by the House and Senate, would require all vessels to land sharks with fins attached and prevent nonfishing vessels from transporting shark fins without their carcasses. Rising demand for shark-fin soup, a delicacy in many cultures, has led to an increase in removal of shark fins, with the bodies dumped overboard.
Democratic Sen. John Kerry of Massachusetts said the bill would tackle what he called a serious threat to marine life. An estimated 73 million sharks are killed worldwide each year, primarily to support the global shark-fin trade.

event_or_fact.property: the bill would tackle what he called a serious threat to marine life

description.hltext_display: Shandong Xingmin Wheel, Foton ink agreement
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - Shandong Xingmin Wheel Co Ltd<002355>, one of the largest producers of steel wheels in China, yesterday announced that it has inked a strategic cooperation agreement with Beiqi Foton Motor Co Ltd<600166>, a Beijing-based vehicle maker, sources reported.
Xingmin Wheel said in a statement that the move is to ensure a stable supply contract with Foton Motor in the next five years, thus to stabilize its bottom line.
Pursuant to the agreement, Foton will not conduct self-production or cooperation with other suppliers to produce accessories and parts to compete with Xingmin Wheel in the next five years, while Xingmin wheel will meet Foton's order demand and deliver products on time.
Shandong Xingmin Wheel, founded in 1999 and headquartered in Longkou, Shandong Province, is primarily engaged in the research and development, manufacture and distribution of automobile spare parts, including tubeless steel wheels and steel wheel for trucks, according to the company's website.

description.hltext_display: GCL-Poly Energy inks supply contract with Solarfun Power
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - GCL-Poly Energy Holdings Ltd<3800>, a foreign-owned independent cogeneration plant operator in China, on Dec. 21 said it had signed an agreement with another Chinese photovoltaic product maker Solarfun Power Holdings Co Ltd to supply 2.5 gigawatts of silicon products.
Pursuant to the agreement, the Hong Kong-listed firm will deliver these silicon chips and materials to Solarfun Power from 2011 to 2015.
At present, GCL-Poly Energy has China's largest solar power plant in Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province with an installed capacity of 20 MW, and some PV modules of the plant were provided by Solarfun Power.
GCL-Poly Energy, which had a silicon chip output capacity of 3.5 GW per year at the end of last month, hopes to have an annual output capacity of 21,000 tons of poly-silicon at the end of this year, sources reported.

description.hltext_display: 汕尾烟草局长被曝豪华消费 招待费一月200万？
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
近段时间，关于“汕尾烟草局长任人唯亲、安插30多名亲信进烟草系统”的相关帖子在各网络论坛疯传。随后，另一则关于该局长豪花招待费的网帖更引来无数眼球。本月16日，羊城晚报记者赶赴汕尾调查，采访了汕尾烟草系统相关人士，汕尾烟草局局长陈文铸对网帖所曝的问题一一作了回应，并表示已向公安部门报案。
羊城晚报记者21日发稿前获悉：广东省烟草专卖局人事劳资处调查组不久前将调查情况发文至汕尾市委宣传部，该份文件中提到：据初步调查，反映的情况基本失实。
安排30多亲信入职？
回应：与己无关
今年10月25日，天涯社区的“传媒江湖”版出现一篇名为《无良烟草局长任人唯亲 强行解聘贫病职工》的帖子，爆出广东烟草汕尾市有限公司负责人为安插自己的亲信，与七名业务骨干终止劳动合同，于是该七名被炒员工愤而曝光这名烟草局长近年来违规调入和提拔重用30多名亲友进入汕尾市烟草系统。帖子郑重声明：“以上情况完全属实，请有关领导给予调查处理。”
在该网帖随后爆出的“关系图”里，脉络清晰地列举了35个与陈文铸有关的亲信名单，且绝大部分都是汕尾烟草系统的在职人员，职务也从副总经理到办公室资料员不等。其中有陈文铸的“胞弟”、“弟妹”、“妻弟”、“堂弟”、“表弟”等亲戚，还有其司机、生意伙伴、结拜兄弟，甚至连女儿的家教也被提拔为“汕尾烟草物流中心主任”。本月15日，汕尾市烟草专卖局人事劳资科的罗科长向记者证实：关系网中的一应人等的确均为该烟草系统的员工。
“这一切与我无关！”陈文铸接受羊城晚报记者的采访时，一脸无奈。他承认网帖中所列举的“亲友”当中，有五人确实与自己有亲属关系，包括他的胞弟陈×盛、弟媳李×敏、妻弟陈×宏等，“但是他们的任职、提拔时间，全部是在我调任汕尾工作之前，跟我无关。”让陈文铸觉得哭笑不得的是，其弟媳李×敏与胞弟陈×盛原本就是单位同事，后来才结婚成家的。他告诉记者，除了那五个人以外，其余所谓的“亲戚”、“亲信”均是无稽之谈，“那些人不少是下属陆丰烟草公司的一线职工，名字我都不认识，怎么都算到我"亲戚"的头上来呢？”
汕尾烟草公司人事劳资科出示的一份入职时间表显示，陈文铸之弟陈×盛入职时间为1989年7月，其妻李×敏入职时间是2001年2月，另外的三个亲戚入职时间都是在2001年以前。罗科长称，陈文铸是2007年年初才从惠州烟草公司副总经理平调到汕尾公司，2009年5月份才升任公司总经理，兼汕尾市烟草专卖局党组书记、局长。
记者联系到其中四名被炒员工，他们表示看过网帖，帖子里的大部分内容实际上就是他们向广东省烟草专卖局投诉的内容，但并不是他们所发。
招待费一月200万？
回应：断章取义
12月初，网上又冒出一新帖《晒晒汕尾市烟草公司局长的吃喝，一看吓一跳》，称该公司“一个月仅吃喝就花了约206万元，以此类推一年光吃喝就要花掉2500万元”。
这笔招待费究竟是怎么回事？记者从网上看到这份发帖者所上传的“2010年3月业务与财务公开”表，发现该月份的“经营费用”和“管理费用”中果然有两笔“业务招待费”，分别为43.28万元和162.82万元，总额为206.1万元。
陈文铸对此作出了解释：网帖的内容纯属断章取义。他向记者承认，该表确实是该公司今年3月份的业务与财务公开报表，但这笔总额206万元的业务招待费事出有因：当月正值春节前后，往年每逢这一段时期，因业务拓展需要招待各个烟草生产厂家、前来考察的系统兄弟单位，以及汕尾烟草系统年终总结会议费用等，加起来招待费用必然要比平常月份多。“平时的招待费一般是每月三四十万元，全年平均下来就没那么高了。公司董事会对此有严格规定，整个公司全年接待费用实施总量控制，不能超标，并不存在网上臆想的那样，一个月多少就类推一年多少的情况。”陈文铸称，何况这笔费用是整个汕尾烟草系统的总费用，并非单独一个市烟草公司的开销，更非他一个人的“吃喝开销”。
对于自己为何会成为近期以来网帖口诛笔伐的对象，陈文铸说，今年8月份，公司有七名职工劳动合同到期，按照公司的考核制度，经部门综合考核不合格而被末位淘汰，而非网帖所说的无故辞退，被终止合同的几个员工不愿意走法律途径寻求解决，部分人开口就向公司索要30至50万元的补偿金额，这么高的补偿金额公司根本无法接受，之后不久网上就出现了相关的帖子。陈文铸表示，针对那些网帖对自己的诬告诽谤，他曾报了案，公安部门已介入调查。作者：王漫琪 发自汕尾 (来源：羊城晚报)

description.hltext_display: 安装远程监控系统全天监督正规充装点
description.content:
生意社12月21日讯 为切断“黑气”根源，昨日，福州市液化气整治组着手给正规点安装远程监控系统，系统直接与整治组相关成员单位连接，近期将安装完毕。另外，多名行业监督员今起派驻市区正规充装点，进行全天候监督。
连日来，福州市瓶装液化气专项整治协调工作小组都在加班加点进行整治行动，来逐步建立多项长效机制，根除“黑气”。
首先，整治组着手给市区正规充装点装远程监控系统。监控将安装在每个充装点大门和充装台等重要位置，并联到整治组相关成员部门，直接动态监控正规点充装行为。监控系统近期将安装完毕。
同时，整治组要求正规液化气充装点收回液化气钢瓶产权。今后钢瓶产权只能属于液化气公司，必须在钢瓶上标明企业名称标志，用户向其缴纳押金。今后液化气企业严禁向报废、过期或其他企业的钢瓶充气。
此外，整治组召集多名行业监督员，进行统一培训。今起，这些监督员就将长期派驻市区几家正规充装点，进行24小时监督。
对整治行动，业内人士感慨不已，两家正规燃气企业相关负责人称，“这是釜底抽薪解决问题，应该是福州史上规模最大的液化气整治行动。看来这次是动真格了。”
中国化工网隆重推出醇醚周刊，其内容涵盖甲醇、二甲醚、甲醇汽油等主要醇醚产品热点新闻、行情动态、价格走势、产品周评及媒体速瞄等内容。方便各位全面了解行业的发展动向！同时也是您推广企业、树立形象的全新宣传平台！

description.hltext_display: Namočen je i prestižní auditor
description.content:
NEW YORK - Prokuratura v New Yorku chce v kauze zkrachovalé investiční banky Lehman Brothers Holdings obžalovat z podvodu účetní a poradenskou společnost Ernst & Young.
Tvrdí to zdroje ekonomického listu The Wall Street Journal (WSJ). Podle nich by mohla být obžaloba vznesena v civilním procesu už tento týden. Prokuratura se podle zdrojů WSJ domnívá, že Ernst & Young v bance používala kontroverzní účetní postupy.
Spor podle WSJ vzešel z toho, že banka používala kontroverzní účetní postup označovaný jako Repo 105. Soudem určený vyšetřovatel Anton Valukas tvrdí, že banka začala zmíněný účetní postup využívat v roce 2001, aniž by o něm informovala investory nebo regulační orgány. Metoda podle Valukase vytvářela dojem, že Lehman v roce 2008 snižoval objem investic na úvěr, i když ve skutečnosti to tak nebylo.
Lehman použil účet Repo 105, aby ze své bilance přechodně dostal částku 50 miliard dolarů, informoval už letos v březnu Valukas. Podle něj všechno nasvědčovalo tomu, že auditor pochybil a že svým jednáním zavdal příčinu k zahájení soudního řízení.
Experti tvrdí, že soudní spor se společností Ernst & Young bude patřit k těm z kategorie neobvyklých. Američtí prokurátoři totiž v minulosti auditorské společnosti obviňovali jen velmi zřídka, poslední velký případ se týká poradenské společnosti Arthur Andersen a jejího podílu na podvodech ve společnosti Enron. Ta kvůli účetním podvodům a vysokým dluhům vyhlásila bankrot, skandál ale nepřežil ani Arthur Andersen.
Banka Lehman Brothers vyhlásila bankrot v polovině září 2008 a stala se symbolem globální finanční krize. Po krachu banky vstoupila krize do druhé a mnohem vážnější fáze. Ze dne na den tehdy zamrzly úvěrové trhy, banky si přestaly vzájemně důvěřovat a začaly naopak zadržovat hotovost na svých účtech. Krach banky Lehman Brothers byl největším bankrotem v dějinách USA.

description.hltext_display: Šéfdirigentem České filharmonie bude Jiří Bělohlávek. Málo pilní muzikanti by se měli bát
description.content:
Novým šéfdirigentem České filharmonie se stane světově uznávaný dirigent Jiří Bělohlávek. Informaci potvrdil mluvčí ministerstva kultury Stanislav Brunclík. Bělohlávek podepíše dnes odpoledne na ministerstvu smlouvu. Mandátu se zřejmě ujme na podzim roku 2012.
Pražské jaro 2008 - Jiří Bělohlávek foto: © Pražské jaro - Ivan Malý
Čtyřiašedesátiletý Bělohlávek v současnosti působí na prestižním šéfdirigentském místě u Symfonického orchestru BBC v Londýně, kde mu smlouva v roce 2012 skončí. V témže roce ukončí spolupráci s českými filharmoniky současný šéfdirigent Izraelec Elijahu Inbal.
"Máte dobré informace. Já měl to štěstí, že jsem byl u dvou klíčových schůzek pana ministra Bessera s panem Bělohlávkem, a okamžik, kdy si oba pánové toto pondělí podali ruce, se jen těžko popisuje. Myslím, že to v 17 hodin na ministerstvu oba popíšou sami," řekl Brunclík.
Smlouvu podle mluvčího s Bělohlávkem podepíše Besser. Ministr kultury v médiích už dříve uvedl, že jméno nového šéfdirigenta oznámí ještě před Vánocemi. Generální ředitel ČF David Mareček však ještě na začátku prosince předpokládal, že se bude jednat až do poloviny ledna.
Vedení ČF o podpis smlouvy s Bělohlávkem, který je považován za nejúspěšnějšího českého dirigenta současnosti, dlouho usilovalo. Jednalo s ním jako s jediným oficiálním kandidátem. Slibuje si od něj mimo jiné i posílení pozice ČF na mezinárodní hudební scéně.
Bělohlávek by byl vhodným kandidátem i podle některých hudebních kritiků. Někteří hráči ČF se jej ale mohou obávat vzhledem k jeho pověstné náročnosti, zejména v přípravě na koncerty.
Čtyřiatřicetiletý Mareček prosazoval Bělohlávka již v době, kdy se účastnil konkurzu na šéfa ČF, protože filharmonici prý potřebují silnou dirigentskou osobnost, nejlépe českého původu. Marečka jmenoval ministr kultury do funkce v říjnu poté, co mu ho jako nejvhodnějšího kandidáta doporučila výběrová komise. Mandátu se ujme začátkem února příštího roku.
Bělohlávek u ČF již v letech 1990 až 1992 jako šéfdirigent krátce působil. Jeho odchod znalci hodnotili jako historickou chybu, která zahájila v tělese dvacetiletou krizi. Filharmonici si tehdy v tajných volbách místo něj zvolili Němce Gerda Albrechta za prvního cizího šéfdirigenta. Bělohlávek se tehdy na protest proti způsobu volby své funkce vzdal. Spolupráci s ČF ale nikdy nepřerušil.

description.hltext_display: Capital Group buys 7.26% stake in Chongqing Rural Com'l Bank
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - U.S.-based Capital Group bought about 159 million H shares of Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank Co<3618> in the bank's debut on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on Thursday, according to the bourse operator Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing<0388>.
The HKEx said that Capital Group spent HK$838 million on the deal at an average share price of HK$5.28 apiece, higher than the bank's initial public offering price of HK$5.25 per share.
The H shares acquired accounted for 7.26% of the lender's H-share capital and 1.8% of the bank's total share capital.
Shares of Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank dropped 0.95% to close at HK$5.20 in its first day of trading, with turnover standing at HK$3.97 billion, China Knowledge reported earlier.
In July this year, Capital Group bought a 13.13% H-share stake in Agricultural Bank of China Ltd<601288><1288> on the Chinese lender's H share debut in Hong Kong for HK$12.6 billion.

company.name: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd.
Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd.

description.hltext_display: 杨晶:加快经济社会发展是解决民族问题根本任务
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
十一届全国人大常委会第十八次会议于12月20日至25日在人民大会堂举行。本次会议定于22日下午第二次全体会议听取国务院的3个报告，即关于加快少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展工作情况的报告、关于深化医药卫生体制改革工作情况的报告、关于加快服务业工作的报告。
[杨晶]全国人民代表大会常务委员会：我受国务院的委托，向全国人大常委会报告近年来加快少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展工作情况，请予审议。
[杨晶] 一、始终站在全局和战略高度，不断采取有力措施，大力促进少数民族和民族地区加快发展。
[杨晶] 我国是统一的多民族国家，少数民族人口一亿多，民族自治地方占国土总面积的64％，西部和边疆绝大多数地区都是少数民族聚居区。这一基本国情决定了少数民族和民族地区的发展在我国经济社会发展全局中占有极其重要的地位。加快少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展，是我国现阶段解决民族问题的根本任务，不仅关系我国区域发展总体战略的实施，关系全面建设小康社会奋斗目标的实现，而且关系民族团结、社会稳定和边防巩固，关系国家的长治久安。

description.hltext_display: CITIC Group buys plot in Beijing for RMB 6.3 bln
description.content:
Dec. 22, 2010 (China Knowledge) - CITIC Group, China's largest state-owned investment conglomerator, has won the bid for a piece of land in Beijing's CBD for RMB 6.3 billion, a record price in the city, according to the Beijing Land Consolidation and Reserve Center.
The plot, located on Guanghua Road, in Chaoyang District, Beijing, cost RMB 18,000 per square meter of potential floor area totaling 350,000 sq m.
An executive of CITIC Group said that the company will spend more than RMB 10 billion on the site, including Beijing's highest building with a height of around 500 meters.
Another two bidders of the land auction are China's HNA Group, the parent of China's largest non-state owned airline Hainan Airlines Co Ltd<600221><900945>, and China's leading property developer Dalian Wanda Group, which offered a price of RMB 5.9 billion and RMB 4.5 billion, respectively, compared with the starting price of RMB 5.06 billion.

description.hltext_display: Pracovní doba se prodlužuje, dovolená se nečerpá
description.content:
Průměrný počet odpracovaných hodin se v prvních třech čtvrtletích meziročně zvýšil o tři hodiny na 149,7 hodiny měsíčně. Souběžně s tím se zvýšil i počet přesčasů a snížila průměrná doba nemoci a dovolené.
Vyplývá to z údajů ministerstva práce a sociálních věcí (MPSV). Průměrně každý zaměstnanec tento rok v prvních třech čtvrtletích odpracoval 3,9 přesčasových hodin měsíčně. To je o půl hodiny více než loni. Měsíční neodpracovaná doba dosáhla v prvních třech čtvrtletích 23,2 hodiny na zaměstnance. Z toho mimo jiné 5,1 hodiny připadalo na nemoc a 13,7 hodiny na dovolenou. Loni byla průměrná měsíční neodpracovaná doba 25,3 hodiny. Z toho připadalo na nemoc 5,4 hodiny a na dovolenou 14,4 hodiny.
Podle Kateřiny Duspivové ze společnosti Trexima, která pro MPSV data zpracovává, údaje svědčí o ekonomickém oživení. »Ve sledovaném období roku 2010 bylo pouze o jeden pracovní den více než v roce 2009, a nárůst přesčasových hodin byl mnohem výraznější,« řekla Duspivová. Za prvních devět měsíců totiž zaměstnanci odpracovali na přesčasech téměř 4,5 dne. Zlepšení situace české ekonomiky podle Duspivové mimo jiné potvrzuje i pokles doby dovolené, kterou zaměstnavatelé hojně využívali v minulém roce při nedostatku zakázek.
Na takovém výkladu je jistě něco pravdy, i když statistiky příliš velké oživení ekonomiky neukazují. Nutno ale doplnit další důvody současného vývoje využívání pracovní doby. Především je to nezaměstnanost, která dál roste. Podniky propouštějí, aby snížily náklady, a práci rozdělují mezi zbývající pracovníky. Právě to spolu s obavou ze ztráty práce nejvíce zvyšuje průměrný počet odpracovaných hodin, i skutečnost, že lidé nemohou čerpat dovolené a nemoc raději přechodí.
Co ještě statistici zjistili? Nejdelší odpracovanou dobu letos mají dělníci v zemědělství, lesnictví a rybářství, v průměru 154,7 hodiny. Spolu se zaměstnanci pracujícími jako obsluha strojů a zařízení na ně připadá také nejvíce odpracovaných přesčasových hodin, 7,3 měsíčně. Měli ale také nejdelší průměrnou měsíční dobu nemoci, 9,3 hodiny.
Nejméně hodin odpracovali pomocní a nekvalifikovaní pracovníci, 147,2 měsíčně. Nejvíce si dovolenou brali nižší administrativní pracovníci, 14,3 hodiny měsíčně.
Takovýto trend zřejmě budeme zaznamenávat i v následujícím roce. Nic totiž nenasvědčuje tomu, že by ve vývoji ekonomiky mělo dojít k nějakým převratným změnám.
ILUSTRAČNÍ FOTO - internet
Příčinou prodlužování pracovní doby, i toho, že lidé nečerpají dovolené a nemoc raději přechodí, je především propouštění a obava z něho
22. 12. 2010redakční zpráva
Čtenářské hodnocení
