快讯：胡锦涛会见香港特区行政长官曾荫权
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
中新网北京12月22日电 (记者 董会峰)今天下午3时30分许，国家主席胡锦涛在中南海会见前来北京述职的香港特别行政区行政长官曾荫权。
稍后，胡锦涛将在同一地点会见来京述职的澳门特别行政区行政长官崔世安。
(责任编辑：赵婷)

description.hltext_display: Thermo Fisher Scientific to acquire Lomb Scientific
description.content:
Thermo Fisher Scientific has announced that it will acquire Lomb Scientific, a provider of laboratory chemicals, consumables and instruments in Australia and New Zealand. Its customers are reported to include hospitals, universities, research and analytical laboratories in both countries, as well as a growing portion of Asia and the Middle East.
"The addition of Lomb Scientific reinforces our commitment to expand in growing Asia Pacific markets," said Marc N. Casper, president and chief executive officer of Thermo Fisher Scientific in a statement. "Through this acquisition, we would significantly strengthen our laboratory product offerings in the region, particularly chemicals used in life sciences, research and industrial applications. Lomb Scientific would also expand our customer base, increasing our depth of capabilities in health sciences, such as pathology, and building on our presence in strong industrial markets, such as mining."
Lomb Scientific produces a variety of laboratory chemicals and other consumables, and provides instrumentation and services through its commercial network. The business will be integrated into Thermo Fisher's Laboratory Products and Services and Analytical Technologies segments.
For more information visit www.thermofisherscientific.com

description.hltext_display: Dlouhodobé problémy Státní opery se vyhrocují
description.content:
Ředitel SOP Oliver Dohnányi rezignoval, uvedl, že po nátlaku ministerstva
PRAHA - Šéf Státní opery Praha (SOP), světoznámý dirigent Oliver Dohnányi, v pondělí rezignoval na svou funkci. Vedením opery byl podle vyjádření mluvčího ministerstva kultury (MK) Stanislava Brunclíka pověřen dosavadní manažer SOP Radim Dolanský. Jedná se zřejmě o vyhrocení dlouhodobě neřešených finančních problémů.
Státní příspěvková organizace SOP má fungovat jako umělecká konkurence Národního divadla, dlouhodobě se však potýká s finanční insolventností. Již v r. 2009 bylo připraveno memorandum, jež mělo situaci koncepčně řešit. Uvádí se v něm, že »MK i hlavní město Praha shodně vyjadřují zájem na další existenci této významné scény v Praze a učiní vše potřebné k tomu, aby se od 1. ledna 2011 SOP stala příspěvkovou organizací hl. m. Prahy. Za tím účelem podniknou nutné legislativní nebo exekutivní kroky.« Legislativní řešení, jež tehdy měli podepsat bývalý ministr kultury Václav Riedlbauch a bývalý primátor Pavel Bém, však vyčpělo do nenávratna. Jediné, co zůstalo nadále neřešeno, byla prohlubující se kritická finanční situace. Hl. m. Praha mělo před dvěma roky prohlásit, že bude poskytovat SOP roční příspěvek ve výši 100 mil. korun, aby se úroveň poskytovaných kulturních služeb zachovala. Stejnou částkou s ročním krácením o dva miliony Kč mělo přispívat po dobu 12 let také MK. Připravený záměr se však nikdy neuskutečnil. SOP proto nyní řeší více než sedmimilionový schodek ve svém letošním rozpočtu.
Dohnányi nehodlá asistovat u likvidace SOP
Nynější ředitel SOP Oliver Dohnányi sdělil, že schodek rozpočtu vznikl v důsledku nepřiměřených nákladů na dřívější premiéry oper ještě před jeho nástupem do funkce. V této situaci na funkci ředitele SOP rezignoval »po dlouhodobém nátlaku MK«, uvedl Dohnányi ve svém odůvodnění. »Na (pondělní) audienci mě ministr kultury Besser poprvé informoval o plánu ministerstva SOP komplexně rekonstruovat, tedy přerušit její umělecký provoz - k tomu podle jeho soudu není vhodné obsazovat post ředitele umělcem, ale manažerem. Pokud bych nerezignoval, pan ministr mne hodlal namístě odvolat. Jiný důvod odvolání mi pan ministr nesdělil. Konstatoval, že SOP je dlouhodobě v havarijní technické i ekonomické situaci, na které nenesu nejmenší vinu.«
Dohnányi podle svého vyjádření lituje, že ho ministr neinformoval o svém záměru dříve, naopak ho pověřil vypracováním projektu úspor v r. 2011 a upřesněním koncepce rozvoje. »Oba dokumenty jsem mu předložil. Na schůzce 22. listopadu mi ministr zároveň sdělil, že hodlá vypsat na místo ředitele výběrové řízení, a to v souladu s úmyslem vypsat výběrová řízení na všechny ředitele příspěvkových organizací, kteří podle jeho názoru výběrovým řízením neprošli. Zároveň mě vyzval, abych se tohoto výběrového řízení zúčastnil. Lituji, že jsem nemohl realizovat plány, které jsem deklaroval, nehodlám však asistovat u likvidace souboru SOP.«
Příští rok v Opeře rekonstrukce
Celková rekonstrukce sídla Opery, které je podle Brunclíka v zoufalém stavu, se bude týkat technického zázemí i vybavení pro diváky. Poslední rekonstrukce se totiž uskutečnila asi před 40 roky. »Ministru Besserovi se podařilo sehnat ze státního rozpočtu finance, takže příští rok se rozjede relativně velká investiční akce, během které bude budova pro diváky uzavřena,« sdělil Brunclík.
22. 12. 2010(the)

description.hltext_display: Doğanşehir de Aşure Etkinliği Yapıldı
description.content: Doğanşehir Kaymakamlığı önderliğinde ilçede Muharrem ayı nedeniyle aşure etkinliği düzenlendi. Tüm köy muhtarları, belediye başkanları, sivil toplum kuruluşları ve ilçe milli eğitim müdürlüğü katkıları ile yapılan aşure günü etkinliğine katılım yüksek oldu. Doğanşehir Hükümet Konağı bahçesinde başlayan aşure etkinliğinde gelen misafirlere aşureleri Vaizoğulları Anadolu Sağlık Meslek Lisesi öğrencileri ikram ederken, daha sonra Kaymakam Barboros Baran, Belediye Başkanı İbrahim Karaman, Cem Vakfı Malatya şubesi Başkanı Eşref Doğan, Malatya İl Müftüsü Hacı Yusuf Gül, Hacı Bektaş Veli Kültür Dayanışma Merkezi Vakfı Başkanı Hasan Meşeli ve diğer misafirler birlikte aşure dağıttı. Aşure dağıtımı sonrasında Belediye düğün salonunda Muharrem ayının anlam ve önemini anlatan panel düzenlendi. Panelde konuşmacı olarak Cem Vakfı Malatya şubesi Başkanı Eşref Doğan, Malatya İl Müftüsü Hacı Yusuf Gül, Hacı Bektaş Veli Kültür Dayanışma Merkezi Vakfı Başkanı Hasan Meşeli, İnönü Üniversitesi Öğretim Üyesi Doç. Dr. Mehmet Dönmez yer aldı. Doğanşehir Kaymakamı Barboros Baran, panelin açılışında yaptığı konuşmada, birlik ve beraberliğin pekiştiren bu günlerin önemine dikkat çekerek, aşure günü etkinliğine katkıda bulunanlara, katılımcılara ve ilçe halkına teşekkürlerini ilettti. (OKT-AY-ÜNS) - MALATYA (Anadolu Ajansı) 15 dakika önce.. [2430012]

description.hltext_display: Kdo bude šumavským vládcem?
description.content:
PRAHA - Komise bude dnes vybírat z deseti kandidátů vhodného člověka na šéfa Národního parku Šumava (NPŠ). Může jím být člověk »od fochu« i někdo, kdo nikdy na Šumavě nebydlel – jsme přece v České republice...
Z původně přihlášených 23 kandidátů už jich zůstává pouze deset: starosta Hořovic Luboš Čížek, vedoucí oddělení oblastních plánů rozvoje lesů Ústavu pro hospodářskou úpravu lesů Plzeň Jiří Holický, projektový manažer Správy NPŠ Miloš Juha, specialista ochrany přírody fondů EU Jaroslav Karas, ředitel o. p. s. Orbis Viridis zabývající se osvětou v lesnictví, dřevařství a myslivosti Pavel Kitzberger, dřívější náměstek Správy NPŠ Jiří Mánek, ředitel Správy CHKO Český kras Jaroslav Obermajer, ředitel kampaní Greenpeace ČR Jan Piňos, vedoucí technického oddělení certifikací lesů Jaroslav Tymrák a ředitel Botanické zahrady Praha a prezident Unie botanických zahrad ČR Oldřich Vacek.
»Výběrová komise naplánovala na středu osobní pohovory se všemi kandidáty. Nový ředitel má nastoupit k 1. lednu,« naznačila další postup mluvčí ministerstva Michaela Jendeková. Dnes v podvečerních hodinách by tak vítěz výběrového řízení, jehož jméno bude komise doporučovat ministrovi, měl být znám. Vedením správy parku Drobil dočasně pověřil Zdeňku Šartnerovou z ekonomické sekce správy. Velkou šanci uspět mají Jiří Mánek či Miloš Juha.

description.hltext_display: Tajner prosi Wierietielnego o umiar
MOTORSPORT: 'Rocketman' to fly in for race duel
description.content:
late model saloon driver Josh Richards will drive the new Rocket Chassis of Tauranga's Maurice Cowling at Baypark. Photo / Supplied.
Christmas Day in New Zealand and some summertime racing at Baypark Speedway takes US late model sedan champion Josh Richards away from a wintry West Virginia.
Richards, 22, will drive the new Rocket Chassis late model of Tauranga's Maurice Cowling at Baypark on December 27, taking on New Zealand super saloon car champ Brent Emerson in a match race duel and the rest of the super saloon car field in regular racing.
Originally known as "Kid Rocket", a nickname that emerged when he began racing late models and more recently as "Rocketman", Richards has recently clinched his second World of Outlaws Late Model Championship.
Richards' journey from his home in Shinnston, West Virginia, to Tauranga will be his first outside of North America.
"Other than racing in Canada a few times I have never been outside of the US even for a holiday," said Richards.
"I know it's going to be very different but it's still racing. This is a great opportunity and I'm very excited.
"I haven't looked at any videos but I've spoken to Maurice about what to expect.
"There seems to be a lot of interest in getting the late model thing started down there so I hope I can help that and show people how exciting these cars are."
The life of a topline late model racer is mainly interstate travel.
"We travel a lot.
We race in Canada and Florida and across as far as Wyoming and into North Dakota and South Dakota and Texas. I raced in 20 states this year."
As well as chasing points on the World of Outlaws tour Richards contests other premier races for the late model division.
"The biggest one is the World 100 (at Eldora, Ohio). About 200 cars show up every year trying to qualify. We ran fifth this year - we were off just a little bit."
Richards began racing at just 14 driving for his father Mark who is is the owner of Rocket Chassis, one of the elite constructors of late model race cars. He won the World of Outlaws "Rookie of the Year"award in 2005 and became the series' youngest champion in 2009.
"Last year I had a phenomenal year and this year was just a little better.
"I clinched the title again but only by four points. That was only two positions in the final race at Charlotte."
Richards ran 79 races this year winning 16 and running in the top 5 in about races. December 27 at Baypark gives him one more chance to add to his 2010 scorecard.
There should be no familiarity issues with the car he'll drive. Cowling's car is 2010 Rocket running in full US specification.
"Mechanically the car is all together. We've had the car running and we only have a few body panels and signwriting to finish," Cowling said.
"Josh gets here on Christmas Day and we'll spend Boxing Day just going through the car with him and getting the seating position sorted."
Richards isn't the only US driver expected at Baypark next Monday night.
With the New Zealand Sprint Car championship looming on January 7-8 - and overseas drivers needing five meetings at New Zealand tracks in order to satisfy eligibility requirements - the Monday meet is also expected to see Sammy Swindell, Tommy Tarlton and US-based Australian driver Peter Murphy in action.
Quality and quantity
The 39th annual Summercross promoted by the Bay of Plenty Motorcycle Club at its Awakaponga MX track next week has attracted a huge entry.
An MX1 class headed by former world championship contender Josh Coppins (Yamaha) as well as national champ Justin McDonald (Honda) of Christchurch and Papamoa international Cody Cooper (Suzuki) had already reached 31 riders when entries closed last week.
The MX2 field is even deeper with a record 76 entries. Qualifying will send nearly half the field into the senior support class with 40 positions available on the starting grid.
Heading up the MX2 entry are Queenstown racer Scott Columb (Suzuki), Tauranga's Peter Broxholme (Honda), Cambridge-based Damien King (Yamaha), Taupo's Brad Groombridge (Suzuki) and Nick Saunders (Kawasaki) and Masterton rider Luke Burkhart (KTM) along with rising stars Cameron Dillon (Honda), Kayne Lamont (Suzuki), John Phillips (Honda) and Jayden Jessup (Yamaha).
The senior MX1 and MX2 classes race along with the 15-21 years Youth MX class, two veterans classes (under and over 45-years) plus Womens MX on Tuesday December 28. There are 31 riders entered in the womens class where Otago teenage sensation Courtney Duncan will be one to watch on her 85cc Yamaha.
The MX1 and MX2 senior classes will race a revised format this year over a total of five heats. Two pairs of quick-fire 10-minute back to-back races separated by a five minute interval are followed by a more traditional 15-minutes plus two laps final.
Summercross organiser Tony Rees says there have been several changes to the Awakaponga track for the 2010 edition of the event.
The grass track extension into a paddock behind the main track isn't being used this year but a section of the freestyle MX track is being called into use near the end of the lap.
"We think the lap will be about 15-20secs shorter than last year but the new layout brings the racing closer to most of the crowd and faster laps means more chance to see the riders," said Rees.
While the main day of action is on Sunday the mini MX and junior classes race on Monday December 27. Again there are full fields in most age groups with about 100 mini riders and 170 juniors including many of the future stars of motocross.
Three-way battle
Tauranga superbike racer Sloan Frost remains embroiled in a three-way battle as the Suzuki International Tri-Series heads into its Boxing Day finale at Wanganui.
While Hamilton's Andrew Stroud (Suzuki) dominated Saturday's second round at Manfeild with two wins ahead of Australian star Robbie Bugden (Suzuki), Frost rode his M1 Motorsport BMW S1000RR to a third and fourth placings in the premier F1 Superbike races.
"Partly I'm very pleased with the weekend and partly I'm a bit frustrated," said Frost.
"Not being able to test on Friday (work commitments meant Frost went straight into Saturday's meeting without testing) means we struggled a bit with the settings on the bike all weekend.
"Because I was going quicker than I had ever gone at Manfeild we were changing little things like the gearing.
"Andrew and Robbie were on fire and broke the track record three times," Frost said.
"Realistically I could have had two thirds but I was lining up a last lap move on Nick Cole when a lapped rider ran me off the track. But I'm still in the hunt and less than 10 points behind the leader."
With the final round on the street circuit at Wanganui there is no chance for any riders to carry out testing. In fact the format offers Frost an opportunity that Suzuki riders Stroud and Bugden won't enjoy.
"At Wanganui you get a really limited amount of track time," said Frost. "But I have also entered the BEARS (British European American Racing) races so it means double the track time to get ready for qualifying.
"It's extra practice and more time to get the bike sorted out before qualifying. And at Wanganui the start is the most important thing so hopefully I can qualify well and make a good start."
Going into the Wanganui finale Stroud leads the Tri-Series with 93 points ahead of Bugden on 90 and Frost with 85. Fourth equal on 54 points are Kawasaki rider Nick Cole (Hamilton) and Whakatane's Tony Rees (Yamaha) who had a much stronger second round at Manfeild with two fifths.

description.hltext_display: Orman Bölge Müdürlüğünden Karla Mücadeleye Destek
description.content: Kütahya Orman Bölge Müdürlüğü ekipleri, iş makineleriyle karla mücadele çalışmalarında Karayolları ve trafik ekiplerine destek oluyor. Müdürlükten yapılan yazılı açıklamada, yurt genelinde havanın yağışlı olması ve kış mevsiminin etkilerinin hissedilmesi dolayısıyla iki ay önce Vali Şükrü Kocatepe başkanlığında yapılan karla mücadele toplantısında alınan kararlar çerçevesinde çalışmaların sürdüğü bildirildi. Karla mücadele edebilmek, gerekli görüldüğü takdirde yolların açık tutulabilmesi ve ulaşımda aksama olmamasını sağlamak amacıyla Bölge Müdürlüğü makine parkında bulunan iki greyderin Karayolları 145. Şube Şefliği emrine verildiği ifade edilen açıklamada, şöyle denildi: 'Genel Müdürlüğümüzün vatandaşla el ele çalışmaları çerçevesinde, Bölge Müdürlüğümüzün iş makineleri de ağır kış şartlarının hüküm sürdüğü günlerde karla mücadele çalışmalarında vatandaşımızın yanında yer alıyor. Ağır kış şartlarında kapanan köy yolları, ilçe yollarının açılması ve kar temizleme çalışmalarına yardımcı olunması doğrultusunda Bölge Müdürlüğümüzün talimatları gereği, Domaniç Orman İşletme Müdürlüğü emrinde bulunan greyder, yoğun kar yağışının olduğu günlerde Domaniç-Tavşanlı ve Domaniç-İnegöl devlet yollarının yol temizleme çalışmalarında kullanılıyor. Domaniç Orman İşletme Müdürlüğü emrinde bulunan greyder, vatandaşımızın mağdur olmaması ve herhangi bir aksaklık oluşmaması için aralıksız olarak karla mücadele çalışmalarına katılıyor ve yolda mahsur kalan araçları çekerek vatandaşlarımıza yardım ediyor. Uygulama ile Karayolları ve trafik ekiplerinin yükü hafiflemiş olup, Orman Teşkilatının yaptığı bu çalışma vatandaşlarımız tarafından memnuniyetle karşılandı.' (SDT-ÜNS) - KÜTAHYA (Anadolu Ajansı) 17 dakika önce.. [2430011]

description.hltext_display: 土耳其中资企业商会安卡拉成立 共21家会员单位
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据中国外交部网站消息，12月21日，土耳其中资企业商会成立大会在安卡拉举行。土耳其劳工部副次长艾哈迈特、驻土耳其大使宫小生及商会会长、理事会成员单位代表出席。
艾哈迈特发表了热情洋溢的致辞，祝贺商会成立，并引用土谚语称，“光芒来自于东方”，表示希望中土经贸合作能够“照亮”世界，成为推动建立公正、普惠、平衡的世界经济秩序的重要力量。
宫小生大使在致辞中表示，居尔总统访华和温家宝总理访土将两国关系提升到一个新的历史高度，中土经贸合作进入快速发展时期，在此背景下，土中资企业商会应运而生，是双边关系发展的必然结果，有重要的实质和象征意义。他祝愿商会运行良好，成为两国经贸关系的重要纽带和推动双边经贸合作的新平台。
土中资企业商会于2010年10月7日经土政府批准正式注册，现有21家会员单位，中国铁建安卡拉分公司担任首任会长。
(责任编辑：赵婷)

description.hltext_display: Police sergeant freed of graft
description.content:
KLANG, (Bernama) - The Sessions Court here today acquitted and discharged a police sergeant on two counts of corruption.
Judge Yong Zarida Sazali ordered the release of G.Kanniappan after finding that the prosecution had failed to prove beyond reasonable doubts the two charges against him.
On the first count, Kanniappan, 56, was charged with soliciting a RM300 bribe from one Kamal Jummu as an inducement to not take against him for being involved in a fight.
The offence was allegedly committed at the Sungai Pelek police station, Sepang, on Sept 18, 2003.
He was also charged with accepting a RM200 bribe from Kamal Jummu, also for the same purpose, at Restoran Aziz, No 45 Jalan Besar Sepang on Sept 19, 2003.
Kanniappan was accused of committing the offence while he was a sergeant at the Crime Investigation Department of the Sepang district police headquarters.
Deputy public prosecutor from the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission, Wong Poi Yoke, prosecuted.

description.hltext_display: Across America: Mall Evacuated in California
V� příštím roce přijdou další korupční kauzy
description.content:
PRAHA – Komunističtí zákonodárci jsou přesvědčeni, že korupční aféra, která momentálně propukla na ministerstvu životního prostředí, nezůstane osamocena.
Dokazují to mimo jiné v minulých dnech odhalené kauzy na ministerstvu obrany. Bezpochyby se podobných kauz na nás v příštím roce chystá daleko víc, uvedla před novináři poslankyně a stínová ministryně životního prostředí Kateřina Konečná (KSČM).
Jedním z důvodu, proč poslanci KSČM nepodpořili a nemohou koaliční vládu Petra Nečase (ODS) podporovat, je podle poslankyně i to, že její další setrvání ohrožuje příjem evropských peněz. »Je podle nás nemožné, aby evropské peníze do ČR, tak jak byly přislíbeny, nadále plynuly vládě, která porušila dvě základní transparentní pravidla. Prvním z nich je, aby to byla vláda protikorupční, druhým, aby to byla vláda, která vládne v právním státě,« uvedla Konečná. Zdůraznila, že obě tyto podmínky byly velmi závažným způsobem zpochybněny. Proto by se prý nedivila, kdyby se EU »velmi opatrně zasadila o to, aby peníze, které z ní plynou do ČR a pomáhají občanům, obcím a krajům, byly do doby, než se korupční kauza na MŽP vyšetří, omezeny«. Konečná si nedovede představit, že lidé, kteří zmíněné peníze do naší země posílají, budou »nadále schopni a ochotni spolupracovat s lidmi, kteří místo toho, aby celou kauzu předali Policii ČR, v případě ministra vnitra Radka Johna to znamená svým podřízeným«, tak kauzy předávají novinářům. Nedovede si ani představit, že lidé, kteří peníze do naší země posílají, budou nadále schopni a ochotni spolupracovat s lidmi, kteří nejsou schopni vysvětlit, jakou hru v celé této pohádce, či hře hrají. »Když už jsem u té pohádky a máme Vánoce, tak zazvonil zvonec a pohádky je konec, milé Věci veřejné. Vy jste nám tady ukazovaly draka jménem korupce. Měl to být hrdý princ Radek John, který draka porazí. Neudělaly jste vůbec nic a my to jediné, co po vás dneska chceme, je, abyste nadále neohrožovaly chod tohoto státu, abyste nadále neohrožovaly možnosti a prostředky, které mají občané tohoto státu možnost získat a abyste již konečně odešly,« vyzvala Konečná zástupce nejmenší vládní strany.

description.hltext_display: Duvar Saatine Saklanan Paranın Çalındığı İddiası
description.content: Kütahya'nın Domaniç ilçesinde, evde kimsenin bulunmadığı sırada, duvar saatinin içine saklanan 7 bin 500 liranın çalındığı iddia edildi. Alınan bilgiye göre, Beyhan Aydın, Hisar Mahallesi'ndeki evini kilitleyip eşiyle halk pazarına gitti. Pazarda yaklaşık iki saat alışveriş yaptıktan sonra evine dönen Aydın çifti, yatak odasının dağınık olduğunu ve duvar saatinin içinde bulunan 7 bin 500 liranın yerinde bulunmadığını fark ederek, durumu polise bildirdi. Beyhan Aydın'ın, Kurban Bayramında sattıkları hayvanların parasını gazete kağıdına sarıp saatin içinde sakladıklarını ve evden başka bir şeyin çalınmadığını söylediği öğrenildi. İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğü Olay Yeri İnceleme ekiplerince evde parmak izi araştırması yapıldığı ve hırsızlığı gerçekleştiren kişi ya da kişilerin bulunması için çalışma başlatıldığı belirtildi. (AÖ-SDT-ÜNS) - KÜTAHYA (Anadolu Ajansı) 18 dakika önce.. [2430010]

description.hltext_display: Trener, który nie jest trenerem
中意金享年年B保障理财计划”上市
description.content: � � � � 中意人寿于12月1日，在其银行保险� 道正式推出新产品——“中意金享年年B保障理财综合计划”。它以保值为基础，增值为目� �，将� 统寿险的保障本质与“理财”理念相结合，通过中长期的理财规划，在为客户提供保障型保险产品的同时，满足客户资金的保值与增值。� � � � “中意金享年年B”投保年龄范围广泛，适合出生满30天至57周岁的人群；保障期间长，可提供保障至80周岁。同时，该产品设计有3年、5年、10年、15年和20年等不同的期交交费方式，客户可视自身的经济情况，灵活选择。� � � � “中意金享年年B”的保障全面、返还快，且保障和受益时间长。客户自投保后满一年，即可每年领取保险金额的15%作为生存保险金，直到80周岁。快捷的回报，帮助客户随心支配，演绎精彩的长寿� 忧岁月。高达18倍保额的意外身故保障金则是该产品在保障方面的特色之一，同时，如被保险人不幸遭遇全残，还可享受豁免保费的贴心关爱。� � � � “中意金享年年B”在保险合同期满后，还将返还客户已交纳的全部主险保险费，真正做到资金保值不缩水。同时，客户每年还可分享中意人寿的分红业务经营成果，红利领取方式可选择现金领取、累积生息、抵交保费等，灵活多� �。� � � � 两款特色鲜明的附� 险，更为“中意金享年年B”增色不少。“中意附� 乐怡重大疾病保险”，为客户提供长期的重大疾病保障，特别是为重疾高发年龄段客户提供贴心保障，保障范围涵盖有20种� �心高发重大疾病。该款附� 险的特色在于“二次重疾赔付”保障，弥补了� 统重疾险“一次患病保障终止”的缺憾。� � � � 另外，针对“患者康复机会和生存率不断提高”的现状，该款附� 险让客户在确认给付“首次重大疾病保险金”的半年后� 需体检，就可再次获得保障，享受2次给付保险责任的机会，帮助被保险人更� 专注于治疗和康复，免除后顾之忧。� � � � 另一款附� 险“中意附� 乐怡定期寿险”，兼顾全残与身故保障，提供有丰厚的身故保险金、全残豁免保险费和全残提前给付等保障。两款附� 险均可提供保障至80周岁。� � � � 投保示例：� � � � 30岁的中女士经过不懈的努力，事业蒸蒸日上，她计划购买一份保险为现在的生活多一份保障，为应对日益� 剧的通货膨胀多一份安心，为自己未来每一年的生活多一些准备，实现多一些的梦想。� � � � 经过专家的建议，中女士选择了“中意金享年年B保障理财综合计划”。每年交费33,630元，交费20年( 主险保额48720元，附� 乐怡定寿和附� 乐怡重疾保额均为10万元)，享受高达至80周岁的保障。中女士可享有如下保险利益：� � � � 1、中女士每年领取基本保险金额的15%，即7308元生存金，直至身故或年满80周岁，累计最多可获得生存金365,400元及年金累积利息。� � � � 2、如果中女士在保单生效1年后且60周岁前全残，将豁免主险保险费，同时得到10万的提前给付保险金。� � � � 3、如果不幸身故，将获得10万元的身故保障(首年非� 意外身故返还附� 定寿的保费)，另外退还累计主险已付的保险费。如果60周岁前意外身故，则额外给付50万元。� � � � 4、如果中女士在保单生效1年后，不幸患上保险范围内的重大疾病，将获得10万元赔付；在确定给付10万元赔偿的半年后将� 须体检，便可再次得到保障。

description.hltext_display: 汇丰人寿推出医疗保障组合计划
description.content: � � � � 日前，汇丰人寿推出尊享人生医疗保障组合计划。其中包括汇丰尊享医疗保险、汇丰附� 尊享海外医疗保险、汇丰汇享连年两全保险、汇丰鸿禧年年年金保险四款可组合产品。� � � � 该计划可带来多元化利益保障：第一，高额医疗保障。包括高达800万元的国内(含港澳台地区)医疗保障，涵盖住院医疗、手术和门诊之费用。第二，涵盖境内外知名医院的医疗服务安排、严重疾病的二次诊疗服务在内的高端医疗服务。第三，高额家庭责任保障，如子女教育成长金、创业金和置业金的领取、父母终身养老年金的领取等。

description.hltext_display: 中英人寿推新年金产品
description.content: � � � � 日前，中英人寿保险有限公司携手专业中介机构大童保险有限公司，联袂推出第一款回归养老本质的年金产品“好儿郎”年金保险产品(分红型)。“好儿郎”是中英联合具备强大市场影响力的专业中介机构大童保险首次共同� �发的一款精品产品。相比市场其它公司的同类产品，“好儿郎”投保范围更广泛，凡出生满30天—60周岁的人均可投保；其缴费方式也非常灵活。� � � � 中国人寿财险获40亿元增资� � � � 南都讯 记者王梅丽 中国人寿董事会21日公告称，财产险公司目前注册资本为40亿元，中国人寿集团出资24亿元，� 60%，中国人寿出资16亿元，� 40%。此次增资，中国人寿和中国人寿集团计划向财产险公司增资40亿元，中国人寿拟出资16亿元，中国人寿集团拟出资24亿元。增资后财产险公司注册资本金将达到80亿元，中国人寿和中国人寿集团持股比例保持不变。

description.hltext_display: “金恒利”两全保险 开启个人理财新篇�
description.content: � � � � 经历了严重的金融危机后，目前全球经济已走出衰退低谷，中国则走在世界经济复苏的前列。但伴随着我国经济增长的回升，通货膨胀问题也逐渐显现出来。在此背景下，百姓投资理念倾向注重本金安全、收益稳定增长，以实现财富保值增值，应对通货膨胀风险。� � � � 保险公司分红险的特点是提供保障的同时，保证百姓的资金安全，安享专业投资收益，不论利率上升还是下降，资本市场如何变动，分红险的收益都能稳定在一定的水平。� 此分红险成为抵御资本市场动荡和通货膨胀风险的主力产品。� � � � 如长城保险金恒利产品提供了四重高额风险保障，包括1倍普通身故保障，额外2倍公交意外身故保障，每年有效保额还随年度红利不断增� ，同时终了红利以关爱金形式提高保障额度，让我们从容规划人身风险。� � � � 金恒利设计有3年和5年两种交费方式，可以灵活选择。交费后一次领取的理财方式，也更符合相当一部分普通百姓的理财� 惯。� � � � 金恒利提供三重收益，包括以满期金为代表的固定收益，以保额分红带来的年度红利和终了红利为代表的双重浮动收益，使投资既安全，又有很好的成长预期。金恒利可以为家人提供� 风险的资金保全方式，让� 安心享受未来的生活，保证美好的生活品质。

description.hltext_display: Astrorok končí zatměním Měsíce
description.content:
4. ledna dojde k částečnému zatmění Slunce, měsíční zatmění nás čekají 15. června a 10. prosince 2011
PRAHA – Včera ráno bylo možné spatřit kratičkou část zatmění Měsíce. 21. prosince nastalo po více než dva a půl roku úplné zatmění Měsíce, z něhož ovšem nad naším územím proběhl pouze počátek částečné fáze, protože krátce po začátku zatmění Měsíc zapadl pod obzor.
V celém průběhu bylo toto zatmění pozorovatelné z východní části Tichého oceánu, ze Severní Ameriky a Arktidy. U nás začalo v 6.29 hodin nízko nad severozápadním obzorem, kdy Měsíc začal vstupovat do zemského polostínu.
Poslední u nás pozorovatelné zatmění Měsíce nastalo 31. prosince 2009 a bylo částečné. Příští u nás pozorovatelné zatmění Měsíce nastane 15. června 2011. Půjde o úplné měsíční zatmění, při kterém Měsíc projde přímo středem zemského stínu a fáze úplného zatmění tak potrvá velmi dlouho - přes 100 minut.
V r. 2011 budeme moci z území ČR pozorovat celkem tři zatmění. 4. ledna dojde k částečnému zatmění Slunce. Měsíční zatmění nás čekají 15. června (u nás jako úplné) a 10. prosince (u nás jako částečné).
»Zatmění Měsíce vzniká tehdy, dostane-li se Měsíc do zemského stínu, který Země vrhá do prostoru. Měsíc se proto musí nacházet na protilehlé straně oblohy než Slunce. Při zatmění je tedy Měsíc vždy v úplňku. Ne při každém úplňku ale nastává zatmění Měsíce. Měsíc většinou zemský stín mine. K tomu, aby zatmění Měsíce nastalo, musí být splněny dvě základní podmínky: kromě toho, že Měsíc musí být v úplňku, musí se ještě nacházet v blízkosti tzv. uzlu své dráhy. Rovina oběhu Měsíce okolo Země je totiž vůči rovině, ve které obíhá Země okolo Slunce, skloněna o úhel přibližně pět stupňů. Tuto rovinu měsíční dráha protíná ve dvou bodech – uzlech. Poloha uzlů se mění ve zhruba 18leté periodě nazývané Saros. Na rozdíl od slunečních zatmění, kdy měsíční stín zasáhne jen malou část zemského povrchu a sluneční zatmění je pak pozorovatelné jen z malé části Země, lze měsíční zatmění pozorovat z celé k Měsíci právě přivrácené zemské polokoule, tedy z kteréhokoliv místa na zemském povrchu, které má v době měsíčního zatmění Měsíc právě nad obzorem,« uvedl pro Haló noviny Pavel Suchan z Astronomického ústavu AV ČR a České astronomické společnosti.

description.hltext_display: CHP Domaniç İlçe Başkanlığındaki İstifalar
description.content: CHP Domaniç İlçe Başkanı Cemal Kocabaş'ın istifasıyla boşalan göreve, Ramazan Öztürk getirildi. Alınan bilgiye göre, eski CHP İlçe Başkanı Cemal Kocabaş dahil 8 asil ve 3 yedek üyeden oluşan yönetim kurulu, geçen haftalarda topluca istifa etmişti. CHP İl Başkanı Ali Rıza Muslu başkanlığındaki ekip tarafından yapılan çalışma sonucu parti üyesi Ramazan Öztürk, yeni yönetim kurulunu oluşturması amacıyla görevlendirildi. İl Başkanlığının sunduğu yeni yönetim kurulu listesi, CHP Genel Başkan Yardımcısı Gürsel Tekin tarafından onaylanarak İl Başkanlığına bildirildi. Ramazan Öztürk başkanlığındaki yeni yönetim kurulunda asil üyeler Kadir Erkan, Yılmaz Çelik, Atilla Çetin, Mehmet Çiçek, Turgut Açıkgöz, Yahya Kocaağa, Mağruf Okumuş, yedek üyeler Mehmet Ertürk, İlker Kahraman, Yusuf Vural yer aldı. (AÖ-SDT-ÜNS) - KÜTAHYA (Anadolu Ajansı) 18 dakika önce.. [2430009]

description.hltext_display: Therese Rein stuck in snowy London (AAP)
description.content:
Foreign Minister Kevin Rudd's wife Therese Rein is one of thousands of stranded commuters held up by icy conditions in London and at risk of missing Christmas at home.
Mr Rudd said his wife was expected home on Thursday but with flights cancelled after big snowfalls in England's capital forcing flight cancellations, she is trying to find an alternative way home.
Asked by reporters in Sydney why she was stuck in London, the foreign minister replied: "Snow, it's the white stuff, comes out of the sky, goes phoom like that".
But, Mr Rudd said, her presents would be under the tree when she did return."So, I've told her we're just going to defer Christmas in case she doesn't make it," he said."We'll make sure that her Santa stocking is preserved.
"But for all those Australians who are stuck at the moment, either trying to get there or trying to get out, it's a tough and rough time at the moment.
"And so, hopefully, the weather will clear and, hopefully, we can get people home soon, including Therese."
Cancellations have stranded thousands of travellers, affecting flights internationally - and the big freeze is tipped to continue.

description.hltext_display: Four injured Thai tourists return to Thailand
description.content:
IPOH, (Bernama) - Four of the 10 Thai tourists injured in a road accident two days ago south of here were taken back to Thailand today, according to Hatyai Hospital Consultant Choowit Jiranivatanont.
He said three of them were taken by ambulance to Bukit Kayu Hitam for transfer to a Thai ambulance for the onward journey to the Hatyai hospital and one was taken to Subang to fly back in one of the two C-130 aircraft of the Royal Thai Air Force (RTAF).
The Thai government had sent the two aircraft to take back the bodies of the 25 Thai tourists who were killed in the accident at Km15 of the Cameron Highlands-Simpang Pulai Road at 11.40 am on Monday.
Two Malaysians, the driver of the double-decker bus and the tourist guide, also died in the accident which occurred when the bus was heading from Cameron Highlands to Kuala Lumpur.
Choowit said the six other injured Thai tourists, under treatment at the Raja Permaisuri Bainun Hospital here, were not fit to travel.
Thai Ambassador to Malaysia, Thana Duangrana, expressed his deepest gratitude to the Malaysian government for assistance in sending back the injured tourists and the bodies.
"It will be difficult for us to make the necessary arrangements without the assistance of the Malaysian government," he said.
Asked if the embassy was planning to take legal action over the accident, Thana said it was up to the victims' relatives as it was considered a private matter.
"But we will provide the necessary assistance. Thais love your country very much and they like to come here. To face such a situation (accident) is very difficult for everyone," he said.
On the remaining six tourists at the hospital, Thana said they would continue to receive treatment here until they recovered.

description.hltext_display: Trener Skry: Czegoś znów nam zabrakło
İzmir 2011 i Karşılamaya Hazır
description.content: Tolga Albay - İbrahim Uzun - İzmir'de oteller ve eğlence yerleri 2011'i evlerinden farklı bir ortamda karşılamak isteyen konukları için alternatif eğlence programları hazırladı. Oteller, değişik programlar ve fiyat seçenekleriyle, 60 ile 250 lira arasında değişen fiyatlarla ağırlayacağı konuklarını bekliyor. İzmir ve Çeşme'deki oteller, konuklarına, sadece yeni yıla 'merhaba' deme fırsatı sunmakla sınırlı kalmıyor, bazı oteller, tatilin hafta sonunu da kapsaması nedeniyle uygun fiyata konaklamalı seçeneklerle de kapılarını konuklarına açıyor. Kentin önde gelen otellerinden Swiss Otel Grand Efes'in, bu yıl yetişkinlerin yanında çocuklar ve gençler için de farklı etkinlikler düzenlediği belirtildi. Otelin 9. katında bulunan Equinox'ta gitar, keman ve vokal triosu, havuzaltı restoranı Aquarium'da Sirtaki grubu ve canlı Yunan ezgileri, Sky Bar'da DJ Cemal Erkaya'nın performansıyla yeni yılı karşılayacak olan otelde farklı menülerle oluşturulan seçeneklerin 139 liradan başlayan fiyatlarla sunulacağı ifade edildi. Yılbaşı gecesi otelde konaklamak isteyen misafirleri için ise çift kişilik 119 avroluk özel paket hazırlandığı da belirtildi. İzmir'de Yılbaşı gecesi etkinliklerinde klasikler arasında yer alan Hilton Oteli'nde de İzmir Körfezi'nin manzarasına hakim Windows On The Bay Restoran kutlamaların ana merkezini oluşturacak. Restoranda Grup Pan ve Ceren Niron eşliğinde gerçekleşecek olan 'Yeni Yıla Hoşgeldin Partisi'nde özel Yılbaşı menüsü ve limitsiz standart yerli içki için kişi başı 250 liralık fiyat belirlendi. Otelin aynı katındaki Windows on the Bay Bar'da ise yeni yıl Desen Yıldız ve Orkestrası'nın canlı performansıyla düzenlenecek partide karşılanacak. Bu etkinliğe kişi başı, limitsiz yerli içkiyle 95 liraya katılım sağlanabileceği ifade edildi. Otelde yeni yıla özel konaklama ücreti ise tek ve çift kişilik oda için 99 lira olarak belirlendi. Öte yandan Hilton'un evlere paket servis yoluyla sunduğu hindi menüsünün kilogramının 45 liradan satılacağı kaydedildi. Kentin yenilenen oteli Kaya İzmir Termal Resort, yeni yıla Altay ve Sedat Yüce ile girecek. Altay'ın sahne alacağı Kaya Convention Center'daki gala yemeği için 169 lira ile 209 lira arası, Sedat Yüce'nin sahne alacağı Venüs Roof'ta ise 139 lira ile 149 lira arasında fiyat belirlendi. Crowne Plaza Oteli'nde, Gülay Eralp'in sahne alacağı gala için kişi başı 195 liralık fiyat belirlendi. 1 gece 2 kişilik konaklama paket fiyatıysa 680 lira olarak sunuldu. İzmir'de yeni yılı dışarıda karşılamak isteyenlerin en fazla tercih ettiği Kordon'da da eğlence yerleri de yeni yıla hazırlanıyor. Özel ışıklandırmalarla süslenen Kordon'da bulunan eğlence mekanları yeni yılda 60 ile 90 lira arasında seçenekler sunacak. - Çeşme'DEKİ OTELLER- İzmir ve çevresinin en önemli turistik merkezleri olan Çeşme ve Kuşadası'ndaki tesisler de yeni yıl hazırlıklarını tamamladı. İlçede kışın açık olan otellerde doluluk oranının bu yıl yüzde 100 olması bekleniyor. Çeşme Turistik Otelciler Birliği Başkanı Veysi Öncel, bu yıl Çeşme'ye özellikle İstanbul'dan yoğun ilgi olduğunu, otellerin Yılbaşı için doluluk oranlarının şimdiden yüzde 70'lere ulaştığını dile getirdi. Otellerin genelde canlı müzik ve özel partiler hazırladığını, ayrıca konaklamalı paketler hazırladığını ifade eden Öncel, 'Çeşme yılbaşında özellikle Termal zenginliği nedeniyle tercih ediliyor. Bu yıl yılbaşının cumartesi gününe rastlaması nedeniyle 2 günlük paket turlar hazırlandı. Misafirlerin eğlenmenin yanı sıra dinlenebileceği destinasyonlar hazırlandı. Şu ana kadar gelen ilgiden çok memnunuz. Yılbaşı gecesi açık olan otellerde yüzde 100 doluluk bekliyoruz' dedi. Öncel, Yılbaşı gecesinde ilçedeki otellerin misafirlerine 75 ile 300 lira arasında seçenekler sunduğunu kaydetti. - KUŞADASI DA YENİ YILA HAZIR- Kuşadası'nda, turistik tesisler Yılbaşı için tüm hazırlıklarını tamamlıyor. İlçedeki Yıldızlı oteller hazırladıkları zengin mönülü balolar ve sahneye çıkacak ünlü isimlerle yılbaşını karşılamaya hazırlanıyor. İyi geçen 2010 turizm sezonu ve Kurban Bayramı tatilinde otellerin yüzde 100 yerli turistle dolmasından sonra Kuşadası'ndaki oteller yeni yıldan da umutlu. Çeşitli kampanyalar ile yılbaşına eğlenerek girmek isteyen tatilcilere cazip seçenekler sunan işletmeler, zengin menü seçenekleri, uygun ödeme kolaylıkları ve taksit imkanlarıyla dikkati çekiyorlar. Haftalar öncesinden gazete reklamlarıyla büyük promosyona giren turistik tesisler, yılbaşında oluşturdukları paket programlarla yüzde 90 doluluğa ulaşmayı hedefliyor. TÜRSAB Kuşadası Bölgesel Yürütme Kurulu (BYK) Başkanı Bülent İlbahar, Kuşadası'nda hizmet veren ve faal durumda olan 4 ve 5 Yıldızlı oteller başta olmak üzere eğlence mekanlarının hazırlıklarını tamamlamak üzere olduğunu belirterek, ünlü sanatçılarla takviye edilen programların ilgi göreceğine inandığını kaydetti. Kuşadası'nda hizmet veren 5 Yıldızlı oteller arasında Yılbaşı için Alkoçlar Adakule otel 2 gece 3 gün konaklamalı her şey dahil paket program kapsamında kişi başı, gala programı dahil 229-249 lira arasında fiyat uygulaması ve taksit imkanı sunuyor. Otelde Yılbaşı gala programında Grup Yankı ile Zinet Sali sahne alacak. Fedon'nun sahne alacağı Kuşadası Korumar Otel'de yarım pansiyon konaklamaya geceliği 199-219 lira arasında değişen oda fiyatı ödenecek. Otel ayrıca ikinci seçenek olarak her şey dahil 3 gün paket program dahilinde konaklamak isteyenlere 209-229 lira arasında fiyat seçeneği sunuyor. Yılbaşına Aldo'yu dinleyerek Pine Bay Otelde girmek isteyenler, 2 gece konaklama zorunlu paket program için kişi başı gecelik 140 ila 180 lira arasında ödeyecek. Kutsi'nin sahne alacağı Sürmeli Otelde tek gece gala yemeği dahil 299 lira ücret ödenecek. Yeni yıla Kuşadası Belediyesinin İsmail Cem Barış ve Dostluk Meydanında düzenleyeceği partiyle girmek isteyenler, havai fişek gösterileri eşliğinde Atiye ve Cem Doğangil'i dinleme imkanı bulacak. (TLA-İU-MV-BŞK-OSM) - İZMİR (Anadolu Ajansı) 18 dakika önce.. [2430008]

description.hltext_display: Boj o byznys s pojištěním imigrantů
description.content:
PRAHA – Proti odírání imigrantů pojišťovnami poskytujícími jim povinné komerční zdravotní pojištění protestovalo včera v Praze před Poslaneckou sněmovnou happeningovou formou asi tucet aktivistů a sympatizantů občanské iniciativy ProAlt.
Akce se konala u příležitosti projednávání návrhů novely zákona o pobytu cizinců, v němž se, jak prohlásil mluvčí ProAltu Pavel Čižinský, odráží nejen snaha pojišťoven dosahovat vysokého zisku, ale boj lobbistických skupin o to, zda má být osou zdravotní péče komplexní či neodkladná.
Odírání imigrantů Čižinský dokumentoval na záměru zavést pro imigranty žádající dlouhodobý pobyt povinnost zaplatit komerční zdravotní pojištění předem v částce zhruba 3000 Kč/měsíc. Protože dlouhodobý pobyt se poskytuje minimálně dva roky, musel by imigrant složit 72 000 Kč, v případě kupř. čtyřčlenné rodiny se to blíží 300 tisícům korun. Přitom ale, když by např. získal trvalý pobyt, a tím pádem by byl ze zákona zařazen do systému veřejného pojištění všech občanů, nebylo by mu vráceno zaplacené nevyčerpané pojistné. Když by tudíž zmíněná rodina zaplatila na dva roky a po roce získala trvalý pobyt, 150 tisíc by propadlo pojišťovně… Pojistná sazba přitom neodpovídá tomu, že imigranti přicházejí do ČR za prací, tj. v produktivním věku, mladší, v lepším zdravotním stavu, než je průměr populace od dětí po seniory, uvedl mluvčí a poukázal na to, že vyšší náklady na péči by se týkaly až starších cizinců, kteří již spíše budou mít trvalý pobyt, a tedy jejich zdravotní péče bude hrazena z veřejného pojištění. Mluvčí též poukázal na již existující a novelou neodstraněný paradox, že cizinec musí zdravotní zařízení (akutně) ošetřit, ale pojišťovna nemusí výlohy proplatit, pokud s ním nebude mít smlouvu.
Čižinský, který se obrátil otevřeným listem na ministra vnitra, vyjádřil obavu i o transparentnost a odbornou kompetentnost projednávání novely a vyslovil se pro zařazení cizinců do systému veřejného zdravotního pojištění.

description.hltext_display: Qld strategy for cutting landfill waste released
description.content:
The Queensland Government says it wants to cut the amount of waste going to landfill by 50 per cent within a decade.
It has released its final Waste Strategy, which includes $150 million in funding to help businesses change their behaviour.
Sustainability Minister Kate Jones says up to 5,000 so-called 'green jobs' will be created by 2020.
"Queenslanders send more to landfill than any other state and Queensland generates more waste than anywhere else in the country," she said.
"Instead of doing the right thing in Queensland, that is reusing and recycling resources, we've been sending them to landfill."

event_or_fact.property: Queenslanders send more to landfill than any other state and Queensland generates more waste than anywhere else in the country; Instead of doing the right thing in Queensland, that is reusing and recycling resources, we've been sending them to landfill.

description.hltext_display: Tire de Eşinden Ayrılan Kadının Yaşam Mücadelesi
description.content: İzmir'in Tire ilçesinde, eşinden ayrıldıktan sonra, çocuğunu boşandığı eşine bırakmak zorunda kalan tek başına yaşam mücadelesi veriyor. Tire'de yaklaşık 2 yıl önce eşinden ayrılan Zeliha Ç, AA muhabirine yaptığı açıklamada, eşinden boşanmasının ardından baba evine dönmek istediğini, ancak ailesi kabul etmeyince ortada kaldığını söyledi. Herhangi bir işi ve geliri olmadığını, zaman zaman iş bulduğunda evlere temizliğe gittiğini anlatan Zeliha Ç, bu nedenle oğluna da bakamadığını ve onu boşandığı eşine bırakmak zorunda kaldığını ifade etti. Zeliha Ç, oturduğu evin kirasını ödeyemediğini, evinde ne bir koltuk ne de bir yatak olduğunu dile getirerek, 'Sadece halının üzerine serdiğim bir battaniyenin içinde bu soğuk kış günlerinde uyumaya çalışıyorum. Yardım için Kaymakamlığa gittim. Sosyal Yardımlaşma Vakfı'na defalarca form doldurup bıraktım, fakat herhangi bir şekilde bir sonuç çıkmadı. Bir kömür yardımı bile alamadım' dedi. Önceleri hayatını tarlalarda çalıştığını, ancak geçirdiği kalp rahatsızlığı nedeniyle artık ağır işler yapamadığını anlatan Zeliha Ç, kimseden sadaka istemediğini, tek dileğinin çalışabileceği düzenli bir iş olduğunu söyledi. (SA-UFK-BAH) - İZMİR (Anadolu Ajansı) 18 dakika önce.. [2430007]

description.hltext_display: Ještě k letišti Vodochody
description.content:
Již několik dlouhých měsíců se táhne spor mezi vlastníky Aera Vodochody a občany okolních měst a vesnic.
Společnost Penta od svého záměru přebudovat podnikové letiště na mezinárodní nechce ustoupit a pokračuje ve svém snažení.
Tato skutečnost vyvolala mezi občany a členy samospráv obcí, kterých by se provoz letiště přímo dotkl, velkou negativní odezvu. Obce se sdružily do hnutí STOP LETIŠTI a společně se snaží zabránit rozšíření letiště. Čeho se nejvíce obávají? V první řadě je to hluk, který jak startující, tak i přistávající letouny vydávají, dále je to i zhoršení životního prostředí způsobené nejenom letadly, ale i rozšířením silniční dopravy, která bude logicky na provoz mezinárodního letiště navazovat. Například v Kralupech nad Vltavou je dopravní situace již nyní tragická. Slibovaný obchvat města je opět odsunut do neznáma a situace je pro město neřešitelná.
Starosty dotčených obcí, občany i založené hnutí před volbami do sněmovny slovně podpořily v jejich snažení všechny kandidující strany i konkrétní poslanci, slíbili, že změnu na letišti Vodochody nepodpoří.
Proběhlo již několik veřejných besed i za účasti současných poslanců. Např. K. Klasnová (VV), M. Šnajdr (ODS), S. Grospič (KSČM) a další. Na těchto besedách zazněly otevřeně hlasy pro i proti, vždy s převahou názorů, které se staví proti.
V minulých dnech byla ze strany provozovatele dokončena ekologická studie vlivu na životní prostředí EIA a byla předána k posouzení ministerstvu životního prostředí. Současně v pátek 10. 12. 2010 předali zástupci obcí své připomínky k této studii před budovou ministerstva náměstkovi ministra životního prostředí, panu Vrbíkovi. Původně přislíbil účast přímo - dnes už bývalý ministr Drobil - ale ústy svého náměstka se omluvil, že musel jet řešit situaci na Ostravsko.
Dnes je vše již v rukou úředníků. Pokud neshledají žádné závady v předložené studii, pak letiště asi bude – bez ohledu na názory občanů a na předvolební sliby politiků. Jsem zvědav, jak se potom zachovají politici, zejména ti, kteří jsou dnes ve vládní koalici. Kdo ví, zda již nebylo rozhodnuto někde jinde a již mnohem dříve?
Stanislav HEJDUK,
člen Zastupitelstva města Kralupy nad Vltavou
22. 12. 2010Stanislav HEJDUK
Čtenářské hodnocení

description.hltext_display: True Grit
description.content:
It's the 1870s and Mattie Ross (HAILEE STEINFELD) is a 14-year-old Arkansas girl who's mature beyond both her age and the era in which she lives. She puts her determination to use in wanting to hire someone to find and capture Tom Chaney (JOSH BROLIN), a handyman who's just killed her father.
No one takes her seriously, including Texas marshal La Boeuf (MATT DAMON) who's been tracking Chaney for a long time and over great distances following the man having also murdered a Texas senator. He believes that Chaney is traveling somewhere in hostile Indian territory and may have met up with his cohort, Lucky Ned Pepper (BARRY PEPPER).
La Boeuf wants nothing of her offer to hire someone to find her father's killer and bring him to justice, a sentiment shared by Rooster Cogburn (JEFF BRIDGES), a federal marshal with a gritty reputation of getting the job done but usually with a high body count. Despite his demeanor, Mattie is sure Cogburn is the man for the job and thus hires him with the condition that she travel along with him.
He agrees, and leaves the next morning, not with her by his side, but La Boeuf who wants to take Chaney back to Texas for a handsome reward. Mattie will have no part of that or being left behind. Accordingly, she rides out and finds both, and then continues with them on their manhunt. From that point on, they travel across potentially dangerous lands, following leads they hope will take them to Chaney.

description.hltext_display: Pengorabanan Seorang Ibu
陕西省将关闭47处煤矿 关闭煤矿须停止生产活动
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
新华网西安12月22日电（记者许祖华）经陕西省政府研究决定，陕西将在6月底前关闭榆林市37处煤矿的基础上，再将47处煤矿列为2010年第二批关闭煤矿实施关闭。公布关闭煤矿必须立即停止一切生产活动。
据了解，此次关闭的煤矿包括渭南市34处、铜川市8处、延安市4处、咸阳市1处。
陕西省要求，煤矿关闭工作由县级政府（市属煤矿由市政府）负责组织实施。关闭矿井必须达到《国务院关于预防煤矿生产安全事故的特别规定》的关闭标准。

description.hltext_display: Kadın Eliyle Mozaik Tasarımı Projesi
description.content:
Ýsmihan Özgüven - Hatay'da kadýn istihdamýnýn desteklenmesi amacýyla baþlatýlan 'Kadýn Eliyle Mozaik Tasarýmý' projesi kapsamýnda iþsiz 80 kadýn mozaik yapýmýný öðreniyor.
Proje Koordinatörü Engin Teksöz, AA muhabirine yaptýðý açýklamada, Sýnýrlý Sorumlu Antakya Esnaf ve Sanatkarlar Kredi Kefalet Kooperatifinin öncülüðünde Antakya Belediyesi, Antakya Ticaret ve Sanayi Odasý (ATSO), Hatay Esnaf ve Sanatkarlarý Odalarý Birliði (HESOB) ve Halk Eðitim Merkezi'nin ortaklýðýnda hazýrladýklarý 'Kadýn Eliyle Mozaik Tasarýmý' Projesinin Avrupa Birliði'nden (AB) kabul gördüðünü söyledi.
Kadýnlarýn istihdam edilebilirliklerinin artýrýlmasýna ve iþ gücü piyasasýna dahil olmalarýna katký saðlamak amacýyla Avrupa Birliði'nden 335 bin 492 Avro hibe almaya hak kazanan proje kapsamýnda, kasým ayýndan bu yana ÝÞKUR'da kaydý bulunan 80 iþsiz kadýna eðitim verilmeye baþlandýðýný ifade eden Teksöz, kursiyerlere öncelikle taban mozaiði varlýðýyla Tunus Bardo Müzesi'nden sonra dünyada ikinci sýrada yer alan Hatay Arkeoloji Müzesi'ni gezdirdiklerini kaydetti.
Müzedeki eserleri gören kursiyerlerin teorik eðitimlerin ardýndan basit motiflerle çalýþma yapmaya baþladýklarýnýn altýný çizen Teksöz, þöyle devam etti:
'Kadýnlarýmýz, aldýklarý eðitimle mozaik yapýmýnda kullanýlan taþlarýn nasýl kesileceðini, bunlara nasýl þekil verileceðini ve iþin inceliklerini öðrendi. Zaman kaybetmeden basit motif çalýþmalarý yapmaya baþladýk. Kursiyerlerimiz adeta bir usta gibi gibi çalýþýyor ve hazýrladýðýmýz örnek mozaik çalýþmalarýn benzerlerini yapýyor. Ayrýca Arkeoloji Müzesi'nde bulunan çalýþmalarýn da benzerlerini yapmaya çalýþarak maharetlerini ortaya kokuyorlar.'
Kadýn istihdamýnýn desteklenmesi ve onlarýn iþ gücü piyasasýna daha fazla katýlmasýný saðlamak amacýyla baþlattýklarý proje kapsamýnda kursa gelen kadýnlara bir yýl boyunca eðitim verileceðini ifade eden Teksöz, proje sonunda kentte, kursiyerlerin yaptýðý çalýþmalarýn yer aldýðý bir sergi açacaklarýný söyledi.
- MOZAÝKLER Ýspanya'DA SERGÝLENECEK-
'Kadýn Eliyle Mozaik Tasarýmý' Projesiyle istihdamýn yaný sýra tarih ve doðal güzelliklerin yoðun olarak bulunduðu kentin tanýtýmýna da katký saðlayacaklarýný vurgulayan Teksöz, 'Kentteki sergimizin ardýndan kadýnlarýn büyük bir emek harcayarak yaptýðý çalýþmalarý Ýspanya'da sergileyeceðiz. Mozaiklerimizle ünlü kentimizin adýný kadýnlar sayesinde yurt dýþýnda duyuracaðýz. Bu þekilde kentimizin turizmine de katký saðlamayý hedefliyoruz' diye konuþtu.
Projeye katýlan kadýnlara iþ de bulacaklarýný ifade eden Teksöz, ayrýca Hatay Valiliði iþbirliðinde bir köy belirlenerek 'Mozaik Köy' projesini hayata geçireceklerini söyledi.
Proje eðitmeni Hasan Aksoy, kadýn kursiyerlerin kýsa sürede çok þey öðrendiðini ve güzel eserler ortaya çýkardýðýný kaydetti.
Kursiyer Sevgi Kavasoðlu, mozaik çalýþma yapmanýn zor ama çok zevkli olduðunu belirtti.
Kursun ardýndan kendi atölyesini açmak istediðini ifade eden Ýrkiye Süren ise ayrýca yapacaklarý çalýþmalarýn Ýspanya'da sergilenecek olmasýnýn da kendilerini çok heyecanlandýrdýðýný söyledi.
(ÝSÖ-RÞ-ERS-OSM) - HATAY (Anadolu Ajansý) 20 dakika önce.. [2430006]

description.hltext_display: Tajnosti kolem výroby aut
description.content:
MLADÁ BOLESLAV - Automobilka Škoda Auto uvažuje o tom, že za několik let přestane ve svém závodě ve Vrchlabí vyrábět celá auta. Mohly by se tam pak vyrábět třeba motory, převodovky nebo přední části aut.
»Budoucnost výrobního závodu může být dlouhodobě zajištěna jen v případě, že se v něm vyrábí za konkurenceschopných podmínek. Plán na takovou výrobu ve Vrchlabí připravujeme,« řekl ČTK předseda představenstva Škoda Auto Winfried Vahland s tím, že plán uskuteční až za několik let.
V nejbližších letech se bude ve Vrchlabí zatím vyrábět model Roomster, který sem přesunou na počátku příštího roku ze závodu v Kvasinách. Výrobní kapacity, které se tímto krokem v Kvasinách uvolní, budou využity k navýšení výroby modelů Yeti a Superb, které se zde montují již nyní, řekl Haló novinám mluvčí automobilky Rudolf Dreithaler. O jak velké navýšení půjde, však odmítl uvést. Stejně tak nechtěl říci, zda tento krok povede k propouštění nebo naopak k přijímání zaměstnanců.
V závodě ve Vrchlabí nyní pracuje kolem 1070 zaměstnanců, na konci roku 2007 tady pracovalo přes 1205 lidí. Na konci minulého roku to bylo o 155 méně. Teď by podle šéfa podnikových odborů Jaroslava Povšíka naopak měl závod zase přijmout okolo stovky pracovníků.
Ve Vrchlabí by se mohla vyrábět vedle modelu Roomster například převodovka DQ200, napsal včera server Novinky.cz. Na Světové koncernové radě Volkswagenu za to podle serveru lobboval předseda odborů právě Povšík. V dlouhodobém horizontu automobilka prověřuje další možnosti, co ve Vrchlabí vyrábět. Mohly by to být například komponenty v podobě motorů nebo převodovek. V úvahu přicházejí také větší celky aut, jako jsou například celé přední části vozu či nápravové skupiny, řekl ČTK Dreithaler. Podle Povšíka se má o tom, jaké komponenty se budou ve Vrchlabí v následujících letech vyrábět, mělo rozhodnout do konce roku 2012. Do podzimu se tam montovala první generace Škody Octavia, jejíž výroba skončila 9. listopadu.

description.hltext_display: Wisła zainteresowana dryblerem z Izraela
Havsa daki Fırınlara Şafak Baskını
description.content: - Edirne'nin Havsa ilçesinde ekmek fırınları denetlendi. Havsa Belediyesi Zabıta ekipleri ve Çevre sağlığı Teknisyeni Yıldıray Çetintaş, ilçedeki 7 fırına şafak baskını yaparak denetledi. Ekipler denetimlerde, fırınlarda hijyen ve sağlık kurallara uyulup uyulmadığını ve çalışanlarının sağlık karnelerinin olup olmadığını ve portör muayenelerinin yapılıp yapılmadığını kontrol etti. Üretilen ekmeklerin ve diğer unlu ürünlerin sağlıklı bir ortamda üretilip üretilmediğini de kontrol eden ekipler, işletmelerin yasada belirtilen kurallara dikkat ettiğini tespit etti. Eksik gramajlı ekmeğe rastlamayan ekipler, iş yeri sahiplerini kurallara uydukları için teşekkür edip uyarılarda bulundu. (GÜR-RC-ÜNS) - EDİRNE (Anadolu Ajansı) 21 dakika önce.. [2430004]

description.hltext_display: Touha po moci je silnější než předvolební sliby
description.content:
PRAHA – Nečasova vláda nepadla. Bylo o tom rozhodnuto již před včerejším hlasováním o nedůvěře ve sněmovně.
Vše bylo upečeno na schůzce koaliční devítky u prezidenta Klause, který se do jednání razantně vložil. Podle KSČM to nic nemění na tom, že Nečasova vláda aférou Drobil pohřbila poslední zbytky své důvěryhodnosti. Vládnout bude sice dál, důvěru občanů však definitivně ztratila.
Patovou situaci ve vládě se včera rozhodl vyřešit prezident Václav Klaus. Ještě před klíčovým hlasováním o nedůvěře ve sněmovně si na Hrad pozval vrcholné představitele tří koaličních stran a přiměl je k dohodě, kterou koalice pod jeho dohledem nalezla v několika oblastech, mj. v otázce personálního obsazení funkce policejního prezidenta. Mezi dalšími body, na nichž se lídři tří stran a jejich doprovod na Hradě shodli, je podle Klause i otázka vytvoření Generálního inspektorátu bezpečnostních složek. Prezident po jednání řekl, že on sám bude garantem dosažené dohody. Vláda si tak zajistila svou další existenci. (Podrobnosti dohody nebyly však zveřejněny.)
Podle předsedy ÚV KSČM Vojtěcha Filipa není vůbec podstatné, jestli si koalice zachránila krk nějakou narychlo upečenou dohodou. »Vůbec nic tato dohoda nemění na tom, že občané Nečasově vládě už dlouho nedůvěřují a že politické strany, které udržují tuto vládu u moci, by měly být v příštích volbách – a já bych se přimlouval, aby byly co nejdříve – odměněny občany pořádným propadem hlasů,« řekl Haló novinám Filip.
Poslanci Věcí veřejných podporu koaličnímu kabinetu při hlasování o nedůvěře oznámili ihned po schůzce u Klause. Předseda VV Radek John jen doplnil, že strana stále trvá na odchodu policejního prezidenta Oldřicha Martinů.
Pozoruhodné na celé věci je i nečekaně silné angažmá prezidenta republiky. Poslanec KSČM Jiří Dolejš se domnívá, že podíl prezidenta na dohodě koaličních stran byl zásadní. »Prezident Václav Klaus si v létě pochvaloval, že tu konečně vznikla silná pravicová vláda a o tento svůj sen nechtěl za žádnou cenu přijít. Otázkou zůstává, jaká cena byla na Hradě dohodnuta. Myslím, že nebyla nízká. Případ Věcí veřejných ukazuje, že touha po moci je zkrátka silnější než předvolební sliby,« řekl našemu deníku Dolejš.
Skandál v koalici
Krizi v kabinetu vyvolal korupční skandál na ministerstvu životního prostředí (MŽP). Odvolaný šéf SFŽP Libor Michálek přišel s nahrávkami, které dokazují korupci na ministerstvu a snahu ulít státní peníze na černé fondy. VV, které postavily svou tvář na boji s korupcí, žádaly po premiéru Nečasovi, aby kabinet celou kauzu lépe mediálně ustál. Kvůli tomu koalice tvrdě jednala od pátku. V pondělí nejprve předseda vlády Nečas přišel s ostrým prohlášením žádajícím splnění koaliční smlouvy, v níž se i VV bezpodmínečně zavázaly vždy v hlasování o důvěře či nedůvěře vládu podpořit. Zástupci této strany pak bez vysvětlení z jednání odešli. To vyvolalo otázky, jak se VV zachovají při hlasování o nedůvěře vládě, které kvůli korupčnímu skandálu ve sněmovně vyvolala opozice. Jednání na Hradě včera prokázalo, že lavírování VV bylo jen mediálním tanečkem, který měl zajistit, aby VV, jejichž voličská přízeň se propadá, znovu získaly mediální tvář bojovníků proti korupci a nebyly poškozeny tím, že se celá aféra zamete pod koberec.
22. 12. 2010(ste)

description.hltext_display: 湖南冷水江市26人死罐笼坠落事故7名责任人获刑
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
新华网长沙12月22日电（记者陈黎明）记者22日从湖南省冷水江市人民法院获悉，2009年10月8日湖南锡矿山闪星锑业有限责任公司发生的致26人死亡罐笼坠落事故，相关责任人已被追究刑事责任，7名被告一审分别被以重大责任事故罪、重大劳动安全事故罪判处有期徒刑。
法院介绍，公诉机关5月10日向法院提起公诉，法院先后4次公开审理此案，最终判决闪星锑业南矿机电工区综合班工人杨自彪、刘燕云、李臻有期徒刑2年，闪星锑业南矿机电工区绞车工刘冠军、罗新晖有期徒刑1年9个月，南矿机能科科长王继忠、南矿机电工区副区长杨捷兴有期徒刑1年6个月。
2009年10月8日9时15分左右，湖南有色控股锡矿山闪星锑业有限公司南矿二直井2．5ｍ双卷筒提升机在提升过程中发生罐笼蹾罐事故，导致26人死亡、5人重伤，直接经济损失685万元。
经事故技术鉴定专家组技术鉴定，事故原因分为直接原因和间接原因。直接原因一是调绳离合器（联锁阀活塞销）闭合不到位；二是制动器所产生的制动力矩不够；三是提升机超员，造成人员伤亡扩大。间接原因则是企业设备管理维护不完善，技术管理不到位。
(责任编辑：赵婷)

description.hltext_display: Seven NZers make the cut at Melbourne (NZPA)
description.content:
Seven New Zealand golfers have received PGA Tour of Australasia status for 2011 by making the cut after three rounds of the final qualifying tournament at Peninsula Golf Club, Melbourne.
The challenge now is to force their way into the top 10 after tomorrow's final round with OneAsia tour membership up for grabs.
Brad Shilton is the best placed to achieve that; he shares 13th at one-over par after carding a one-under 71 on the North Course today.
Nick Gillespie and David Klein are two shots back in 21st after rounds of 72 and 70, respectively, while Mathew Holton is 29th at five-over and Hamish Roberston lies 36th at seven-over after blowing out with a 77 today.
The other New Zealanders to make the cut were Josh Carmichael (eight-over) and Peter Spearman-Burn (12-over).
Aaron Leech, Jonny Dittmer, Andrew Green, Thomas Spearman-Burn and Gary-John Hill all missed the cut mark as the top 72 players progressed to the final round.
Australian Neven Basic leades the tournament with a seven-under total of 209.

description.hltext_display: Coasts to meet again in February
description.content:
Rematch ... rain called off play on Sunday after just 20 minutes. (: Matt Roberts)
Gold Coast United's A-League match against Central Coast that was abandoned last Sunday due to a water-logged pitch has been re-scheduled to be played in February.
Gold Coast's billionaire owner Clive Palmer had offered free entry to the clash as a tribute to Frank Lowy and his World Cup bid team, but torrential rain caused the pitch to become unplayable and referee Chris Beath called the game off after just 19 minutes with the scores locked at 0-0.
A crowd of 10,146 set a new A-League record home crowd for United.
The re-scheduled match will now kick off at 8:00pm local time (9:00pm AEDT) on February 9 at Skilled Park.

description.hltext_display: Little Fockers
description.content:
Aside from the usual issues raising his young twin kids, Sam (DAISY TAHAN) and Henry (COLIN BAIOCCHI), Greg Focker (BEN STILLER) seems to have his life in order. He's nearing completion -- through the work of Randy (HARVEY KEITEL) and his construction crew -- of refurbing an old house for his new home with wife Pam (TERI POLO), while he's moved up from male nurse to supervisor at the hospital where he works.
Yet, he's concerned about money, what with Pam wanting to send the kids to the highly recommended but ultra-expensive Early Human School run by Prudence (LAURA DERN). Thus, when drug rep Andi Garcia (JESSICA ALBA) comes knocking and wants Greg to give speeches promoting her company's new erectile dysfunction drug, Sustengo, he sees potential tuition bills being made. Of course, it doesn't hurt that Andi is bubbly and drop dead gorgeous.
But Greg is most focused on the upcoming 5th birthday party celebration for his kids, all of which means Pam's parents, Jack (ROBERT DE NIRO) and Dina (BLYTHE DANNER), have already arrived, although formerly antagonistic feelings seem to have settled down between the two men.
Meanwhile, his parents are also on their way, once Roz (BARBARA STREISAND) is done with her sexual advice TV show and Bernie (DUSTIN HOFFMAN) completes his flamenco lessons in Spain. Then there's Pam's rich ex-boyfriend, Kevin Rawley (OWEN WILSON), whose recently failed marriage proposal has him returning to her for comfort.
With the party approaching, Greg must contend with that, Andi becoming ever-more friendly (and then some) toward him, and Jack becoming suspicious that Greg no longer finds Pam attractive and is looking elsewhere for company, all enhanced by a series of misunderstandings.

description.hltext_display: Trener Korony nie cierpi czarnych kotów
Protest proti provokaci
description.content: Debatě ve sněmovně o vyslovení nedůvěry vládě dominovaly kritické projevy opozičních poslanců na adresu kabinetu. V souvislosti s aférou kolem bývalého ministra životního prostředí Pavla Drobila (ODS) a postupu některých členů vlády padala slova morální marasmus a panoptikum. Podle předsedy ÚV KSČM Vojtěcha Filipa upravuje Nečas každý den své stanovisko zřejmě podle rad svých advokátů. Někteří poslanci se pozastavovali rovněž nad postupem Johna, jenž o kauze od exšéfa fondu Libora Michálka také věděl a podle některých informací ho poslal za novináři. John dnes ve sněmovně zopakoval, že to tak nebylo. Michálkovi prý koncem září poradil, aby získal pro svá podezření podpůrné důkazy, aby nešlo jen o tvrzení proti tvrzení, a potom se obrátil na policii. Ministr se odvolával na protikorupční příručku, kterou vnitro vydalo. Filip poukázal na to, že John nabádal Michálka ke svépomoci místo toho, aby šel na policii. "Důvěru občanů jste dávno ztratili," řekl Filip na adresu kabinetu. Mnozí opoziční poslanci se podivovali nad tím, že dohoda o pokračování vlády, kterou uzavřeli koaliční lídři dnes u prezidenta Václava Klause, je tajná. Díky tomuto ujednání budou pro vládu hlasovat i poslanci Věcí veřejných, kteří nebyli do té doby rozhodnuti. Opozici se tedy nepodaří získat potřebných 101 hlasů a kabinet bude vládnout dál s důvěrou sněmovny.

description.hltext_display: Mme Ashton présidera un monde d’hommes
description.content:
Few women and a geographical balance that laves plenty of room for existing EU officials and nationals from Central and Eastern Europe are apparent from the list.
Only two women appear in the top positions: Helga Schmidt, who was previously head of the Policy unit at the EU Council of Ministers, and Claude-France Arnould, now head of the Civil-Military Planning Directorate (CMPD) at the Council.
Under pressure from the European Parliament, Ashton had promised to respect the "community" principle in building up the EEAS, by taking on board more than 50% of civil servants from the Commission and the Council, where member states are represented.
She also gave assurances to respect gender balance, with the caveat that she would hire only "the best and the brightest". Geographical balance
Ten among the 28 names appearing on the list come from the current EU institutions. Six among the 28 are from the Central and Eastern European countries that joined the Union in 2004 and 2007.
Miroslav Lajčák, former Foreign Minister of Slovakia and former EU Special Representative in Bosnia and Herzegovina, was appointed as Managing Director for Russia, Eastern Europe and the Western Balkans. Viorel Isticioaia Budura, a Romanian diplomat, is appointed Managing Director for Asia. Jiří edivý, a former Czech defense Minister and former NATO Deputy Secretary-General, got the post of Head of the EEAS Civil-Military Planning Directorate.
As previously reported, Maciej Popowski, a Polsh diplomat who until now was the head of cabinet of European Parliament President Jerzy Buzek, will be Deputy Secretary-general for Inter-institutional affairs. Lithuanian diplomat Vygaudas Uackas is the EU special representative in Afghanistan, and Filip Dimitrov, a former Bulgarian Prime Minister, will represent the Union as its Ambassador to Georgia.
Hugues Mingarelli, a French national and Deputy Director General at the Commission’s directorate for foreign affairs (RELEX) will be Managing Director for the Middle East and North Africa. Nicholas Westcott, a former UK ambassador to Ghana, will be Managing Director for Africa.
Among the other noticeable appointments is Ilkka Salmi, until now head of the Finnish Intelligence service (Suojelupoliisi/SIPO), who was named head of the EEAS Situational Centre (SitCen), a kind of intelligence service. Up to now, the Situational Centre operated under the EU Council of Ministers’ authority. As the , Ambassador Olof Skoog was appointed to chair the EEAS Political and Security Committee (PSC). Skoog has already led the PSC when Sweden held the rotating EU presidency in the second half of 2009, and has been Sweden´s representative at the Committee for the past three years. Prior to this, he was Director-General for Political Affairs at the Ministry for Foreign Affairs in Stockholm.
Italian Agostino Miozzo, previously director for international relations and volunteers at the Italian Civil Protection Service, was appointed Managing Director for Crisis response, Dutch General Ton Van Osch is to head the, and his compatriot will lead the . Swedish is to lead

description.hltext_display: Rogers 'gripped by terror' on boat ride
description.content:
Dual international Mat Rogers was "gripped by terror" as a Gold Coast boat cruise with former rugby league team-mates and friends almost ended in tragedy at the weekend.
Rogers was one of 10 people, including two children, on a 10-metre boat with former Titans team-mate Greg Bird, TV personality Matt Johns and international cyclist Robbie McEwen, when passengers began losing consciousness after inhaling undetectable but toxic carbon monoxide fumes.
He and McEwen are being hailed as heroes after rescuing a passenger who fell overboard during the drama.
"There was a time on the boat I felt terrified and powerless to do anything," the recently retired rugby league star said on Wednesday.
"I was pretty messed up for a time. I slipped off my chair and ended up on the ground but I don't think I lost complete consciousness.
"It was frightening.
"I was standing there thinking 'what's happening, what's happening', it was like something out of a movie.
"I remember I had my phone in my hand and I was looking at it wondering what I was going to do with it, I couldn't even make a phone call."
Despite his confused state, Rogers leapt into the water to help a man who had fallen off the back of the boat after blacking out just off Sanctuary Cove.
He and McEwen, whose high altitude training and superior oxygen levels helped him cope with the situation better than other passengers, kept the unconscious passenger's head above water until help arrived.
"I saw the man walk around to the back of the boat and pass out and fall into the water," recalled the 34-year-old Rogers.
"I think I was probably the only one who saw him fall overboard. I was just coming to my senses and jumped in, which was probably a silly thing to do.
"I ran through the boat and just dived in. Robbie (McEwen) tried to stop me because he knew I wasn't any good and then he dived in after me.
"I just grabbed the guy and laid back in the water and waited for the boat to come back around and get us."
The scary experience left Rogers more exhausted than in any of the 100 representative games he played during his career.
"I was that spent. I had no oxygen left in my system after I'd jumped in with Robbie to get this guy, I couldn't get back in the boat," he said.
"Luckily Birdie (Greg Bird) realised how serious it was and he just grabbed me and pulled me into the boat.
"I'm glad Birdie was there, he's a big fella and I was really struggling."
The drama started on the slow trip back from McLarens Landing when passengers began to lose consciousness.
The plastic panels on the side of the boat, lowered to protect passengers from a storm, had created a vacuum that sucked the killer fumes back into the boat.
"We were breathing it in, totally oblivious to it, we couldn't smell it," said Rogers.
"It was nobody's fault, it was just one of those freak things."

description.hltext_display: Fire sales non performers now
description.content:
With 65 % of sales managers surveyed by consulting firm Huthwaite saying sales would pick up this quarter and 75 % saying they will hit quotas, its time to clear out the dead wood.
According to Huthwaite, sales managers are optimistic about their sales performance for the final quarter of 2010. While sales targets were met in the previous quarter, sales managers also prompted that performance could get better if more focus were given to boost the sales skills of team members and forecasting activities.
In a survey conducted by leading sales performance organisation Huthwaite from October to November 2010, over 65 percent of the respondents said they were positive that sales will improve this quarter, with 75 percent of the overall respondents projecting that they will hit or exceed targets.
The survey was conducted with 116 respondents comprising of sales managers, executives and directors, most of whom have over ten years of experience in sales in various industries across business-to-business and consumer-based clientele.
Identifying lack of competent selling skills as the greatest shortfall to achieving previous sales objectives, managers expressed enthusiasm to improve the expertise of their team in conducting sales and reaching targets going forward.
“While most of the respondents recognise that aptitude of their team members to conduct sales is imperative to their success, they also note that the primary factor for their performance in the previous quarter is the lack of mentoring and coaching of such skills to their sales team,” said James Fennessy, Chief Executive Officer of Huthwaite.
The optimism for sales in the current quarter is attributed to the projection that more efforts will be pumped into improving the skills of their sales personnel through training programmes.
Besides sharpening sales expertise, sales managers recognised that forecasting is highly valuable in their organisations. The majority of the respondents identified that the exercise is important, and they do it to gauge the outcome of their sales performance.
“A large number of the respondents are aware of the potential of sales forecasting and how it contributes to their business. It is the trend of the market right now. Sales managers know that forecasting helps them both assess performance and set future sales strategy based on the outcome of the forecast. This is a proactive measure to boost sales and drive profits,” Fennessy added.
The survey also found that sales managers put the minimum amount of time on updating sales pipeline, presumably due to their busy schedule managing other sales activities. Most of the respondents spend between one and three hours a week, and even so would often fail to come to the numbers accurately and end up with magnified numbers.
Huthwaite regularly surveys industry sectors on sales performance in order to stay up to date with the tools and methods that result in sales excellence. This regular research ensures its industry training is refreshed and relevant to the evolving marketplace.
Tags: Singapore sales, Singapore sales managers, Singapore sales performance,

description.hltext_display: Zeti honoured with Lifetime Achievement Award
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR, (Bernama) - Bank Negara Malaysia Governor, Tan Sri Dr Zeti Akhtar Aziz, was honoured with the Lifetime Achievement Award on Tuesday at the Annual Islamic Business and Finance Awards held in Dubai. In her acceptance remarks, she said Islamic Finance is one of the fastest growing segments in the global financial system.
"The industry remained resilient during the recent global financial crisis. It has continued to be competitive, providing financial products and services, to changing requirements of businesses and investors," she added.
She also said, in a now more challenging and competitive environment, the future of Islamic finance will depend on the innovation capabilities and the investment in talent development for the industry.
"This agenda will be the key to ensuring its continued growth and sustainability," Zeti explained. The text of her acceptance remarks was made avaiable here today.
"We have come a long way in bringing the industry to where it is today. "In advancing the industry, it will be these continued collaborative efforts of the industry and the authorities, that will contribute towards shaping Islamic finance.
"In so doing, it will also enhance its potential role to contribute to global growth and financial stability," she highlighted. The Islamic Business and Finance Awards, now in its fifth year, is considered one of the most prominent events in the finance industry throughout the Gulf region.
The annual ceremony is designed to highlight, encourage and reward the exceptional performance and growth of Islamic business and the finance community. The awards are also now widely considered a benchmark of excellence in the industry.

description.hltext_display: Dohoda Indie a Ruska
description.content:
DILLÍ - Indický premiér Manmóhan Singh a ruský prezident Dmitrij Medveděv včera v Dillí dohodli spolupráci obou zemí na projektu stíhaček páté generace, rozšíření kapacity jaderného reaktoru Kudankulam na jihu Indie i společný postup v boji proti terorismu.
Jednání proběhlo v první den dvoudenní návštěvy ruské hlavy státu v Indii zaměřené na rozvoj hospodářských vztahů. V dohodě se podle Reuters praví, že obě země budou pracovat na projektu stíhaček a Rusko se bude podílet na budování indických jaderných reaktorů včetně toho v elektrárně Kudankulam. Smlouva však prohlubuje nejen spolupráci obou zemí v oblasti jaderné energie a obrany, ale např. i ve farmaceutickém průmyslu a sektoru informačních technologií. Indie a Rusko už podepsaly dohodu o zdvojnásobení dvoustranného obchodu ze současných deseti miliard dolarů (asi 192 miliard korun) na 20 miliard dolarů (asi 384 miliard dolarů) během příštích pěti let.
K hlavních tématům včerejší debaty Medveděva a Singha patřil i boj proti mezinárodnímu terorismu. »Jsme rozhodnuti spolupracovat v oblasti tajných služeb a plánování efektivních postupů proti terorismu,« prohlásil Singh. Obě země se staly v minulosti terčem velkých teroristických útoků. Ruský prezident také podle Reuters na tiskové konferenci sdělil, že podporuje snahy Indie o získání křesla stálého člena Rady bezpečnosti OSN. Indie se společně s Německem, Kolumbií, Jihoafrickou republikou a Portugalskem ujme funkce coby nový nestálý člen Rady bezpečnosti OSN pro roky 2011 a 2012.
Rusko je blízkým ekonomickým i politickým partnerem Indie už od dob Sovětského svazu, Indie však nyní usiluje o vazby na více zemí, aby vyjádřila svou rostoucí sílu na světové scéně. V minulých letech Indie zvýšila spolupráci s USA, ale její strategické partnerství s Ruskem stále trvá. »Rusko je osvědčený přítel Indie, který při nás stál v dobách, kdy jsme ho potřebovali,« prohlásil Singh.
Shoda i o Íránu
Oba čelní představitelé Indie a Ruska se včera také shodli, že by měly být podniknuty veškeré kroky, aby byl spor ohledně íránského jaderného programu vyřešen během rozhovorů a za jednacím stolem. Ve společném stanovisku uvedli, že Írán má právo na jadernou energii k mírovým účelům. Zároveň Teherán vyzvali ke spolupráci s Mezinárodní agenturou pro atomovou energii a apelovali na něj, aby plnil nařízení rezolucí Rady bezpečnosti OSN.

description.hltext_display: La Roumanie en colère face au blocage franco-allemand
description.content:
Romaniaand Bulgaria, which joined the EU in 2007, remain outside the agreement due to shortcomings in their police and judicial systems. Both countries were placed under a special monitoring system, called a Cooperation and Verification Mechanism.
In September, EU ministers for European Affairs decided to extend the monitoring for another year.
Speaking in the presidential palace in Bucharest, Basescu said his country would not accept discrimination from anyone, "be it from the most powerful countries of the EU". Hours before, the interior ministers of France and Germany, Brice Hortefeux and Thomas de Maizière, had issued a joint letter saying they would block Romania and Bulgaria's Schengen bid.
According to the two ministers, not all conditions are met for the two countries to join the . The two countries had initially planned to join the passport-free zone in March 2011. "It would not be realistic nor responsible to neglect the deficiencies identified," says the letter, seen by EurActiv Romania. Among the deficiencies, the ministers specify "the absence of a satisfactory juridical and administrative environment in the fields of security and justice, persisting corruption at different levels and worrying levels of organised crime". Consequently, the ministers plead for a postponement of Romania and Bulgaria’s Schengen accession for a later date. "We consider that the decision should be taken when the main causes of worries would be removed and when the two countries would begin irreversible progress in their fight against corruption, of organised crime, as well as of reforming their judicial systems," the letter reads. Moving target?
When Romania and Bulgaria joined the EU in 2007, they were placed under a special monitoring mechanism to assist them in reforming their juridical systems and combat corruption. In the case of Bulgaria, the fight against organised crime was highlighted as a particular problem. Since then regular reports have revealed only limited progress.
However, the European Commission admits that there is no legal link between the Bulgaria and Romania's progress under the mechanism and their accession to the Schengen area.
In his statement, Basescu said that Romania had met all technical requirements for joining Schengen and would not accept the introduction of "additional conditionalities". A Polish diplomat told EurActiv recently that his country was worried by attempts from older EU members to "change the rules" of the game and adopt "moving targets" that are difficult to be achieve for newcomers, citing Romania and Bulgaria's Schengen bid as a case in point.
The diplomat also expressed worried that the permanent safety net for the euro zone could to raise the bar higher for countries that wish to adopt the common currency.
Retribution for the Roma invasion?
The push by Paris can also be seen as an act of reprisal against the massive arrival of Romas to France. The expulsion of those migrants, who were mostly from Romania, has stirred unprecedented controversy and criticism from the European Commission. that "Romania and Bulgaria do not have a closed door," but explained that those countries were simply unable to secure their own borders.
Bulgaria remains silent
As with the Roma controversy, Sofia chose to keep a low profile, after the French-German letter became public. Over the last months, the country's Prime Minister Boyko Borissov for its expulsions of Bulgarian Roma, hoping that in exchange, France would not veto his country's Schengen bid.
The only official reaction so far comes from a spokesperson of the Bulgarian Foreign Ministry, who said Sofia would redouble efforts to reform its judiciary and convince doubters that it has made progress.
Meanwhile, the public uproar in Bulgarian and Romania appears to be massive. Hundreds of readers have commented under the , EurActiv's sister publication in Bulgaria, which carried the news of their countries' rejected Schengen bid. Many comments see it as a setback for Bulgaria's Prime Minister, who had made Schengen accession his biggest EU priority.

description.hltext_display: 今年我国农业农村经济发展成就超过预期
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
新华网北京12月22日电（记者潘林青、董峻）农业部部长韩长赋说，今年我国农业农村经济立足全年抗灾夺丰收，取得了超出预期的好成绩，保持了农业农村经济平稳较快发展的好势头，为经济社会发展全局提供了重要支撑。
“2010年是极不寻常的一年。”韩长赋22日在全国农业工作会议上说，“国内外经济形势复杂多变，农产品价格异常波动，尤其是特大干旱、低温寒潮、严重洪涝等自然灾害多发频发重发，给农业农村经济发展带来极大困难。”
对此，韩长赋表示，今年中央出台强农惠农政策数量之多、针对性之强、含金量之高都是多年少有的，农业部门争取和落实政策力度之大、速度之快、效果之好也是多年少有的。
韩长赋说，粮食连续第7年增产是今年经济工作的最大亮点，预计粮食总产10928亿斤，比上年增加312亿斤，再创历史新高，实现半个世纪以来首次连续7年增产。
“针对今年自然灾害特点，我们确定了以丰补歉、减灾增产的工作思路，做到重灾区少减产、轻灾区不减产、非灾区多增产，实现了南方损失北方补、夏粮损失秋粮补。”韩长赋说。
“菜篮子”产品方面，预计今年我国肉类、禽蛋、奶类总产量分别达到7850万吨、2760万吨和3740万吨，比上年增长2．6％、1．5％和0．2％；水产品5350万吨，增长4．6％；蔬菜、水果分别达到6．37亿吨、1．31亿吨，增长3．1％和6．7％。“菜篮子”产品的稳定发展，确保了市场有效供应。
农民收入方面，预计全年农民人均纯收入年增量创历史新高，增速创1984年以来新高。呈现“双增加双提高”的特点――粮食等主要农产品产量增加，价格水平提高；农民外出务工人数增加，工资水平提高。
此外，农产品质量安全保持较高水平，蔬菜、畜产品、水产品监测合格率分别为96．8％、99．6％和96．7％，全年未发生重大农产品质量安全事件。
