description.hltext_display: Marathon effort for injured Bay runner
description.content:
Tracey Donovan snapped the femoral head - the top part of the thigh bone that narrows to fit in with the hip joint - while running the New York marathon. Photo / Supplied.
A Tauranga woman who was unable to complete this year's New York Marathon - despite running for 12km after breaking her hip - vows to complete it next year.
Tracey Donovan flew to America six weeks ago to compete in the world-famous 42km race. She got as far as the 20km mark when she felt pain jolt through her.
"I was running and I thought 'bloody hell my legs hurt'... I thought it was a muscle thing," she said.
Having trained for nine months already and ignoring what pain that brought, Ms Donovan blocked out what she could to try to complete the race.
"I just kept running. I felt some pain but kept running until I couldn't run any more," she said.
Ms Donovan's sister-in-law was also competing and ran with her until they got to the 32km mark. By then the pain was too much and Ms Donovan pulled out - still unaware of the seriousness of her injury.
New York Police officers helped carry her to a nearby fire truck, where she sat until help could be organised.
"I just sat there. As soon as I would stand up I got that sick, pain feeling. I realised I wasn't going to finish it."
Ms Donovan asked her husband Russell Donovan to get some anti-inflammatory and pain killers but instead he took her to a hospital where she was examined.
"The guy came back all excited and said 'you have broken your femur bone in half'.
You have to have an operation."
To be precise, Ms Donovan snapped the femoral head - the top part of the thigh bone that narrows to fit in with the hip joint. Travel insurance helped cover the extra cost.
She said people's jaws dropped to the ground when she explains what happened. Neither she or any one she knows had broken bones like that while running before.
"ACC are like 'you must have fallen over', well no actually, I didn't. I guess there must have been something to happen before then."
Ms Donovan had no idea what. The self described "healthy specimen" does not remember breaking any bones in her body before.
While she is perplexed at the break, all she would really like to do is heal up and move on but she is yet to hear if ACC will fund future medical treatment.
Ms Donovan said it was a waiting game. For now, she is doing the paperwork for her and her husband's Bureta car repair business from her home while in a wheelchair. She cannot wait to get back on her feet, and plans to return to New York: "I'm going to go back next year. I'm going to complete it," she said.
Pictured: Tauranga woman Tracey Donovan is carried by sister-in-law Tracey Donovan-Grammer after breaking her hip while running in the New York Marathon. The two women are helped by New York Police Department officers Digesu (left) and Marizan, of the Bronx Precinct.

description.hltext_display: Sníh stále ruší lety
description.content: Debatě ve sněmovně o vyslovení nedůvěry vládě dominovaly kritické projevy opozičních poslanců na adresu kabinetu. V souvislosti s aférou kolem bývalého ministra životního prostředí Pavla Drobila (ODS) a postupu některých členů vlády padala slova morální marasmus a panoptikum. Podle předsedy ÚV KSČM Vojtěcha Filipa upravuje Nečas každý den své stanovisko zřejmě podle rad svých advokátů. Někteří poslanci se pozastavovali rovněž nad postupem Johna, jenž o kauze od exšéfa fondu Libora Michálka také věděl a podle některých informací ho poslal za novináři. John dnes ve sněmovně zopakoval, že to tak nebylo. Michálkovi prý koncem září poradil, aby získal pro svá podezření podpůrné důkazy, aby nešlo jen o tvrzení proti tvrzení, a potom se obrátil na policii. Ministr se odvolával na protikorupční příručku, kterou vnitro vydalo. Filip poukázal na to, že John nabádal Michálka ke svépomoci místo toho, aby šel na policii. "Důvěru občanů jste dávno ztratili," řekl Filip na adresu kabinetu. Mnozí opoziční poslanci se podivovali nad tím, že dohoda o pokračování vlády, kterou uzavřeli koaliční lídři dnes u prezidenta Václava Klause, je tajná. Díky tomuto ujednání budou pro vládu hlasovat i poslanci Věcí veřejných, kteří nebyli do té doby rozhodnuti. Opozici se tedy nepodaří získat potřebných 101 hlasů a kabinet bude vládnout dál s důvěrou sněmovny.

description.hltext_display: Ratusan Murid TK Depok Konvoi Hari Ibu
Lancer une entreprise est plus rapide et moins cher, mais des défis demeurent
description.content:
The EU executive has already revised the Late Payments Directive in line with the commitments given in the SBA (EurActiv 09/04/09), and that passed the European Parliament in November.
Starting her own online art gallery in London this year took Gina Cross about a week and cost £70 (€82), about the average for entrepreneurs in the United Kingdom.
Likewise, in Bulgaria, France and Ireland, registering a new business costs less than €100 and takes less than a week. "It’s quite easy," said Cross, founder of , a small company which sells printed artworks.
But in Poland and Spain, entrepreneurs still wait about a month for their initial paperwork to be approved. In Italy, Luxembourg, Greece and the Netherlands, the process is faster but expensive more than €1,000. That discrepancy highlights the challenges facing efforts in the European Union to jumpstart the economy. When it comes to economic initiatives the EU has no powers to enact rules with teeth. They host meetings, promote programmes and share best practices, but at the end of the day their recommendations are only as strong as the political will to enact changes at the national and regional level. "Certain member states moved on certain elements, but not all [] There’s definitely space to push further. We’re very much aware of that," said Marko Curavić, head of unit for entrepreneurship in the European Commission.
Four years ago, leaders from all 27 member states set a 2007 deadline for their own countries to create one-stop-shops for setting up a company quickly ideally within a week. Start up fees, the European Council concluded, should be as low as possible, and hiring the first employee shouldn’t involve more than one public administration point.
Clearly many countries are years behind schedule.
But why does that matter?
Small and medium-size businesses create 80% of new jobs in Europe. That means entrepreneurs and small and medium businesses will play a critical role as Europe recovers from the economic and financial crisis. So anything that hinders new businesses hinders growth.
This is especially important now because while the unemployment rate in the EU averages around 10%, and it’s double that for job seekers under the age of 25, according to research published last week by the Organisation for Economic Coordination and Development. The highest youth unemployment rate was in Spain, followed by Ireland, Slovakia and Greece. Only Germany posted a slight decrease. : Did it deliver? To foster small businesses the EU adopted the two years ago. The goal was to focus national governments on "the growth and innovation potential of small and medium-sized enterprises." The 10 principles in the act ranged from improving access to financing to helping entrepreneurs who faced bankruptcy get a second chance.
Next month, the Commission will present a report card on progress under the initiative. They are braced for criticism from small business advocates like Andrea Benassi, secretary general for a lobbying group of European craft, trade and small- and medium businesses (UEAPME). "Policymakers have raised the bar of our expectations very high in the last years," he said. "Unfortunately, they have largely failed to deliver so far, with many concrete measures still pending or unapplied due to national governments’ lukewarm commitment. We are very, very far from where we should be in terms of results." Last week, Eurochambers, an association representing chambers of commerce in Europe, released a survey of businesses in 18 European countries. It showed a variety of familiar obstacles, such as regulatory burdens, difficulties getting financing and inflexible labor markets. "Crisis or no crisis, the results reveal a depressingly familiar list of bottlenecks," said Alessandro Barberis, president of EuroChambers in Brussels. "The outcome would probably have been similar had this exercise been conducted five, 10 even 20 years ago" Some progress
Of course, some important steps have been made on a pan-European level and at the local level. Last month, the European Parliament approved a new directive to crack down on late payers, for example, which now must be endorsed by the European Council. "A lot of things have been done in the last two years. Could more be done? Always," Curavić said. But he insists "the glass is half full." He hopes the review and proposed amendments will refocus political leaders on creating an entrepreneurial culture and the business conditions to help them thrive. Areas in need of more muscle, he said, include access to finance, education, mentoring and women entrepreneurs.
In America, Curavić points out, young people dream of being the next tech success, following in the footsteps of Bill Gates, Steve Jobs or Michael Dell. Where as in Europe, he says, the only cool, high-flying founder of Virgin Group Richard Branson.
Studies repeatedly show the majority of Europeans prefer low-risk jobs, such as government institutions and big corporations, rather than working for themselves. In America, the reverse is true.
That cultural gap is a threat to European competitiveness, according to research by Bruegel, a Brussels-based think tank. In the EU, just one in five leading innovative companies was created after 1975. In the United States, more than half are that young, and they are focused in fast-growing sectors like health and information technology.
Here are some examples of what is being done around Europe to help companies get started and grow faster:
Slovakia
The Operational Programme Competitiveness and Economic Growth is the main tool for strengthening the competitiveness of SMEs, especially within the EU.
Companies with 10 or fewer employees are exempt from accounting requirements. Entrepreneurs are granted exemptions from double entry accounting if they are the sole employee and earn less than €170,000. Expenses can be written off according to the principles of ‘bookless accounting.’
Self-employed people can register within five working days for a standard trading license. Limited liability companies can register within 10 days. The cost is about €335, according to the European Commission.
In 2007, the government published a document called "Better regulation in the Slovak Republic: Action programme for reducing administrative burdens in Slovakia 20072012" with an ambitious goal to cut red tape by 25% by 2012.
According to the latest measure of bureaucracy, administrative burdens for entrepreneurs cost €91 million a year. The ministry reviewed 48 laws in 12 areas, including accounting, taxation, commercial law and intellectual property. "Even though we tabled around 50 recommendations to ease administrative burdens, we are preparing the second" round, said Jozef Hudák, director of the business environment department, Ministry of Economy. After all are approved, the Slovak government plans to put them into action.
The internal market services law was adopted last January and went into effect in June. For small and medium-size businesses that want to enter the Slovakian market, they can contact a district office of the Department of Entrepreneurship and present their licenses. These offices collect information, such as criminal records from the SME’s home country, and within three days will send a request for authorization.
So far, they have provided information about doing business in Slovakia to almost 950 foreign companies from many sectors, including retail, wholesale, services, construction, food, direct or telephone consulting, recruiting and technology.
The most common questions concerned authorisation for doing business, accepting foreign skills certificates, tax obligations and credits, and health and social insurance.
The next step will be an e-government system that will require new businesses to go in person to an office, Hudak said. The government has allocated more than €2.3 million for this year and next to complete that phase.
Czech Republic
The new Czech government, formed in the summer 2010, has made some ambitious steps to promote start-ups and make life easier for SMEs. The Minister of Industry and Trade, Martin Kocourek, said reducing paperwork and improving the legal environment were his main goals.
The Ministry of Industry and Trade, for example, aims to reduce annually the number of bureaucratic requirements for SMEs. This year it proposed eliminating around 20 requirements. Another goal is to designate specific days in the year for new legislative changes. This would make it easier for SMEs to know exactly when new legislation will be enacted.
The Ministry is also working on integrating different databases, even in small villages, to make administration easier for SMEs. Kocourek also announced recently plans for a special venture fund to invest in small business projects.
The Czech Republic has already established a network of 15 one-stop-shops to serve every region of the country. Entrepreneurs usually contact these points to get more information about neighbouring countries and their markets.
Currently, it takes about 15 days and costs an average of €345 to set up a business, according to the Commission.
France
Two years ago, France passed a law to modernise the economy (), which included several measures to facilitate the creation of SME's. Business start ups fees average €84 are the process takes about four days, according to the European Commission. The law also simplified the management of SME's in order to reduce bureaucracy.
The new law also developed and enhanced the use of micro-credit. It is now open to everyone without social criteria. Moreover, the French government has facilitated the creation of industrial and commercial patents.
In 2009, under the EU’s Services Directive, France set up a one-stop-shop called the "Guichet entreprise". It aims at facilitating the creation of companies in France sector by sector.

description.hltext_display: Mondolingua MyCard Service: Dieses Jahr - Weihnachtsgurke?
description.content:
Mondolingua hat kurzerhand eine Webapplikation ins Netz gestellt, womit man sich selbst, den lieben Verwandten, den Freunden und Bekannten ganz individuelle Kartenmotive entwerfen kann. Egal ob klassisch mit Christbaum oder irrwitzig mit verkleidetem Elchhund, für jeden Geschmack liegen ausgewählte, frei verwendbare Hintergrundbilder und Vorlagen bereit. Motive, Texte und Grafiken lassen sich ganz einfach auswechseln, abändern und gestalten. Die fertige Glückwunschkarte lässt sich danach ausdrucken oder als Datei lokal abspeichern.
Natürlich dürfen Feinspitze ihre ganz individuellen Kartenmotive selber entwerfen und eigene Bilder hochladen. Mondolingua setzt da kaum Grenzen.
Die Nutzung der Applikation ist übrigens kostenlos.
Als Grund warum diese Webapplikation zur Verfügung gestellt wird, nennt das Team von Mondolingua: "Gutes wünschen, Nützlich sein und Freude schenken - das ist für uns Weihnachten!".
* Die Weihnachtsgurke gibt es selbstverständlich auch als Kartenhintergrund.
Hier geht es zur Mondolingua MyCard Webapplikation >>
Über Mondolingua
Die Salzburger Firma "Mondolingua Professionelle Übersetzung und Kommunikation" http://www.mondolingua.com führt Fachübersetzungen in alle gängigen Sprachen durch. Mondolingua ist auf das komplexe Management mehrsprachiger Übersetzungsprojekte umfangreicher Printmedien (Web2Print), Softwarepaketen, Firmware, technischen Dokumentationen und ambitionierten Webapplikationen spezialisiert.
Mondolingua setzt ausschließlich auf erfahrene, ausgebildete muttersprachliche Übersetzer/innen, die sowohl in der eigenen als auch in der Fremdsprache über eine hohe interkulturelle Kompetenz verfügen.
Als besonderen Service bietet Mondolingua auch kostengünstige internationalisierbare Website-Komplettlösungen für Ein-Personen-Unternehmen (EPU) an. http://www.mondolingua.com/dcs (Ende)
Aussender: Mondolingua Professionelle Übersetzungen in alle Sprachen

description.hltext_display: 香港救护车等候时间过长 逾半病人等候超半小时
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
香港医管局提供的非紧急救护车载送服务，被指令病人等候太长时间，医管局将成立专责小组检讨服务。图片来源：香港明报
中新网12月22日电 据香港明报报道，香港医管局为病人提供载送服务，但有过半数使用者都要等候超过半小时，有更严重的个案是启程和回程均要等候1.5小时，原因是员工用膳或洗车。有病人出院当天才获知未能安排载送服务，结果要留院一晚。
医管局表示，一直透过不同措施加强非紧急救护车载送服务的运作，并将成立专责小组进一步检讨服务表现指标，包括出院或转院病人和门诊病人等候时间、研究与非牟利机构和商营机构合作可行性等。
为了善用紧急救护车资源，现时医管局有133部提供载送病人服务的救护车，载送那些卧胁病人、住所没升降机的坐轮椅病人，及没人陪同出院的精神不健全或感官机能受损病人。
申诉专员公署以问卷询问接受过该服务的34名病人及150名医管局员工，发现不少病人均不满意等候时间太长。其中有一个案，有门诊病人一早预约医管局的救护车接载往医院，结果在前往医院及回程都要等候逾1.5小时，原来该救护车在病人等候期间进行清洗和员工用膳，但有关单位没有通知病人。
另一个案是有病人在3天前预约出院载送服务，但到出院当天才获知无法安排服务，唯有使用其它交通工具返家；有住院病人因为到当天下午4时才获悉无法安排载送服务，结果要多留院一晚。
公署指出，医管局的服务标准是70%门诊病人在预约诊症时间30分钟内到达医院或诊所，但过去3年，超过半数个案未达服务标准，医管局应探讨原因。公署又指随人口老化，有关服务的需求会增加，建议政府发牌让私营机构营办有关服务，并在医管局的免费服务引进入息审查。

description.hltext_display: Will Immigrant Youth Ever Get to Live the American DREAM?
description.content:
/24-7PressRelease/ -- The oft-delayed Development, Relief, and Education for Alien Minors (DREAM) Act took one step forward and two steps back recently, as the United States House of Representatives passed a version of the legislation that would bring illegal immigrants who were brought to America as children a chance at citizenship. Less than one day later, however, the Senate tabled a vote that was supposed to take place, putting it on hold until further notice. Unfortunately, on December 18 the Senate, in a special Saturday session, voted against the bill, leaving the DREAM Act back in legislative limbo. The Act, which has been circulating in legislative circles in one form or another since 2003, will grant immigrant youth who meet certain criteria the ability to apply for a change in status that could eventually lead to Permanent Residence. The Act would apply to illegal immigrants who: - Are under the age of 30 - Arrived in the U.S. before the age of 16 - Have obtained (or are in the process of obtaining) a high school diploma or GED - Are willing to serve two years in the military or complete at least two years of post-secondary education - Are of good moral character - Have never been dishonorably discharged from military service Proponents of this latest version of the DREAM Act refer to its humanitarian and economic incentives -- they see the law as enabling well-intentioned youth who came to America through no fault of their own the chance at a better life. By allowing them a chance at secondary education and a chance at Permanent Residence, the law will give them the educational tools necessary to make a positive contribution to the U.S. economy through better-paying jobs and increased spending. Supporters also see the Act as the fair and compassionate way to treat those same youth, many of whom came here so young they have no memories of their home country, culture or language. Hopefully these same benefits will be present in the legislation when it is next proposed. Opponents of the legislation see it as actually incentivizing illegal immigration, and encourages illegal entry into the U.S., since it essentially provides amnesty to people who would otherwise be facing deportation. Senator Jeff Sessions of Alabama notes a fundamental unfairness in the law, saying that it offers "job and educational opportunities not available to some citizens who have always followed the law." Regardless of popular support or dissension, the law is off the table until the 2011 Congressional session begins. Even though the Act has just been voted down by the senate, those who see the positive benefits of the DREAM Act should contact their senators immediately. Without the protections offered by this act, there are thousands of youth in this country illegally who might not think they have any options for changing their status and becoming legal residents. If you have questions about seeking a visa, residency or becoming a citizen, seek the counsel of an experienced immigration law attorney in your area to find out more about your legal rights and options.
Article provided by Litwin & Associates, A Law Corporation Visit us at www.litwinlaw.com
---
Press release service and press release distribution provided by http://www.24-7pressrelease.com

event_or_fact.property: a fundamental unfairness in the law, saying that it offers "job and educational opportunities not available to some citizens who have always followed the law.

description.hltext_display: Plácido Domingo feiert 3500. Opern-Vorstellung
description.content:
vor 2 Min.
Wien (dpa) - Ein Blumenregen, eine riesige Torte und Glückwünsche an den «Weltmeister der Oper»: Startenor Plácido Domingo hat am Dienstagabend in Wien seine 3500. Opern-Vorstellung gefeiert. Diesen Artikel weiter lesen
«Ich bin glücklich, stolz und dankbar, dass ich dieses Ereignis hier feiern kann», sagte der Künstler bei einem Fest im Anschluss an die letzte Vorstellung der Oper «Il Postino» im Theater an der Wien. Der 69-Jährige, der im Frühjahr eine Krebsoperation überstanden hat, kündigte an: «Ich werde wiederkommen und alle meine Pläne verwirklichen».
Zahlreiche Künstlerkollegen, Fans und Freunde feierten mit dem spanischen Musiker. «Nach meiner 700. Vorstellung, das war 'La Traviata' in New York, habe ich beschlossen, immer nach 100 Aufführungen eine Party zu feiern», erzählte Domingo. «Mittlerweile habe ich überall auf der Welt gefeiert». Mitarbeiter des Theaters an der Wien überreichten dem Sänger eine große Torte, auf der ein stilisierter Bühnenvorhang zu sehen war. In schwarzen Buchstaben stand darauf: «3500 Vorstellungen - Der Weltmeister der Oper».

description.hltext_display: All round potential lands scholarship
description.content:
Tahatai Coast School pupil Havea Latu, 12, is heading to Auckland Grammar in 2011 on a prestigious scholarship. Photo / Claire Fraser.
The future looks bright for a Tauranga pupil after he was awarded a prestigious scholarship to one of Auckland's leading schools.
Twelve-year-old Havea Latu, from Tahatai Coast School, has been chosen from more than a dozen students from all over New Zealand as the recipient of the Cooper Connell Scholarship to Tibbs House, at Auckland Grammar School.
The scholarship will fund his five-year study at the school as well as boarding costs.
For Havea, the scholarship has given him the opportunity to work towards his dream of becoming an architect. It has also given him the chance to pursue his rugby passion and follow in his famous uncle's footsteps - Jonah Lomu.
"Mum called me and told me I had got the scholarship and I was so excited," Havea said.
"I'm pretty nervous about going up there but I'm looking forward to meeting the other kids."
Havea was shortlisted as one of five potential scholarship candidates. He had an interview with the judges, who asked him what his favourite subjects were and what he could offer to the school.
He doesn't remember what he replied but said he must have been picked because of his academic success in mathematics, reading and writing.
Scholarship criteria noted applicants must have "potential to achieve excellence in academic endeavours, allied with participation in sporting and cultural activities".
Tahatai Coast School's dual principal, Jenny Griggs, said Havea promoted all these characteristics and more.
"I've known Havea for eight years and right since he started, he's shown so much promise.
"He has certain attributes that make him a natural leader.
He is a student ambassador ... really he is the whole package.
Mrs Griggs said the school community was very proud of Havea's achievements, which brought the school "huge accolades".
"You've got to have a dream and I believe Havea is proof of that."

description.hltext_display: 美媒：2011年的欧洲“危”和“机”同在(图)
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 时值岁末，世界各大媒体都在盘点着过去一年全球各地的“得失”，也在为即将到来的新年谋划前景。
美国《外交政策》杂志就把目标对准了在2010年度经历危机的欧洲，撰文称，“2011年的欧洲，“危”还是“机”？
文章指出，对欧洲来说，过去的一年绝对称不上是容易的一年，而面对2011，情况仍不容乐观。
那种期望通过拯救爱尔兰的一揽子计划能够剿灭传播债务危机因子的举措似乎已失败，葡萄牙、意大利、西班牙和比利时面临的压力逐渐增大，如果情况继续恶化，欧盟和国际货币基金组织或采取某种结构性的措施驰援葡萄牙。但即使这样，危机也不会就此为止。
欧元区的观察家们已经开始质疑该区域的核心国家(特别是德国)是否有能力和意愿去承担超过现有欧洲金融市场稳定基金之外的救助资金，这种担忧提升了人们对欧元潜力和长期生存能力的质疑。
文章认为，如果人们放弃了欧元，那么这意味着所有人都输了。这种状况并非现实情境下的重大风险。未来数年，对于希腊、爱尔兰、西班牙、葡萄牙和意大利来说将尤其艰难。就宏观的层面来看，一个所谓的“南北鸿沟”似乎更加明确。对于南方，包含西欧和东欧国家，他们正面临着从财政政策到宏观经济平衡，再到经济竞争力等一系列层面的挑战，而这些问题短时间内又很难去克服；我们已经在一些国家看到了社会动荡的情景，2011年，这种局面或将更多。
从更广泛的意义上看，欧盟统一的进程在2010年正呈现出逆转的状况。日益扩大的利益鸿沟不仅在希腊等一些欧元区边缘国家显现，对于那些非欧元区的欧盟成员，如匈牙利、罗马尼亚和保加利亚，这种差距也日益明显。这种背离源自两个方面：对于欧盟为欧元区提供普遍援助预期的下降和东欧一些主体对接纳欧元政治热情的下降。
在2011年，对于联系更为紧密、更加统一的欧盟认知的怀疑似将甚嚣尘上。但与此同时，欧盟却也有机会好好的利用这次危机去重建自身的经济和金融体系。
决策者正沿着三条轨道在前行。首先，他们要建立一个永久性的危机应对机制，一种对欧洲金融市场稳定基金的扩充；第二个层面将包括建立已被资本市场忽视多年的财政改革；而第三部分的落脚点则在于宏观经济的平衡，核心是劳动力市场和推行司法改革以提高经济竞争力。
在12月中举行的首脑会议上，欧洲的领导人只是在这些议题上达成一些十分有限的协议。他们同意，建立常设机制以帮助债务缠身的欧元区国家摆脱困境。

description.hltext_display: Eu vill skärpa regler efter flygkaos

description.hltext_display: 海南省着手打造琼属华人华侨专业人才信息库
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 综合海南省外侨办消息，为了更好地利用国际人才智力资源，加快海南建设国际旅游岛的步伐，海南省提出加快实施海外高层次人才引进计划，并着手建立海南省高层次人才信息库。入选的人员均可享受相关税收优惠政策、给予创业启动经费、解决配偶子女的就业等方面的资助。
信息的采集将采取符合入选条件人员在线填写《琼属华人华侨人才信息库采集表》并提交方式进行资料整理。信息库采集工作将面对广大琼属华人华侨专业人才，包含现居国外人员和目前在海南省内工作的，为海南经济社会发展服务的各类优秀人才。凡是在国外科研、教育、企业、金融、医疗等机构任职多年，具有国际化背景的各类专业人员，或是在国外正规高等院校获得硕士以上学位的人员均符合入选条件。
该人才信息库的建立将遵循急需、自愿、互利、互赢的原则，欢迎广大琼属华人华侨专业人才踊跃响应。

description.hltext_display: Vd på Wackes: "Gåvokort gör alla nöjda ? men är lite charmlöst"
description.author: Victor Petersson
description.content:
Staffan Pousette är vd för Wackes som är stor distributör av företagsjulklappar.
Vad är årets företagsjulklapp? – Oj, det är svårt att säga. Men det finns ju ett par klassiker som alltid är populära. På den hårda sidan finns exempelvis hushållsartiklar. Exempelvis? – Stekpannor, kokkärl. Knivset är populärt, liksom kaffemuggar och ljusstakar. På den mjuka sidan finns handdukar, morgonrockar och plädar som varit vanligt på senare år. Hur skall man tänka för att hitta en bra julklapp till alla anställda? – Framförallt är det svårt med sådant som är storleksbaserat. Alltså kläder och liknande. Det skall passa alla, exempelvis handdukar. Någon ny trend på julklappssidan? – Friskvård har ökat starkt. Stavar och sådant. Populärt är också gåvokort där de anställda får välja bland sex-åtta olika prylar. Då blir alla nöjda, även om det är lite charmlöst. Det är ändå en julklapp.

description.hltext_display: Überschwemmungen: Sturmfront über Kalifornien
description.content: In San Diego in Kalifornien haben Feuerwehrmänner am Dienstag Menschen aus ihren Häusern in Sicherheit gebracht, da das Wasser wegen zahlreicher Regenfälle immer weiter anstieg. Zudem mussten die Einwohner im normalerweise sonnenverwöhnten Bundesstaat mit einer weiteren Sturmfront im Lauf des Tages rechnen, die heftigen Regen und starke Winde bringen sollte.

description.hltext_display: 印度在东部试射两枚“大地”-2型短程弹道导弹
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
我来说两句(0)
大中小
大中小
大中小
新华网孟买12月22日电（记者聂云）印度22日上午在东部沿海地区成功试射了两枚“大地”－2型短程弹道导弹。
当地媒体援引军方消息报道说，这次试射是在东部奥里萨邦沿海的钱迪普尔综合试验场进行的。综合试验场负责人达希说，这是印度武装部队进行的例行试验，试射获得了成功。
“大地”－2型是印度自行研制的地对地战术弹道导弹，射程为300公里左右，可携带常规弹头或核弹头。今年9月24日，印度曾进行“大地”－2型导弹试射，但没有成功。
(责任编辑：赵婷)

description.hltext_display: MENSUR SULJOVIC punished Michael van Gerwen for a host of missed doubles by claiming a 3-1 win in the first round of the the PDC Ladbrokes.com World Darts Championship at Alexandra Palace last night.
Ice hockey: Paul Ragan is new owner of Sheffield Steelers
description.author: Terry Phillips
description.content:
PAUL Ragan, the millionaire who helped transform Cardiff Devils into Elite League ice hockey title contenders, is the new owner of Sheffield Steelers.
Ragan has bought Devils’ rivals Steelers from former Cardiff owner Bob Phillips.
"The rivalry will continue and the teams will remain completely independent,” said Ragan, who has spent the last two days in Yorkshire setting up the deal.
The move underlines his complete commitment to ice hockey.
Ragan is the sole owner of Cardiff Devils and handed player-coach Gerad Adams the task of building a team to challenge for trophies.
He backed Adams when a new signing was needed – and gave the go-ahead to bring in former Minnesota and Philadelphia player Craig Weller.
Ragan is keen to tie both Adams and Sheffield coach Ben Simon to new deals taking them through to the end of next season.
"Both are important men in their respective organisations,” said Ragan. "They will each have the same amount of money – which will be up to the league wage cap – and backing in the future.
"This is a move to help stabilise Sheffield, a major club in Britain, and Elite League. It is also a sound business decision.”
Tonight the Devils play Hull Stingrays at Cardiff Bay Arena (7.30pm) without Brad Voth, who was handed a three-match suspension for a clash with the Steelers’ Neil Clarke. But the good news is that the 6ft 5ins Canadian’s ban has been slashed to one match, allowing him to face Coventry Blaze away on Boxing Day.

description.hltext_display: Cricket: No Glamorgan return for Maynard or Dalrymple
description.author: Gareth Griffiths
description.content:
THE prospect of former cricket manager Matthew Maynard and captain Jamie Dalrymple dramatically returning to Glamorgan appear to have now vanished.
Maynard, Dalrymple and president Peter Walker resigned last month after the changes at the club saw the installation of Colin Metson as managing director and South African opener Alviro Petersen as the new skipper.
Earlier this month, vice-chairman Nigel Roberts presented a set of proposals to the committee which included Maynard and Dalrymple returning to the club, but his suggestions were turned down.
Roberts resigned immediately, but when he changed his mind 72 hours later following a meeting with chairman Paul Russell, chief executive Alan Hamer and former ICC president David Morgan, the possibility emerged about Maynard’s return.
But time has lapsed and Maynard seems set to continue his coaching career elsewhere, while Glamorgan are battling to keep his disgruntled son Tom, who recently signed a long-term contract until 2013.
Glamorgan are also looking to appoint a first-team coach in early January with new skipper Petersen arriving in Wales to meet the players

description.hltext_display: Ltd Brands Set to Possibly Pullback after Yesterday's Rally of 2.16% (LTD)
description.content:
Ltd Brands (NYSE:LTD) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $31.03 to a high of $31.88. Yesterday, the shares gained 2.16%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $31.52 on volume of 2.5 million shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of Ltd Brands are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $31.09 and above their 200-day MA of $26.88. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Ltd Brands in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on September 03, 2010 at $26.13. The stock has risen 19% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $31.52 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Apparel Stores industry.
Keywords: ltd brands trading range stock news

description.hltext_display: Ice hockey: Hull Stingrays have big warning for Cardiff Devils
description.author: Terry Phillips
description.content:
HULL Stingrays are warning Cardiff Devils: "Beware of the backlash.”
Player-coach Sylvain Cloutier and his Stingrays are on a mission against Devils at Cardiff Bay Arena tonight after being crushed 12-0 on their last visit – in front of Sky TV cameras.
"We have something to prove tonight,” said Hull’s Canadian defenceman Trevor Read. "Cardiff are a powerful team on their own ice and the hottest team in Britain right now, but they are far from invincible.
"And we will do everything possible to prove that.”
Stingrays have won four and drawn one of their last seven games, while they have won eight of their last 14.
Cardiff go into the home clash with Hull having won their last 12 league games, including that 12-goal mauling of Stingrays.
"The last time we were down there it wasn’t pretty,” said Read. "We didn’t show up and we have something big to prove this time.
"We must be mentally ready to play from the off. Cardiff are the hottest team around right now. We’ll have to weather the storm in the first five minutes or so, keep things simple and not try anything fancy or cute.
"Cardiff use their home ice to advantage really well and not many teams go down there and win. But they are not invincible. If we compete, work hard and keep things simple, then we will give ourselves a chance to win the game.”
Hull, who include former Cardiff sharpshooter Jay Latulippe, carry a threat underlined by wins against Belfast Giants and Sheffield Steelers at home and Nottingham Panthers away. Stingrays also fought out a Challenge Cup tie against Nottingham at home.
"We have caught the attention of the other teams, who now know Hull are not an easy team to play against any more,” said Read.
Read’s Hull team-mate Ryan Lake is also intent on creating a stir against Devils tonight, saying: "It’s a massive game for us.
"We have to send a message we are not a bad team on the road. After that 12-0 defeat every guy wants to go and try and prove they are mentally ready to put on a show.”
Stingrays travel on the back of a disappointing 2-0 defeat to Coventry in their last Challenge Cup game.
Devils follow tonight’s clash with Hull Stingrays by preparing for three games in three days after Christmas – Coventry Blaze away on Boxing Day before the teams meet again in Cardiff Bay Arena the next day (both 6pm). Devils fly to play Belfast Giants in Northern Ireland on Tuesday, December 28 (7.30pm).
Blaze coach Paul Thompson has confirmed defenceman Jason Robinson will miss the Christmas double-header with Cardiff Devils because he is returning to Canada.
The 32-year-old rejoined Blaze last month as cover for the injured Jeff Smith, who has been ruled out until the new year, and has played 11 games for the defending Elite League champions. He is now going home, but could be back in the new year.
With captain Jonathan Weaver, Matt Soderstrom and Brian Lee sidelined with injury, Robinson’s absence leaves Brad Zanon as Thompson’s only regular defenceman.
James Pease and Antti Kohvakka have stepped in, but it is likely former Devils forward Russ Cowley will drop back on defence when Cardiff visit the Skydome on Boxing Day before they return in South Wales the following night.
Ticket information for tonight’s Elite League match against Hull Stingrays is available from the box office on 029 2038 2001. Tickets will also be available on the door before face-off.
Season ticket holders have an offer to buy a guest ticket to the game against Hull this evening for £5. Full details are available on the official Devils website at www.cardiffdevils.com

description.hltext_display: Local Mason installed as Grand Master
description.content:
Oscar C. Gonzalez, a past master and current chaplain of Robstown Masonic Lodge No. 1062 and a member of Sunset Masonic Lodge 1388, was installed as the 79th District Deputy Grand Master for the 120th Masonic District of the Most Worshipful Grand Lodge of Texas, by Most Worshipful Grand Master T.E. (Gene) Carnes, Grand Master of Masons in Texas, in the Grand Annual Communication held in Waco on Dec. 4, together with 145 other past masters from the State of Texas, who were also installed as D.D.G.M. for their respected districts.
The District Deputy Grand Master is the personal representative of the Most Worshipful Grand Master in the District. His duty is to effectively communicate and work closely with the Masters of the District Masonic Lodges in the advancement and promotion of the Grand Lodge programs and activities for the year.

description.hltext_display: Cricket: Mohammad Amir?s lawyer has faith in tribunal
description.author: Our Correspondent
description.content:
THE lawyer of teenage pace bowler Mohammad Amir insists he has faith in the ICC-appointed tribunal which will decide the fate of his client and two other players implicated in the Pakistan spot-fixing scandal.
Amir, along with Mohammad Asif and Salman Butt, will face an ICC hearing in Doha starting on January 6.
At present the trio cannot play competitively and have had their Pakistan contracts withdrawn, and face possible life bans from the sport if found guilty of spot-fixing charges.
Michael Beloff QC will chair next month’s three-man tribunal to adjudicate on allegations that Amir and Asif bowled no-balls to order in the fourth Test against England in August, with Butt orchestrating events as skipper.

description.hltext_display: Selmsdorf - Internetradio geht auf Sendung
description.content:
Die Gemeinde unterstützt einheimisches Internetradio. Ein Ziel: Jugendlichen eine sinnvolle Freizeitbeschäftigung bieten. Initiator Ronald Krupinsky sucht Moderatoren.
Selmsdorf (OZ) - Vor allem Jugendliche haben die Selmsdorfer Gemeindevertreter mit der Unterstützung des „Radios Selmsdorf“ im Sinn. „Ich finde es gut. Es gibt hier in der Region nichts Vergleichbares“, sagt Detlef Lüth von der Wählergemeinschaft „Bürger für Selmsdorf“. Er stellte mit Erfolg den Antrag, das Internetradio mit der Webadresse www.radio-selmsdorf.de für eine vierteljährliche Testphase mit 200 Euro pro Monat zu unterstützen und damit zumindest einen Teil der Kosten zu übernehmen. Danach wird die Gemeindevertretung erneut beraten.
„Wir wollen überwiegend die Jugend ansprechen. Meiner Meinung nach wird für sie zu wenig gemacht“, sagt der Macher von „Radio Selmsdorf“, Ronald Krupinsky. Jugendliche seien besonders offen für neue Medien. Ein guter Internetradiosender könne außerdem das Image der Gemeinde fördern. Mitmachen dürfe jeder, der mindestens 15 Jahre alt sei. „Aber nur jemand, der auch in der Gemeinde wohnt. Ich will ja schließlich vor allem die Jugend hier unterstützen“, erläutert Krupinsky. Aber auch Erwachsene seien willkommen. Es solle ein Angebot „aus der Region für die Region“ werden. Interessenten sollten ihn anrufen unter 03 88 23/5 56 37. Einige Jugendliche haben bereits signalisiert, dass sie bei „Radio Selmsdorf“ mitmachen wollen.
Künftige Moderatoren müssen nicht jedes Mal in Krupinskys Studio gehen. Sie können sich nach einer vorherigen Einweisung zu Hause am Computer einloggen, um Audio- oder Bilddaten einzuspielen. „Das einzige, was sie zusätzlich brauchen, ist ein Headset und eine Webcam“, erläutert Ronald Krupinsky.
Er kann sich vorstellen, dass nachmittags vor allem ein Programm für Kinder und Jugendliche online geht und abends eher Erwachsene angesprochen werden. „Das wird noch mit den Moderatoren besprochen“, sagt der 45-Jährige, der in der Ernst-Thälmann-Straße einen „Netzwerk Selmsdorf“ genannten Betrieb für Computerdienstleistungen führt. Er betont: „Wir wollen Radio Selmsdorf nicht kompliziert machen.
Es wird locker vom Hocker passieren.“ Auf jeden Fall sollten Informationen über das Geschehen in der Region Teil des Programms sein. Denkbar sei auch, sich Gäste aus Selmsdorf und Umgebung einzuladen. Zuhörer und Zuschauer könnten ihnen dann Fragen stellen.
Online ist „Radio Selmsdorf“ bereits. „Musik läuft immer — zumindest der Auto-DJ und einen Chat haben wir auch“, erläutert Krupinsky. Am Wochenende gebe es eine „Wunschbox“. Dann dürften sich Empfänger des Internetradios per E-Mail Songs wünschen.
Die Leidenschaft fürs neue Medium begann bei Krupinsky vor sechs Jahren. Zeitweise war er im Internet Moderator bei „Popradio“. In früheren Jahren arbeitete er nebenbei als Diskjockey und spielte am Theater. Die darstellende Kunst hat ihn seit Schulzeiten nicht mehr losgelassen. Ronald Krupinsky spielte bereits in den Serien „Großstadtrevier“, „Familien im Brennpunkt“, „Niedrich und Kuhnt“, „Barbara Salesch“ und „K 11 — Kommissare im Einsatz“.
So funktioniert Internetradio
Jeder Computer kann heute zu einem Radiosender werden — vorausgesetzt, er verfügt über einen leistungsfähigen Internetanschluss und die nötige Software. Selbst produziertes Material darf der Internetradiomacher kostenlos verbreiten. Gebühren an die Gesellschaft für musikalische Aufführungs- und mechanische Vervielfältigungsrechte (GEMA) hat er dagegen zu zahlen, wenn er Musik oder Bilder abspielt, die dem Urheberrecht unterliegen. Weitere Kosten entstehen dem Internetradiomacher durch das übertragene Datenvolumen.
Mögliche Empfänger des Web-Radios sind neben anderen Computern auch moderne Handys, einige Spielekonsolen und spezielle Geräte, die an eine Stereoanlage anzuschließen sind. Im Gegensatz zum klassischen Rundfunk kann ein Webradiosender nicht von beliebig vielen Empfängern genutzt werden. Eingeschränkt wird die moderne Form des Radios dadurch, dass die Ton- und Bilddateien beim sogenannten Streaming für jeden Benutzer gesondert zwischen dem Server des Senders und dem Computer des Benutzers übertragen werden müssen. jl

description.hltext_display: 联合国安理会倾听来自新一代声音
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
新华网联合国12月21日电（记者白洁 顾震球）请放弃购买武器，用一件武器交换一个微笑――委内瑞拉女孩埃斯特拉达说。
请帮助我的国家建立持久和平――刚果（金）的女孩拉马扎尼说。
全世界的青少年们，请你们帮助那些因贫困和缺乏教育而误入恐怖主义歧途的同龄人――突尼斯的贝萨西说。
这三名青少年讲话的视频21日晚在纽约联合国总部放映，是主题为“来自新一代的声音”的对话会的一部分。在这次对话会上，联合国安理会15个理事国的大使们与来自全球各地的170余名青少年代表齐聚一堂，共同探讨当今世界面临的威胁与挑战以及国际热点问题。
为吸引年轻一代关注安理会工作，安理会于12月初向全世界13岁到21岁的年轻人发出邀请，请他们通过视频或书面方式，对当今世界最重要的和平与安全挑战表达自己的观点。倡议得到踊跃回应，在不到一个月的时间里，来自世界90多个国家的900多名青少年发来了邮件或视频。
联合国秘书长潘基文在对话会上说：“这些年轻人今天对我们传达的信息非常简单和直接，我们必须行动起来，通过实际行动兑现诺言。我们面前的危机很多，安理会必须在现在、而不是在遥远的将来有所作为。” 潘基文特别提及他12月初赴墨西哥坎昆参加联合国气候变化大会时碰到的一个17岁女孩，女孩身上的Ｔ恤衫上写着：你们已经用了我一生的时间讨论，别再告诉我，你们需要更多的时间。
他说：“对我这一代人而言，联合国是一座希望的灯塔；对于新的一代，联合国同样应该为他们带来希望。”
在当天的会上，青少年们还就科特迪瓦局势、索马里问题、如何防范恐怖主义等与大使们进行了交流。
中国常驻联合国副代表王民在会上感谢青少年对国际和平与安全问题的关心以及对安理会工作的支持。他鼓励各国青少年继续关注国际和地区热点问题，通过亲身体验增加对世界的了解和认识，为世界的和平与发展作出自己的贡献。
安理会本月轮值主席国美国是本次对话的发起者。美国常驻联合国代表赖斯对青少年们的表现大加赞赏：“我们应该更多地倾听他们的思想，汲取他们的智慧，这对我们每天的工作也是很好的启发。”
来自纽约长岛高中的14岁中国女孩王裕卿告诉新华社记者，当天的活动让她“受益匪浅、收获良多”。尽管为参加对话会，她耽误了学校的课，“但课还可以再补，与安理会各国大使对话这样难得的机会又有多少人能够碰到呢”？

description.hltext_display: There will be no way back for Maynard
description.author: Gareth Griffiths
description.content:
THE prospect of former cricket manager Matthew Maynard and captain Jamie Dalrymple dramatically returning to Glamorgan appear to have now vanished.
Maynard, Dalrymple and president Peter Walker resigned last month after the changes at the club saw the installation of Colin Metson as managing director and South African opener Alviro Petersen as the new skipper.
Earlier this month, vice-chairman Nigel Roberts presented a set of proposals to the committee which included Maynard and Dalrymple returning to the club, but his suggestions were turned down.
Roberts resigned immediately, but when he changed his mind 72 hours later following a meeting with chairman Paul Russell, chief executive Alan Hamer and former ICC President David Morgan, the possibility emerged about Maynard’s return.
But time has lapsed and Maynard seems set to continue his coaching career elsewhere, while Glamorgan are battling to keep his disgruntled son Tom, who recently signed a long-term contract until 2013.
Glamorgan are also looking to appoint a first-team coach in early January with new skipper Petersen arriving in Wales to meet the players
Metson last week travelled to Australia to speak to candidates with former Glamorgan batsman Matthew Elliott remaining the favourite, while New South Wales coach Matthew Mott has also been linked with the role.

description.hltext_display: Cricker: Alastair Cook happy to take on MCG challenge
description.author: Our Correspondent
description.content:
ENGLAND are out to prove their mettle at the MCG, by adapting successfully to whatever conditions meet them there.
Much intrigue surrounds the nature of the drop-in pitch which will be used for the Boxing Day Ashes Test, groundsman Cameron Hodgkins having reportedly abandoned his initial first choice in favour of a grassier and much livelier surface.
The switch, however, pre-dates England’s evident failure to cope with the demands of the pace and bounce of the WACA on their way to landslide, series-levelling defeat in the third Test.
Among those who could not come to terms with the vagaries of Perth was opener Alastair Cook – whose sequence of half-century, unbeaten double-century and then century came to an abrupt halt with scores of 32 and 13.
He is nonetheless looking forward to testing himself again in Melbourne, as England seek to re-establish a lead which would mean the Ashes are retained after all by the end of the year.
Cook would have it no other way either than that the home team are allowed to make the most of their advantage.
"That is the beauty of home conditions, isn’t it?” he asked.
"You can prepare a pitch, you hope, to suit the home side.”
England notably secured the 2009 Ashes on a Brit Oval surface which was controversially untypical of that venue – and Cook appears to have no problem with serving up expedient pitches.
"That is what we try to do in England in certain cases,” he said.
"There is no reason I would expect Australia not to do it.
"If you went to India, and they played three spinners and produced a green seamer you’d be wondering what’s going on.
"That is what home advantage is, and you’d expect everyone to do it.”
Having chosen to play in England’s tour match against Victoria two weeks ago – when it seemed he might be due a rest after his heroics in this winter’s first two Tests – Cook could make only 37 in two innings, on his previous trip to the MCG.
Those two relative failures came in a dreary draw on a dreadfully slow and unresponsive wicket.
Australia captain Ricky Ponting has since claimed English batsmen are vulnerable on quick and bouncy pitches, both before and after his opinion was born out by events at the WACA.
However the Boxing Day drop-in plays, though, Cook is happy to back his and his team’s ability.
"The pitch is out of our control, and that’s the beauty of cricket that conditions change from week to week,” he said.
"It’s how you adapt to those that determines how successful you are.”

description.hltext_display: Motorsport: Jerome D?Ambrosio signed up by Virgin Racing
description.author: Our Correspondent
description.content:
VIRGIN Racing have confirmed Jerome D’Ambrosio will drive for the team from the start of the 2011 Formula One season.
The 24-year-old Belgian has been signed to partner Timo Glock after impressing during a number of Friday practice outings for the team at selected grands prix last season.
The announcement leaves Lucas Di Grassi without a drive for 2011, the Brazilian driver having failed to live up to expectations in the team’s debut campaign.
"I’m thrilled to have achieved my goal of a Formula One race seat with Marussia Virgin Racing,” D’Ambrosio said.
"When I came to the team in September this year it was everything I could hope for. I had a tough test to complete because there was a lot of competition for this seat, but, at the same time, I got on well with the team and felt that I had found my home.
"I feel very comfortable with them – they are extremely professional and ambitious people and it is exciting to think that I can be a part of shaping the team’s future.”
D’Ambrosio has spent the past four seasons competing in the GP2 Series, following earlier stints in GP2 Asia, F3000 Euroseries and Formula Renault.
He also held the role of reserve and test driver for the Renault F1 team last season, and enjoyed a successful evaluation period with Virgin which led to his move up.

description.hltext_display: Coach quits England
description.author: Our Correspondent
description.content:
BADMINTON England are beginning an urgent search for a new Great Britain head coach following the sudden resignation of Andy Wood.
Wood, who led the team at three Olympics, stepped down yesterday – just 19 months before he was due to guide their quest for medals on home soil at the next Games in London.
His decision is the latest in a series of events which have rocked the governing body in the build-up to an Olympics viewed as critical for the sport’s future in the country.
A fortnight ago Badminton England, who also administer the British Olympic team, had their UK Sport funding cut by £540,000 after failing to reach major tournament targets.

description.hltext_display: Bergen - Familienfreundlich: Fünf Rügener Firmen ausgezeichnet
Boys make the grade in BoxFit
description.content:
Ten young lads graduated with distinction last week from a BoxFit programme run by Te Puke Police.
Ten young lads graduated with distinction last week from a BoxFit programme run by Te Puke Police.
In an effort to build relationships with youth at risk around Te Puke, police iwi liaison officer Tawhai Norman gathered the names of youngsters, from the high school and other sources, who might benefit from a fitness-based confidence programme.
Over the past year about 40 youngsters have been part of four six-week courses run every Friday night in the Baptist Church gymnasium by a personal trainer Steve Jennings and several police officers including Constables Norman, Rameka Poihipi, Justin McDowell and Sergeant Mike Owen, with support from Senior Sergeant Deidre Lack.
Members of the Baptist congregation also had a hand in setting up and assisting the programme. Their youth trust found money for boxing gloves and to met other costs.
"This programme started after a chat with Ed Pollard," says Constable Norman. "He really made all the rest fall into place. He and others from the church went so far as to drive the boys home at night after training.
"We asked only commitment from the boys and told their parents and carers there would be no cost to them.
"The boys here tonight are the ones who didn't go away after their six-week course.
They wanted to keep training and many of them became mentors to the new boys on the courses that followed theirs," says Tawhai.
The graduates were: Robertson and Deveraux Whareaorere, Clay Weston, Rauora Takuira Mita, Nesta Kitisene, Luke Heybloom, Luke Diprose, Atana Tarawa, Mikaere Armstrong and Iehu Kokiri.
The guest speaker who presented the certificates was Senior Sergeant Warwick Morehu from Rotorua. The boys had decided they wanted "a big dude" to do the job.
Mr Morehu congratulated the boys on their achievements and Constable Norman on the success of the programme.
The Western Bay police area commander, Inspector Mike Clement, attended the graduation. Western Bay deputy mayor Paul Thomas represented Te Puke Community Board which contributed to the graduation dinner at Rangiuru Sports Club.

description.hltext_display: SUA. O femeie înarmată a ameninţat că se sinucide pe holurile unei televiziuni de ştiri
description.content:
Foto: Antena 3
Jurnaliştii unei televiziuni de ştiri din Statele Unite au trecut prin mari emoţii, aseară, când o femeie înarmată a pătruns în holul redacţiei. Emisia a fost întreruptă iar clădirea a fost evacuată, dar nimeni nu a fost în pericol.
Femeia şi-a îndreptat arma doar asupra ei înseşi, ameninţând că se sinucide dacă nu i se permite să vorbească în direct. După intervenţia poliţiei, ea şi-a predat, totuşi, arma, care, de altfel, nici nu era încărcată.
Potrivit directorului staţiei, femeia avea probleme financiare şi nu dorea decât să i se dea atenţie. Ea a fost dusă la spital, pentru o evaluare psihiatrică.
SUA: O femeie înarmată a ameninţat că se sinucide în faţa unor jurnalişti

description.hltext_display: After Yesterday's Rally of 1.65%, Range Resources Shares Could Potentially Pullback (RRC)
description.content:
Range Resources (NYSE:RRC) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $43.62 to a high of $44.60. Yesterday, the shares gained 1.65%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $43.57 on volume of 1.8 million shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of Range Resources are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $40.56 and above their 200-day MA of $42.26. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Range Resources in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on September 09, 2010 at $36.55. The stock has risen 19.1% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $43.57 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Independent Oil & Gas industry.

Eckoh Gets 3 Year Speech Recognition Contract For Premier Inn
description.content:
LONDON -(Dow Jones)- Eckoh PLC (ECK.LN), a developer of speech recognition solutions for customer contact centers, said Wednesday it has secured a significant three-year contract to provide speech recognition services to Premier Inn, whose parent company is Whitbread PLC (WTB.LN).
MAIN FACTS:
-The contract is for the provision of a fully PCI DSS compliant speech enabled reservations and cancellations service to Whitbread's hotel brand, Premier Inn.
-The service, due to be deployed in March 2011, will provide Premier Inn customers with the ability to book and cancel rooms at any Premier Inn hotel throughout the U.K.
-Eckoh shares closed Tuesday at 6.6 pence.

description.hltext_display: Kinder machen wegweisende Entdeckung bei Hummeln
description.content:
Kinder des britischen Blackawton School in Devonshire bei einem ihre Hummel-Experimente.
London (dpa) - Kinder an die Forschungs-Macht: Britische Schulkinder haben eine wegweisende Entdeckung zum Gedächtnis von Hummeln gemacht und wurden damit - als erste Schulklasse überhaupt - mit einer Veröffentlichung in einem hoch angesehen Fachjournal belohnt.
Die acht bis zehn Jahre alten Kinder der britischen Blackawton School in Devonshire hatten sich damit auseinandergesetzt, wie Hummeln Farben wahrnehmen und sich merken können. Ihre Erkenntnisse sind in einer Fachzeitschrift, den Biologischen Briefen der britischen Akademie «Royal Society» vom Mittwoch, veröffentlicht.
Die jungen Forscher konnten mit ihren Experimenten nachweisen, dass Hummeln Farben und Muster im Gehirn aufnehmen können und sie in der Lage sind, sich diese danach zu merken. Die Farberkennung bei Insekten ist nach wie vor generell nur wenig erforscht. Die Arbeit der Kinder bedeutete einen wirklichen Fortschritt für die Forschung, heißt es in dem Magazin.
Die Kinder hatten einen Plexiglaskubus gebaut. In diesem stand für die Hummeln Zuckerwasser hinter verschiedenen farblich gekennzeichneten Flächen. Nach einer Trainingsphase merkten sich die markierten Tiere die Farbe der Zuckerwasser-Tröge und verschmähten die Farben, hinter denen Salzwasser stand - auch nach einem Positionswechsel.
Die Forschungsarbeit der Kinder wurde - wie bei Veröffentlichungen der «Royal Society» üblich - von anderen Wissenschaftlern geprüft. «Die Forscher haben sich eine wissenschaftliche Frage gestellt und sie richtig beantwortet», heißt es im Kommentar. Lediglich Verweise auf frühere Forschungsarbeiten fehlten. Dies sei aber damit zu erklären, dass Grundschüler nicht unbedingt Zugang zu wissenschaftlichen Bibliotheken hätten.
«Ich bin hocherfreut, dass diese Arbeit in den Biologischen Briefen veröffentlicht wird», sagte der Rektor der Blackawton School, Dave Strudwick. «Das Projekt bedeutet eine völlig neue Art des Arbeitens und des Lernens und ich hoffe, dass andere Schulen diesem Beispiel folgen», sagte er. Professor Brian Charlesworth, Herausgeber der Zeitschrift, sagte: «Ich hoffe, das wird andere Gruppen dazu bringen, zu realisieren, dass Wissenschaft kein exklusiver Club ist, sondern für jeden erreichbar.»

description.hltext_display: Warnemünde - Geschäfte machen Winterpause
Ambassadors on the job
description.content:
The Summer Ambassador team will be out and about around the Bay with all you need to know this summer. Photo / Laura Mcleay.
The Summer Ambassadors are back and stocked up with loads of freebies to give away.
They are out around the Bay from December 18 to January 5 informing everyone about what is happening over the summer holiday period.
Ambassador organiser Helen Giles said the Mount is the place to be this summer.
"We are promoting the Mount as a safe place. We are helping it to become a more family orientated area over this time, and telling everyone about the fun things happening around the place."
The ambassadors can be found at the main beaches, in shopping centres or just walking around town. They are carrying a free Summer Passport, full of everything people need to know about events, free buses, competitions they are running, stuff to do, cruise ship timetables, new year events and liquor bans.
Ambassador Kylie Forsythe, 21, is a Mount Maunganui local and guarantees they are all outgoing, approachable people.
"We are here to inform people and we have plenty of freebies to give away as well. Most people do appreciate the information, once they know who we are and what we are doing."
The main base for the ambassadors is on Marine Parade opposite Mt Drury in the small wooden portable room perched on the grass.
They are open from 9am to 5pm each day for people to go and find out information if the roaming ambassadors are nowhere in sight.
The team of eight have enjoyed the experience so far and Kylie says being an ambassador is about being able to relate to people of all ages and have a great time while doing it.
"It is something a bit different and very enjoyable. It is good to be out and about working with other people, meet some of the tourists, see where they have come from and what they are doing here."
As a part of this, they are surveying people regarding what they would like to see next summer in the way of events and new years programmes. If you have any ideas or want to let them know what you love about the Mount, stop and chat to the friendly team.
Summer Ambassadors was an initiative brought together by the Tauranga Police and City Council which has been going for 10 years.
Follow them on their

description.hltext_display: Truckers Say Port Registries Violate Federal Law
description.content:
Category: Trucking News
(Grain Valley, MO) – The Owner-Operator Independent Drivers Association (OOIDA), the New Jersey Motor Truck Association and the Port Drivers Federation 18 have filed a petition asking the Department of Transportation (DOT) for a determination that mandatory drayage truck registries conducted by various ports and the California Air Resources Board (CARB) are pre-empted by federal law. In order to prevent an unworkable patchwork of local and state laws that impede the efficient movement of goods in interstate commerce, the petitioners are asking that these registries be prohibited.
More and more over the past few years, port authorities are requiring interstate motor carriers to affix compliance decals, RFID tags (radio-frequency identification), or participate in mandatory registries as part of an environmental effort to reduce emissions. Failure to comply with the registries means denial of a motor carrier’s ability to offer service in the marketplace and potential fines. One state environmental agency, the California Air Resources Board, has also been conducting such a registry since 2007.
Petitioners argue that this practice violates Section 209(c) of the Federal Aviation Administration Authorization Act (FAAAA) resulting in a regulatory regime that affects the price, route, or service offered by motor carriers.
“Registries and their required identification stickers are essentially a de facto re-regulation of interstate commerce,” said OOIDA President Jim Johnston. “These illegal practices should not be carried out under the guise of compliance with environmental regulations.”
Congress enacted the FAAAA’s motor carrier pre-emption provision to ensure that the deregulation of the trucking industry was not replaced by a patchwork of inconsistent state laws and regulations. It was believed that such an overabundance of laws would not only place an undue burden on motor carriers engaged in interstate commerce, but also prevent competitive market forces from shaping the offerings of motor carriers.
“Failure by the DOT to uphold the law will undoubtedly encourage more authorities to adopt similar mandates that will impede efficient movement of goods,” added Johnston. “It’s a return to the worst of the things that deregulation did away with long ago.”
Further, because truck owners typically are required to place some type of identification on their trucks to evidence registration, petitioners also request a determination that additional identification requirements imposed through the use of registries are prohibited by Section 4306 of the Safe, Accountable, Flexible, Efficient Transportation Equity Act: A Legacy for Users (SAFETEA-LU).
“If the federal government does not act, trucking is headed back to the days where we had multiple credentials on our trucks, from dozens of fuel stickers to multiple plates. Congress outlawed those practices and now they are creeping back into trucking,” stated Johnston.
To read the petition click this link: Petition to U.S. DOT Dec. 2010
ABOUT THE PETITIONERS:
The Owner-Operator Independent Drivers Association is the largest national trade association representing the interests of small-business trucking professionals and professional truck drivers. The Association currently has more than 153,000 members nationwide. OOIDA was established in 1973 and is headquartered in the greater Kansas City, Mo., area.
The New Jersey Motor Truck Association (NJMTA) was founded in 1914 to protect and promote the interests of the New Jersey trucking industry. The association represents more than 500 fleets operating in New Jersey that employ well over 40,000 people, as well as, 200 Allied Members that serve the trucking industry. Our mission is to foster and promote sound economical and efficient service by motor carrier transportation; to promote safety and courtesy in highway transportation; to foster and support beneficial laws and regulations affecting the motor carrier industry; and to engage in any and all activities that will advance the interests of highway transportation and highway users generally.
The Port Drivers Federation 18 is a non-profit trade association representing the interests of approximately 1,000 members, independent owner-operators who primarily lease their trucks to motor carriers operating on and off the property of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey.

description.hltext_display: Stralsund - Abgeordnete stoppen Verkauf der Pflegeheime
description.content:
Spannende Abstimmung: Jetzt klafft Sieben-Millionen-Loch im Haushalt der Hansestadt.
Stralsund (OZ) - Angespannte Stimmung kurz vor dem Fest bei den Bürgerschaftsmitgliedern. Alle 43 Stadtvertreter waren gestern zur Sondersitzung ins Rathaus gekommen. Auf der Tagesordnung stand eine Entscheidung von besonderer Tragweite. Durch den Verkauf der Wohlfahrtseinrichtungen, die fünf Pflegeheime in der Stadt betreibt, sollte ein ausgeglichener Haushalt ohne Schulden erreicht werden.
Rund sieben Millionen Euro hätte das in die Kasse gespült. Wenn die Bürgerschaft mitgespielt hätte. Am Ende des Tages und nach heißer Debatte in nichtöffentlicher Sitzung freuten sich aber die Gegner, die vor einer Privatisierung gewarnt hatten.
Da half auch der Appell von Oberbürgermeister Alexander Badrow (CDU) zu Beginn der Beratung wenig. Er informierte, dass endlich der Ausstieg aus dem Stadthallenprojekt besiegelt ist und von den reservierten neun Millionen Euro 7,7 Millionen zurückfließen. Zusammen mit dem Geld aus dem Verkauf der Wohlfahrtseinrichtungen und dank intensiver Sparbemühungen könne somit endlich der Schuldenberg, der 2008 noch 20 Millionen Euro betrug, komplett abgebaut werden.
Man habe zwei Bewerber für die Pflegeheime gefunden, die garantieren, dass sich für die Mitarbeiter fünf Jahre lang nichts ändere und die Bewohner würden schon gar keine Nachteile haben. Der Vorschlag der Verwaltung in der Beschlussvorlage lautete, die gGmbH an den DRK-Landesverband zu veräußern.
Für Dramatik sorgte nach OZ-Informationen dann ein Antrag der Fraktion Bürger für Stralsund, die sich für den zweiten Bewerber, die Hestia Pflege- und Heimeinrichtung GmbH aus Stralsund, aussprach.
Mehrheitsgesellschafter ist dort die Damp-Gruppe, die auch das Hanse-Klinikum führt. Bei dieser Abstimmung gab es mit 21 zu 21 ein Patt, womit der Antrag abgelehnt war. Nach einer Auszeit wurde dann die Vorlage in ihrer Ursprungsfassung aufgerufen, die aber keine Mehrheit mehr fand.
In der Diskussion hatte Andrea Kühl (Die Linke) an das breite Protestbündnis gegen das Vorhaben erinnert. Zusammen mit SPD, Seniorenbeirat, Verdi und DGB war eine Unterschriftenaktion gestartet worden, wobei sich 3000 Bürger gegen den Verkauf aussprachen.
Es gebe nach wie vor keine Notwendigkeit, die Wohlfahrtseinrichtungen abzustoßen, so Andrea Kühl. „Sie liegen uns nicht auf der Tasche wie zum Beispiel der Ostseeflughafen Barth.“ Als „unverdächtigen Zeugen“ gegen die Privatisierung führte sie zum Schluss Otto von Bismarck ins Feld, der in einer Rede am 13. März 1884 sagte: „Hat der Staat die Pflicht, für seine hilflosen Mitbürger zu sorgen, oder hat er sie nicht? Ich behaupte, er hat diese Pflicht.“ Ute Bartel (SPD) und Jürgen Suhr (Forum Kommunalpolitik) bekräftigten, dass die Stadt bei einem Verkauf wichtige Einflussmöglichkeiten verlieren würde.
OB Alexander Badrow sagte nach der Sondersitzung gegenüber unserer Zeitung: „Im Haushalt fehlen jetzt sieben Millionen und ich kann im Moment nicht sagen, was wir machen. Wir müssen hart arbeiten und Alternativen finden, was nicht einfach sein wird und schwierige Entscheidungen nach sich zieht. Dieser Verkauf, der weit vor meiner Zeit als OB beschlossen wurde, wäre eine einmalige Chance gewesen, aus den Schulden rauszukommen. Und wir hatten Bedingungen ausgehandelt, die es so nie wieder geben wird.“
Im Haushalt fehlen nun sieben Millionen und ich weiß noch nicht, was wir machen.“Oberbürgermeister
Alexander Badrow

description.hltext_display: Brüderle: Null-Neuverschuldung 2014/2015 möglich
description.content:
Bundeswirtschaftsminister Rainer Brüderle (FDP). (Archivbild)
Berlin (dpa) - Dank des wirtschaftlichen Aufschwungs kann der Bund nach Einschätzung von Wirtschaftsminister Rainer Brüderle bereits 2014/2015 ohne neue Schulden auskommen.
Sollte sich das Wachstum als robust erweisen, könne die Rückführung der Neuverschuldung auf Null bis dahin realistisch sein, sagte er der «Rheinischen Post». Auch der FDP-Politiker Otto Fricke hält das für realistisch. Voraussetzungen seien neben Wachstum aber eine weiter sinkende Arbeitslosigkeit und eine Stabilisierung des Euro.

description.hltext_display: 华语偶像团生成状况：日子过得紧巴巴
description.content:
华语偶像天团生成状况调查：日子过得紧巴巴
棒棒堂2007年出道，原本有六名成员。
2010年，两名团员单飞，其余四名重组Lollipop-F。
自天王天后以来，“天”字辈里还多了一位后起之秀叫做“天团”。相信当看到Super-Junior、东方神起、Wonder Grils等偶像天团不仅在韩国人气爆棚，在中国也能赚个盆满钵满时，凡爱国的有识之士均会迅速产生一种Copy的想法。于是，至上励合、兄弟联、BOBO、i Me、M.I.C、A-ONE、HIT5、8090、SD5行堂，加上台湾的棒棒堂、黑涩会……这两年，国内的偶像团体们一茬一茬地长了出来。这些名字的含义一个比一个更难揣度，记忆性也一个比一个差，但这一切都不能阻挡他们冲向“天团”的决心。这些年轻的中国孩子学着韩国偶像天团的样子，留厚刘海、画粗黑眼线、在任何时刻都浓妆以待，跳着自以为很帅的舞蹈，期待着万千的宠爱。
这种偶像团体大冒进的形式很像前几年的港台，当时F4、5566、183club、Energy、可米小子、B.A.D、Boy’2、4 in Love等等层出不穷轮番登台。只是几年后，这种团体热就烟消云散，能留到现在的，实在寥寥。唯S.H.E、飞轮海，就算加上名存实亡的Twins，也只有三支而已―并且，活下来的，其模式都不怎么日韩。
这些自称“天团”的组合到底活得怎么样？他们有没有可以期待的光明未来？我们走访了媒体人，资深日饭韩饭，广告公司客户总监，演出商，至上励合经纪人，前可米小子成员安钧璨、申东靖等，试图让你了解到这股偶像潮流的前生后世。
华语天团生存现状调查：日子过得紧巴巴
一群年轻男孩女孩蹦蹦跳跳，所到之处总是热闹。舞台下的粉丝也是年纪轻轻的孩子，难免被帅气、可爱、会跳舞等等原因迷惑，青春期的游戏总是需要荷尔蒙陪伴。然而风光多是表面，能转化成实际的代言费、商演出场费、专辑销量的，相当寒酸。
知名度
媒体无视 寿命短暂
目前市场上偶像团体可谓层出不穷，国内有至上励合、兄弟联、BOBO、i Me、M.I.C、A-ONE、Hit5、8090、SD5行堂等接连出道，只是市场的容纳力有限，以上组合能被认可的甚少。其中至上励合可能是目前最被看好的一支，出道以来发行了两张专辑，有了一首大红曲目《棉花糖》，并且12月18日即将举办首场演唱会。M.I.C则出道不久，号称是太合麦田唱片公司培训了4年的秘密武器，走活力嘻哈男孩路线，因获公司力推，目前看上去声势不错。除此以外，其他团体基本都处于无声无息状态，记者调查了多位娱记，只有几位迟疑地表示略有印象外，大多数人迷惘地表示从未听说。
华语偶像团体的运作多是短线，匆忙的上马，注定了他们的寿命往往以三年为期。可米小子2002年11月才推出首张专辑，2005年就已经宣布解散。Energy顶着“史上最杀男孩团体”称号出道，同样3年时间就已经走向下坡路，最后无声无息消失。棒棒堂2007年发行首张专辑，2010年即有两位成员单飞，剩下4位另组组合Lolliplp-F。黑涩会2006年成团，单飞掉数人之后改名黑girl，这未能阻止悲剧的继续，2010年团队宣布正式解散。 2007年好男儿选秀出身的井柏然、付辛博组成BOBO组合，2010年俩人各自单飞……这些人们记忆里曾经走红过的团队尚且如此，那些不知名团队就更加短命了。团队解散后，通常团员各自在不同领域发展，包括演戏、主持、模特等等，也有不少彻底消失在娱乐圈。但迄今为止，在这些人中尚未出现大咖。
市场
反应平平 收入寒酸
“台湾是无论艺人啊还是组合啊，通告费一律是1350块台币，相当于200多人民币吧，我们可米小子是5个人，那就需要5个人分，公司还要抽成，分到每个人手里，大概就相当于人民币20多块”，安钧璨回忆起他的可米小子时代，就要感慨，做组合实在不是一个赚钱的职业。
没什么比行程单更能反映偶像的市场反应。至上励合和M.I.C近来这几个月的行程看起来都满满当当。因为将近年底，各类颁奖、晚会录制节目激增，让这两支团队的曝光率也大幅增加，而商演活动里，两支团队均以移动、联通、电信的歌友会为主，也有部分拼盘商演活动，发展势头不错。Hit5的活动相比要寥寥很多，除了一些通告性质的活动，商业演出很少。其他几支国内天团网络上干脆无法寻找到行程单，前景更是堪忧。据演出商透露，目前这几支组合身价最高的当属至上励合，与天娱旗下苏醒、魏晨等人的出场费基本持平，在新人里面已算得上是高价。
不过就算出场费持平，对商家来说，请一个组合的费用也比请单个艺人更高，一位快消品牌市场部负责人告诉记者，“要是请他们来外地做活动，机票、食宿，几个人的费用总比单人要高出许多”。好消息是，如果是对比同级别的艺人和组合，他们更愿意请组合参与一些活动，“只要预算充足，我们还是愿意请这些偶像组合参加我们的一些活动。台上有几个人总会比只有一个人热闹许多，并且组合一般都会有一些舞蹈，比较容易调动现场气氛”。
奥美北京的一位客户总监则对组合的代言市场做了这样的分析，“偶像组合的形象定位基本都是针对青少年市场，所以代言的话，他们适合的产品并不是特别多，一些服装、食品、数码可能会比较合适，汽车这样的就肯定不会找偶像组合代言。”
粉丝
各玩各的 随时变心
偶像团体的粉丝绝大部分是中小学生，与当年追着Twins跑的孩子一样，他们爱买偶像的写真集、周边产品，如果财力尚可，也会逃课去接机或参加歌迷会、演唱会。与当年追着Twins跑的孩子不同，这些粉丝团如今有了新讲究：唯饭、团饭、小团体饭、CP饭，偶像团队因人数众多而给粉丝带来了各种排列组合的乐趣，于是粉丝中有了这么多分类。唯饭是指只喜欢其中某个人；团饭是指喜欢团队的所有人，尤其信奉“当五只(注：歌迷爱称)一起出现的时候，某某团才是最完整的”之类信条；小团体饭则是喜欢团队的部分成员，对其他成员无感甚至讨厌；CP饭则是腐女，以发掘团队成员之间的各种“暧昧”为乐。更深一步的CP饭则是真爱饭，相信某某与某某之间一定是真爱，有时候会偏执到“是你们让我相信这个世界真的有这么美好的爱情存在”。
如前所述，多数偶像团体只能维持人气两三年，多的四五年，粉丝多数便要四散，接着就是销量惨淡，媒体版面越来越小，签售人数从几千人降到个位数，去外地做活动从有粉丝包车追赶到机场无人接机……以Energy成员牛奶的话说，从爆红到走衰，那种感觉就像坐电梯升上了101大厦，然后被直降到地下18层。当牛奶看到自己脸熟的昔日粉丝摇身变为飞轮海粉丝时，只能指着他，却说不出什么话来。
“你帅你年轻，但接下来永远都有比你更帅更年轻的”，安钧璨这么理解单个偶像团体的必然衰落。比粉丝爬墙更无可挽回的是粉丝年龄的增长，喜欢偶像团体是某个年龄段特有的热情，过了这个年龄段，以前附身在偶像身上的种种光环就会散去，过往的迷恋就像痊愈的感冒，再也无法影响你的生活。也因此，每一代人有每一代人的偶像，刚好是四五张唱片的寿命，年限一到，该单飞的单飞，该解散的解散。
偶像团体短命录
可米小子，2002年出道，2005年解散；Energy，2002年出道，2005年解散；黑涩会，2006年成团，后改名黑girl，2010年解散；BoBo，2007年通过选秀出道，2010年各自单飞；兄弟联，2007年出道，现在悄无声息。
华语天团培养方式：山寨心切 匆忙上马
日韩天团之所以爆红，并非没有道理：首先由一群想成名的孩子报名参加经纪公司的选拔大赛，经过层层选拔，最优秀者才有机会被留下受训。需要经历很多年的练习生训练，才有机会组团出道―出单曲、唱片、打榜、参加综艺节目。这一条造星流水线早已经被磨炼到足够工业化，很少出现失误，凡想捧红的艺人，几乎没有不成功的。
国内这些团体出道前也都经历过所谓的“特训”阶段。每个成员也都和日韩一样，在团队中担当不同角色，比如要有队长、要有负责回答媒体提问的发言人，还要有帅气王子、可爱宝贝等等各种各样的角色担当，大家统一留着厚厚的刘海，跳着可能是日韩老师编的舞蹈，MV风格也尽量向日韩靠拢。甚至，成员们还将自己的名字改成有着日韩风味的艺名，比如可米小子成员申东靖原名李水清、安钧璨原名黄益承，其“哈韩”之心可见一斑。
大概因为日韩模式的走红，国内这些团体也并不忌讳直接与日韩挂上联系。至上励合是天娱与韩国公司合作推出，成员里还有一位韩国人。同是天娱旗下的i Me血统更加复杂，5位成员里有3位是2009年超女出身，还有两位分别是韩国人和泰国人。
至上励合是目前这些日韩系组合里发展得最好的一支，也是最有资格代表所有这种类型团体揭露其养成模式的，特训的内容？组合最大的障碍？团员的友谊是如何维系的？让我们来听听至上励合经纪人陈小姐的意见。
出道前
韩国魔鬼特训半年
南都娱乐：现在韩国那边基本上所有的排行榜都被各类偶像团体控制着，将个人歌手挤到没有什么饭吃，你们和韩国那边的交流非常多，是怎么看待这种现象？
陈小姐：做偶像团体，不需要团队里面每一个人都非常全面，只需要每个人都有每个人的特点就可以，这个会跳，那个会唱，这个比较帅，那个比较可爱。这些人如果是单个出道，就不可能拥有这么多粉丝，做成组合的话，总会有人喜欢其中的某一款吧。所以做组合虽然投入更多，但反而比较安全。
南都娱乐：现在好像很流行去韩国特训？特训主要训练哪些方面？
陈小姐：不一定是韩国，也有其他团体去日本去台湾。至上励合出道前是去韩国特训了半年，当时的特训比较基础，包括声乐、舞蹈、形体、语言表达。比较特别的是我们还参加了韩国他们对自己艺人会做的实尾岛魔鬼特训，有夜间负重急行军、越野行军这些。当时还有团员因为特别爱美，接受不了在泥地里匍匐前进，所以这个训练还对意志有很大帮助。
南都娱乐：出道后还做这样的特训吗？
陈小姐：现在他们都太忙了，因为现实的原因不太可能再做出道前那样的特训，但平时我也不会放松对他们的要求，比如出去商演住在酒店里面，我会要求他们去酒店健身房做健身，把肌肉给我练出来，这是必须的。
团员关系
一件打歌服也能引发吵架打架
南都娱乐：团队磨合也是很重要的一个方面吧？
陈小姐：对，是的，这是比练歌练舞更重要的东西，甚至包括和经纪人之间的磨合，和总监、其他工作人员之间的磨合，因为一个组合不团结了，就很多事情干不了。
南都娱乐：如果成员之间不团结会给组合带来什么麻烦？
陈小姐：有一个已经解散的偶像团体就是因为不和，粉丝不和，偶像之间也不和，最后没办法，公司只好把他们分开。真的，不团结很难做，组合之间可以引发吵架的因素太多了，一件款式特别好的打歌服大家都想穿，但只能给一个人穿，MV的镜头，站位的顺序，谁站中间谁站两边，谁来承担发言人的角色……小到一句歌谁唱第一句，谁唱高潮部分，谁分到的词多谁分到的词少，这些都可以吵，甚至打起来。碰到没有大局观的成员，这个团队就只能玩完。
南都娱乐：你们平时怎么注意扼杀这些苗头？
陈小姐：我们经常开会，发现问题就立刻召集大家开会，把误解、猜忌都摊开来说，一个会能开三四个小时。至上励合的成员现在都住在一个小区，这个也是我们要求的，这样也方便平时大家相互沟通。
日韩原版参照
每天训练16个小时
在日本，99%的男子偶像团体均由著名喜爷爷的杰尼斯事务所制造，杰尼斯以“练习生模式”培养团体，每年都有200名左右的小杰尼斯成员作为公司的候补力量，小杰尼斯们从十几岁开始就被挑选进入公司，每天花大量的时间对他们进行漫长和严苛的培训。每年只有几个人经过严格筛选才出道。
“练习生模式”被韩国运用得更加残酷。韩国对偶像团体的依赖更严重――你打开每周各大榜单，会发现，榜单上的所有歌，几乎都是各个男女团体的作品，就算偶尔有几个独行侠艺人，他们也几乎都有曾经组团的历史。
日韩原版参照
十多岁同进公司同受训练
与从男孩到男人、后街男孩、西城男孩、汉森兄弟、真命天女等等这些典型的欧美偶像团体，其成员们通常打小就认识，要么有着表哥表弟这样的亲戚关系，要么是同一个社区的街坊邻居，或者是同学，关系都算得上铁。日韩由于成员十几岁就一同参加训练，到正式能够组团出道，彼此都已知根知底。韩国对于艺人的管理又尤为严格，为了方便管理，无论是练习生还是已经出道的偶像，统一住宿舍，经纪人寸步不离地控制着他们生活的一切，自由度也远低于日本模式，相对的，团员之间的磨合、了解也充分。
日韩原版参照
日本偶像团体维持时间最长
除了训练强度之外，属于韩国的特色还有，韩国演艺圈有非常明显和严格的等级制度，除了Rain、李孝利、宝儿几位顶级明星除外，歌手活在演艺圈金字塔的最底层，电视剧演员地位高于歌手，电影演员处在金字塔尖，能脱离歌手身份转向电视电影发展的明星甚少，这和杰尼斯艺人全部都有机会参演热门日剧就完全不同。日本很多偶像团体中的艺人其作为演员的光芒远胜过歌手，比如木村拓哉，他至今仍是SMAP团体成员。也因此，日本的偶像团体能维持的时间往往也超过韩国偶像团体。
总结 再过两年，谁还记得？
单飞也飞不出大咖，解散的也并不让人留恋。偶像团体在华语流行乐坛的屡屡失败，让人疑心不是偶然，而是必然。“毕竟日韩他们更有实力，像韩国艺人出道前每天要练16小时的舞，这就是我们都没做到的”，安钧璨总结自己的失败原因，但实际情况可能并非如此，比如练习生模式就很难想象可以搬到国内，有多少家长愿意将自己十岁刚出头的孩子送到娱乐公司，经受比在工地扛沙子还要辛苦的训练，以期他日他能成为一个明星？
这两年的偶像团体热，或许正如股市里的概念股泡沫，每隔几年就要熊熊地刮一次风，然后就被狠狠打击，留待几年后再次发芽，比如，谁还记得14年前出道的中国力量、青春美少女？

description.hltext_display: Greifswald - Nicht schon wieder: Das Streusalz geht aus
War Memorial honours Victoria Cross recipients
description.content:
The stories of the nation's Victoria Cross recipients will be on display from Friday, when the newly refurbished Hall of Valour at the Australian War Memorial (AWM) in Canberra opens to the public.
66 medals will be on display alongside the stories of the 31 recipients whose medals have not been recovered.
AWM director Steve Gower says the refurbished hall has the greater sense of honour that the recipients deserve.
"I think the imagination of the public will be captured by the stories," he said.
"This place is about people, not about strategy, tactics and equipment .. and there's no finer deed to be undertaken by a soldier, a sailor or an airman, than to be considered for a Victoria Cross."
Granite, sandstone, and bronze materials were chosen for the hall, to maintain a link with the rest of the memorial.
Architect Richard Johnson says the design aims to capture the stories of each recipient.
"There's a very personal story, as well as a big national story, so for us," he said.
"I think the challenge was how do we get that balance between the monumental, the symbolic and the personal."
