description.hltext_display: Use Of Investing Techniques And Following Of Tailor Made Stock Tips
description.content: Have you beginners tried the technical analysis method of finding potential stocks in India? All successful investors in the Indian stock market use this technique to make informed decisions. No matter what the tide of the market is, use of this method including the fundamental analysis technique does work wonders. As beginners in share stock trading, you may not be even familiar with such terminologies nor will stock tips familiarize you with the concepts. Why not first equip yourself with all the basics of the Indian stock market before you venture into trading. The right knowledge, staying updated with share stock trends, and use of investing tools will certainly help you experience a win-win situation in the NSE and BSE stock market.What is technical analysis of stocks in India? Well, the concept applies not only to the Indian stock market but also other world markets. Using this investing tool, you can forecast the direction of the prices of a particular NSE or BSE stock by considering the price and volume of past market data. All information is easily accessible online; you should only know which link you should visit for the relevant data. It is no easy task to uncover the price trends that affect the market; extensive study is a must. Though you may not be able to predict the future movement of prices of the concerned share stock by 100% yet you can at least come close to the predictions. If you have an idea about the overall performance including economic feat of the company, the NSE or BSE stock of which you are going to invest, you will know whether the direction of the price movement is up or down or stagnant. Generally, as witnessed in the Indian stock market, share stock prices have a tendency to move in a particular direction for quite some period of time. In case of fundamental analysis, the technique is completely different though there are limitations involved in both the procedures. This method involves consideration of earnings, dividends, financial standing, etc. of a particular company through research. Well, it is but a fact that there must be sellers when there are buyers. This is the criteria of every market and the Indian stock market is no exception. The balance of buying and selling is what matters to avoid turbulence in the market. But it is also a fact that the balance cannot be maintained always; fluctuations are bound to happen. As investors in share stock, it depends on how you sail through the volatility.Do you think following the aforementioned techniques and following stock tips suggested in common will help you take informed decisions of buying stocks in India? Of course not! Successful investors never stop gaining knowledge or conducting research. Yes, if you are stuck by hectic schedules, you may opt to avail the services of an expert broker. Getting tailor made stock tips from your broker will add to your informed buying decision.

description.hltext_display: La protection de l'environnement, l'affaire de chacun
description.content:
Alors que la vague de la mondialisation submerge chaque recoin de la planète, beaucoup de personnes s'inquiètent de la possibilité que la culture de l'Occident et ses valeurs, soutenues par la puissance écrasante des économies occidentales, anéantissent la grande diversité culturelle dans le monde. Or, cette diversité est enracinée dans l'identité des différents peuples et nations et contribue à préserver cette identité. Pour mettre en place une espace de communication entre l'Orient et l'Occident et pour faire connaître des opinions à partir de ces deux perspectives, nous lançons la rubrique « Convergence». Le directeur de la plus ancienne maison d'édition britannique – et très certainement du monde – et un haut fonctionnaire du Conseil des affaires d'État présenteront leurs commentaires sur des sujets de préoccupation commune, notamment la protection de l'environnement, l'éducation, de même que la science et technologie.
LE 3 novembre dernier, une cérémonie d'adoption de pandas a eu lieu au Centre de recherche sur la reproduction du panda géant, à Chengdu (Sichuan). À cette occasion, un bébé panda femelle de moins de trois mois a été adopté par la maison d'édition Cambridge University Press (CUP) et on l'a nommé Cambridge.
Ayant servi d'intermédiaire pour cet événement heureux et mémorable, j'ai donc eu la chance d'en être témoin. Au moment de tenir dans ses bras le beau bébé Cambridge, chacun de nous était excité et profondément touché.
Le panda est l'un des trésors nationaux de la Chine; il est l'emblème de notre pays, et plus particulièrement de Chengdu. Ambassadeur de bonne volonté de la Chine, des pandas sont envoyés dans beaucoup de pays, et certains d'entre eux y mettent bas. Aux yeux du peuple chinois, cela symbolise l'amitié durable entre la Chine et ces pays adoptants. Les toutes premières connaissances que certains étrangers ont eues de la Chine sont venues du panda qu'ils avaient vu au zoo durant leur enfance et, à la vue de ce bel animal, certains ont senti le besoin de découvrir son pays d'origine.

description.hltext_display: Short term loans: Instant financial remedy at its best
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 22, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
Conquering something, which you least expect is certainly an uphill task. This is what you have to face, while confronting monetary crisis all of a sudden. In case, you are someone, who rely more on the income sourced to sustain the needs, it is indeed a peculiar situation to be in. arranging the funds can only be done by counting upon external assistance. Since, the expenses cannot wait, you will have to look for such an option, through which you can derive the funds without any further delay. For the same reason, you can count upon the provision of short term loans.
As the name specifies, 3 month payday loans are released to you at a very short span of time, where in you are not required to pledge any collateral. Moreover, the lenders also have a tendency to release the amount without any credit check, which then opens up the loans, even for applicants with serious credit defaults. Without involving any collateral and the no credit check approval, the processing of the loans speeds up.
Of course, to avail these loans, there are some specific requirements, which you must fulfill, so as to qualify for it. Apparently, for the same reason, you must be employed in a reputed organization and that your monthly income should be a minimum of £1000. A valid bank account is also required and that your age should be more than 18 years.
Once you have qualified for these loans, you are free to source any amount in the range of £100-£1500. The reimbursement term is small and usually lasts for a period of 14-31 days. When it comes to the interest rate levied, you will find that these loans are a bit expensive. Even then, by making a comprehensive research of the loan market, you can definitely get to avail the funds at feasible terms.
Moreover, online application of the loans does allow you to acquire the funds instantly and that too without any documentation or paperwork.
Therefore, with short term loans, you have a definite chance to acquire funds, which then can be used to deal with any temporary emergency.

description.hltext_display: Александр Красненков: «Лучше бы такую игру «Спартака» никто не видел»
description.content:
Бывший президент «Спартака» Александр Красненков, ставший в понедельник главой РФБ, остался недоволен качеством игры питерской команды в матче Еврочелленджа против «Нижнего Новгорода» (92:83).
«Игра «Спартака» мне не понравилась в матче с «Нижним Новгородом». По крайней мере, на телевидении я такой матч не стал бы показывать. Лучше бы такой матч никто не видел. Возможно, причина в том, что матч ничего не решал ни для одной из команд», – цитирует Красненкова РИА Новости.

description.hltext_display: Wildcats Flag team works hard to earn first state title
description.content:
JIM HELMKE/Contributor The Floresville Wildcats Flag football team takes the field prior to their game. The team, comprised of 5-, 6-, and 7-year-olds, put together an impressive season record of 13-0 en route to the organization’s first-ever Texas state title.
Wilson County News
December 21, 2010
FLORESVILLE -- While the Texas high school football championships were decided in North Texas this past weekend, it’s also important not to overlook the accomplishments of another group of local football players -- the Floresville Wildcats Flag football team. After all, these pint-sized warriors of the gridiron proved they were the best by winning the Texas Youth Football Association’s Division II state title. . . .

description.hltext_display: British Airways cancels Christmas for Gulf expats
description.content:
The opening of Heathrow’s second runway may have resulted in a return to normal operations for Gulf carriers, but the cancellation of British Airways flights from the region has continued.
Two of the three British Airways flights from Dubai to Heathrow were cancelled on Wednesday, and the remaining flight has already departed.
Making matters worse, the British Airways website also states that two flights from Dubai will also be cancelled on Thursday, with only BA0104, which departs from the emirate at 1530 UAE time, leaving as normal.
The airline also appears to have cancelled BA0124 on Thursday, which was scheduled to depart from both Bahrain and Doha on the day before Christmas Eve. The following day’s flight has also been cancelled.
The airline is planning to offer a full schedule from Dubai on 24 December.
The cancellations are likely to heavily disrupt the plans of the Gulf’s expatriate community, many of whom are planning to return home at the end of the regional working week.
“I only found out because two of my friends were on the same flight and called me in a panic last night as they’d checked on line and it said it was cancelled,” said one Dubai-based expat.
“I doubled checked on line too and then I just immediately searched and booked another flight, pretty much at exactly the same time with Emirates but to Gatwick.
“It seems odd that Emirates are absolutely fine and have flights pretty much at the same time while British Airways is still a complete mess.”
The airline has worsened the confusion by allowing some passengers to check in for flights on the British Airways website, despite the fact that those flights had already been cancelled.
"I've got the boarding pass, and I could have gone to the airport," another Dubai-based Briton told Arabian Business. "But I've just rung the number to be told the flight is cancelled and they don't have any spare seats until Christmas Day".
Emirates announced on Tuesday that it had resumed normal operations and that flights in and out of Europe were operating as close to schedule as possible.
However, the UK has warned that worse weather may be on the way.
The UK’s Met Office said that there was still a risk of 25cm of snow in some places through Tuesday and Wednesday morning.
“Wintry weather is expected to continue as Christmas approaches, with heavy snow in some areas potentially leading to further disruption to travel networks,” the agency said.� The national forecaster also said that temperatures in the country would start to rise back above freezing by around midday on Thursday. �

description.hltext_display: '3G in India: Operator Launch Strategies' and Other Research Reports by Ovum Available at MarketPublishers.com
description.content:
LONDON, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Market Publishers Ltd informs that new in-demand market research reports by Ovum have been added to its catalogue. . The report describes data services targeted at specific market segments, provides the key to faster returns on network investments. The research provides the information on the operators that are now planning their network rollout and service strategies and discusses 3G launch strategies in India … . Banks are back in the market for global network services, with technology and manufacturing companies joining them as key innovators in communications. The report provides a detailed analysis of the global service providers...
America Movil. The research dwells on the company focus on bundled offerings and multi-play services as well as expanding 3G network capacity to drive the next phase of growth. The research discusses strategic objectives and the process of integration of newly acquired operations and stiff competition from regional and local players as key challenges … . The report provides a detailed analysis of how current MTRs were determined across the EU15 and look at how NRAs are taking the Recommendation into consideration as they undertake new market analyses. The research discusses EC recommendations aimed at harmonizing the charges across Europe … . This report describes the main HSPA+ enhancements brought by 3GPP R8, R9, and R10. It also offers early trends for these future HSPA+ options. The report provides technical overview of HSPA evolutionary options and mobile broadband connection forecasts for 2009-2015 …
More new market research reports by Ovum can be found at http://marketpublishers.com/members/ovum/info.html
CONTACTS

description.hltext_display: No faxing payday loans: Amazing fiscal deal for short term needs
description.content:
No faxing payday loans are a wonderful financial source to look upon at the time of emergency. These loans are specializes in providing quick cash relief to salaried employees before their next payday. These loans even don't contain the need of faxing unnecessary documents. The immediate cash help provided by the loan is enough to accomplish many urgent cash requirements within due time.
With no faxing payday loans you can superbly end your unplanned cash hurdles well on time and that too without facing any trouble. For getting the approval of these short term loans, you need to fulfill following eligibility criteria:-
Having an age of eighteen years or greater than that Having a valid healthy account in a bank Having a permanent employment in a reputed firm Having a minimum salary of £1000 per month
After meeting with the above mentioned eligibility criteria, you are free to access small cash help that may come in between £100-£1500. You have to pay back the loan amount within the short and easy repayment tenure of 2-4 weeks. The loan may charge with relatively more interest rate, because of its short term nature of finances. Don't panic! By researching online financial market carefully you will be able to find out bets loan deal at a reasonable rate.
The amount attained with no faxing payday loans are sufficient enough to tackle with a list of short term urgent financial requirements like pay out unpaid grocery bill, outstanding bank overdraft, unforeseen medical expense, credit card debts, small traveling expense and so forth.
The quick payday loans contain easy loan processing, as it comes with no faxing facility. Moreover, these loans don't even include hectic paperwork transaction and credit check hassles. Thus, lenders quickly sanction your loan and transfer funds in your checking account in a very less time.
So, pay off your small emergency expenses within due time.

распечатать| поместить в блог Атакующий защитник Ричард Хэмилтон опроверг сообщение The Detroit News о том, что он не хочет выступать за «Пистонс».
«В моей карьере наступили новые времена. Мне нельзя терять мотививацию, я должен выходить на площадку и помогать партнерам. Но меня очень задели слова источника из клуба о том, что я бросаю команду. Это очень неприятно, ведь на протяжении девяти лет в каждом матче я полностью выкладываюсь ради своей команды», – цитирует Хэмилтона MLive.com.

description.hltext_display: L'environnement : qui s'en préoccupe?
description.content:
CE n'est qu'une question de puissance, n'est-ce pas? Euh, est-ce cela? La puissance dans toutes ses diverses manifestations.
Tout le monde sait que le problème de l'environnement est dans les mains des deux grandes puissances modernes : les États-Unis et la Chine. Lequel est la pire des deux? Cela dépend si vous choisissez d'évaluer les émissions de CO2 par habitant ou la pollution totale du pays. Dans ce dernier cas, c'est la Chine qui est le mauvais garçon, principalement à cause de ses centrales électriques au charbon, d'un brun sale, qui ont surgi dans tout le pays au cours des trente dernières années, dans ses efforts inlassables d'être reconnue comme une puissance économique mondiale.
Évidemment, vu son immense territoire et son énorme population qui représente le cinquième du total de la Planète, la Chine devrait être reconnue comme une grande puissance. Mais la puissance n'est pas une simple question de chiffres : pour être une puissance mondiale, il faut prouver ses qualifications en termes mesurables. Pour ce faire, existe-t-il une meilleure voie que celle du rendement économique? Alors, pour y arriver, il est nécessaire d'avoir une plus grande puissance dans le domaine des centrales électriques – et rapidement! Ainsi, la puissance devient une sorte de prophétie qui se réalise d'elle-même : pour gagner en puissance, il faut bâtir sa puissance de production d'électricité, et le faire de façon massive. Et c'est ainsi que s'enclenche le cercle vicieux qui se nourrit de lui-même, sans jamais s'épuiser.
Mais la puissance de la production industrielle d'électricité n'est pas le seul problème pour l'environnement. Il est clair que la puissance de nos véhicules contribue beaucoup à polluer, et leurs émissions flottent sinistrement au-dessus des principales grandes villes d'Orient et d'Occident ; rouler en voiture constitue une activité essentiellement humaine. Et il y en a de nombreuses autres qui relèvent de la puissance de l'homme et affectent notre environnement. Pensons aux paysans qui font brûler la paille; aux ménages qui jettent des piles de déchets; aux bûcherons du Brésil et de l'Indonésie qui détruisent sans discernement les précieuses forêts tropicales; et, aux bergers africains qui poussent les animaux sauvages hors de leur habitat naturel.
Les hommes d'affaires tendent à se glorifier de leur créativité, mais ils semblent trouver qu'ils affrontent un obstacle insurmontable lorsqu'on leur demande de faire un peu quelque chose pour l'environnement. « Qu'est-ce qu'on peut faire, gémissent-ils, pour apporter la moindre amélioration à l'environnement? On est impuissant sur ce sujet! » En fait, ils ne le sont pas réellement. Par exemple, à ma maison d'édition, nous en avons pris des mesures : nous avons installé des dispositifs d'économie d'énergie dans nos entrepôts; nous recyclons tout ce qui peut l'être dans notre imprimerie, nos bureaux et la cantine de notre personnel; nous insistons également pour imprimer sur du papier provenant de bois de forêts exploitées de façon soutenable; nous fabriquons nos produits plus près de nos marchés, afin de réduire les émissions causées par le transport; et, nous avons pratiquement éliminé notre parc de véhicules pour remettre la puissance de nos actions sur l'environnement dans les mains de notre personnel. De plus, nous libérons du temps de notre personnel pour que les gens puissent accomplir quelques activités de régénération de l'environnement. Ce sont des idées simples qui peuvent s'appliquer dans tout type d'entreprises. Et, vous savez quoi? Les employés et les clients approuvent les programmes de ce type : ils sont bons pour la motivation et bons pour les affaires. « Est-ce bien vrai? », vous dites-vous. « Cela améliore les bénéfices nets? » Bien sûr que oui. Cela fonctionne pour Cambridge University Press, et je sais que cela fonctionne pour sir Stuart Rose, président de Marks & Spencer. L'impuissance n'est pas une excuse : chaque entreprise a la puissance de choisir de faire une différence dans son environnement de travail.
Il y a aussi des puissances plus subtiles qui peuvent être mises à contribution, notamment la puissance de persuasion ou d'incitation des idoles. En Chine comme ailleurs, des idoles comme l'étoile de basket-ball Yao Ming ont la puissance d'influencer les esprits. Les autorités de Chengdu (province du Sichuan) et le gouvernement central de la Chine ont compris la puissance d'évocation d'une autre idole : le panda géant. Je suis personnellement fier d'être devenu père pour la troisième fois en adoptant un bébé panda géant pour sa vie durant! Ce panda s'appelle Jian Qiao (ce qui signifie Cambridge), et il sera un thème pour nos éditions du domaine de l'éducation et de l'environnement. Il a l'immense puissance de séduire les jeunes esprits, entre autres parce qu'il est si mignon et affectueux (il l'est vraiment!), et parce que les jeunes ont une appréciation innée des animaux et du monde naturel. Chaque parent, professeur, homme d'affaires et politicien devrait comprendre la puissance de l'engagement envers l'environnement – à condition que leurs mots ne soient pas vides, mais appuyés par des actions concrètes. La Chine travaille déjà à des campagnes de plantation d'arbres pour faire ralentir l'avancée de la désertification, et elle applique des mesures pour sauvegarder les habitats précieux de ses quelques éléphants et pandas, et les protéger contre les braconniers. L'application de ces types de puissance est tout à l'honneur de la Chine, mais tant reste à faire.
Je crois que chacun de nous sait qu'il ou elle a la capacité d'apporter une contribution à l'environnement. Cette puissance réside en chacun de nous. Malheureusement, nous trouvons facilement des excuses, n'est-ce pas? En titre à cet article, j'ai posé la question « Qui s'en préoccupe? » En réalité, je m'en préoccupe, et je crois que vous aussi. Il est certain que nos enfants s'en préoccupent, et nous devrions nous préoccuper du monde que nous leur léguerons.
La grande ironie, c'est que la puissance de l'électricité et des véhicules qui fait littéralement fonctionner la civilisation moderne est également celle qui détruit notre environnement.
*STEPHEN R.R. BOURNE est directeur des Cambridge University Press.

description.hltext_display: After Yesterday's Rally of 1.30%, CH Robinson Worldwide Shares Could Potentially Pullback (CHRW)
description.content:
CH Robinson Worldwide (NASDAQ:CHRW) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $79.11 to a high of $80.61. Yesterday, the shares gained 1.30%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $79.56 on volume of 944,000 shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of CH Robinson Worldwide are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $73.45 and above their 200-day MA of $64.14. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of CH Robinson Worldwide in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on July 14, 2010 at $58.66. The stock has risen 34.7% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $79.56 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Air Delivery & Freight Services industry.
Keywords: ch robinson worldwide trading range stock news

description.hltext_display: Nuclear waste dump report a whitewash – Greens
description.author: GiovanniTorre
description.content:
Media Release | Spokesperson Adam Bandt MP
in
The Australian Greens have condemned the Parliamentary investigation of the proposed Muckaty Station nuclear waste dump as a whitewash.
After the House of Representative's Climate Change, Environment and the Arts Standing Committee's report on the National Radioactive Waste Management Bill 2010 was tabled today, Greens MP Adam Bandt said that the committee refused to hear from the public or the area's Aboriginal traditional owners.
"This is Martin Ferguson's appalling Christmas present for the people of Muckaty," Mr Bandt said.
"A previous Senate committee report asked the Minister for Energy and Resources, Martin Ferguson, to meet with traditional owners. The traditional owners of the proposed waste dump site, Muckaty Station, have also written to him requesting that he meet with them", Mr Bandt said.
"Martin Ferguson has ignored them. Instead of asking why or inviting the traditional owners to appear before the committee, the House committee chose not to receive any public submissions or any new information" Mr Bandt said.
"The government is pushing through Parliament legislation that will suspend other protective social and environmental laws and override the wishes of the traditional owners."
Mr Bandt was a participating member of the Committee and gave a dissenting report. Mr Bandt said it was interesting that the report was tabled while parliament was not sitting, just three days before Christmas.
Greens Senator Ludlam has a private members bill in the Senate to repeal the Howard-era radioactive waste management legislation completely, while the Government is seeking to replace the current Act with the almost-identical National Radioactive Waste Management Bill.
See the report here: http://www.aph.gov.au/house/committee/ccea/radioactivewaste/report.htm

description.hltext_display: Grandes tendances de développement du secteur énergétique chinois
description.content:
Pour 2011-2015, la Chine a dressé un plan de modification de sa structure de consommation énergétique, mais le défi est particulièrement de taille.
APRÈS avoir analysé la situation de la Chine et la tendance du développement socio-économique tant à l'intérieur qu'à l'extérieur du pays, M. Jiang Bing, directeur du Département du développement et de la planification à l'Administration nationale de l'énergie, estime que la Chine pourra, d'ici à cinq ans, contrôler sa consommation totale d'énergies primaires dans la fourchette des 4 à 4,2 milliards de tonnes d'équivalent charbon (tec).
En 2009, la Chine a consommé environ 3 milliards de tec. À partir de ce chiffre publié par le Bureau national des statistiques, on peut déduire que le rythme annuel d'augmentation de la consommation d'énergie sera de 30 % durant les cinq prochaines années. Bien entendu, le chiffre de la consommation énergétique sera astronomique, mais vu que la Chine se trouve dans un processus accéléré d'industrialisation et d'urbanisation, atteindre l'objectif fixé exigera déjà des efforts considérables de sa part.

description.hltext_display: Begin your good time with bad credit secured loans bayshore
description.content:
The fact is that bad credit can actually spoil your financial life; however it does not have everlasting effect on you. You may certainly face many difficulties at the time you want to borrow money as your credit history is not good. However there is one solution for you that are to improve your credit score and raise your chances to get loans and the solution is bad credit secured loans Bayshore. These loans are basically designed for the people that have bad credit history. So you know what bad credit includes? It basically comprises of arrears that are outstanding debts which are not paid at the time you have taken loan. You are at default when you take some loan and you are not able to pay it off. The people that have come across bankruptcy bad credit is also applicable to them. Due to all this the credit score goes down and the lenders will not be willing to risk their money through providing you with the loan. One thing that can help you out in this situation is bad credit secured loans Bayshore.
At the time loan is offered to bad credit holders this will actually be a financial support for fulfilling the requirements. There are various requirements that can be fulfilled like purchasing a car or house, home improvement, business purpose, debt consolidation, educational bills, holidaying and many other such reasons. One more very good reason for which these bad credit secured loans Bayshore can be taken is that it helps in improving your credit score. The best parts of these loans are provided with simple repayments as well as affordable rate of interest and this will make the repayment of loan easy. When you have good credit score it will assist you in getting good deal for the loan.
These kinds of loans are provided against some security and this is something that will cover the risk against the loan amount. The security or collateral can be anything like jewelry, real estate or any other such valuable asset that you own. Once you offer this as security the lender will be relaxed as the lender is sure that he will not be losing money. In case you fail to repay the amount of the loan asset kept as collateral will be taken by the lender. Therefore in case you are looking forward to bad credit secured loans Bayshore one of the easiest and convenient way to gain this is through online.

description.hltext_display: Look for Shares of Viacom to Potentially Pullback after Yesterday's 0.62% Rise (VIA.B)
description.content:
Viacom (NYSE:VIA.B) traded in a range yesterday that spanned from a low of $38.38 to a high of $38.92. Yesterday, the shares gained 0.62%, which took the trading range above the 3-day high of $38.87 on volume of 1.9 million shares. Often times after large one-day gains, short term traders will seek to take profits and, as such, investors should be cautious.
Shares of Viacom are currently trading above their 50-day moving average (MA) of $38.39 and above their 200-day MA of $34.89. Look for the MA to provide support for a short-term pullback in the shares.
SmarTrend currently has shares of Viacom in an Uptrend and issued the Uptrend alert on September 10, 2010 at $33.25. The stock has risen 16.1% since the Uptrend alert was issued.
SmarTrend expects the share price to pullback toward the $38.83 support level. Afterwards, we expect it to move upward with its peers in the SmarTrend Diversified Media industry.
Keywords: Viacom trading range stock news

description.hltext_display: عرض تجربة كلية التربية نحو الاعتماد الأكاديمي
description.content:
تلقت عمادة كلية التربية دعوة من المجلس الوطني الأمريكي لاعتماد الكليات التربوية ( NCATE ) لحضور المؤتمر السنوي للجمعية الأمريكية لكليات التربية بالولايات المتحدة الأمريكية والذي سيعقد بمدينة سانديجو بولاية كاليفورنيا بالولايات المتحدة الأمريكية خلال الفترة 21 – 23 / 3 / 1432 هـ الموافق 24 -26 فبراير 2011م ، لعرض تجربة الكلية للاعتماد الأكاديمي.
حيث ستقوم عمادة الكلية بعرض تجربة الكلية نحو الاعتماد الأكاديمي وفق إجراءات وشروط جمعية الاعتماد الأكاديمي للبرامج التربوية ( NCATE ) ، كما تسعى الكلية للاستفادة من التجارب العالمية في مجال التقويم والحصول على الاعتماد الأكاديمي من هيئات الاعتماد الأكاديمية العالمية .
وتتمثل هذه الدعوة خطوة هامة نحو العالمية، كما أنه يمثل إشارة على تميز تجارب جامعة الملك سعود في خطوات الاعتماد الأكاديمي العالمي. ومن جانب آخر فقد سبق أن رشحت كلية التربية لدخول أحد أكبر التحالفات العالمية التربوية التي تمثل عشر كليات تربوية متميزة عالمياً منها المعهد التربوي الوطني في سنغافورة بالإضافة إلى عدد من كليات التربية في شرق آسيا وأوروبا والولايات المتحدة الأمريكية.
عميد كلية التربية
أ.د. عبد الله بن إبراهيم العجاجي

description.hltext_display: Spis treści rocznika 2010 Zestawienie artykułów wg autorów
La Conférence de Cancún a servi à rétablir la confiance
description.content:
Premières impressions de la Chine, juste après la clôture de ce grand rassemblement au chevet du climat.
LE matin du 11 décembre, heure du Mexique, la XVIe Conférence des Parties (COP 16) à la Convention-cadre des Nations Unies sur les changements climatiques (CCNUCC) et la VIe Conférence des Parties qui tient lieu de Réunion des Parties au Protocole de Kyoto (COP / RDP 6) se sont clôturées à Cancún par l'adoption respective de deux projets. Ces réunions avaient débuté le 29 novembre dernier.
La Conférence de Cancún a enregistré des progrès sur des éléments déjà inclus dans le Protocole de Kyoto : l'existence d'une deuxième période d'engagements, l'adaptation au changement climatique, le transfert de technologies, la création d'un fonds et le renforcement des capacités.
Comme l'a déclaré le président du Mexique, M. Felipe Calderon, l'importance de cette conférence, c'est d'avoir rétabli la confiance dans le dialogue et les négociations multilatérales, confiance qui avait été peu à peu perdue lors de la Conférence de Copenhague.
Deux résultats de la Conférence de Cancún
Immédiatement après la clôture de la conférence, la délégation chinoise a fait des commentaires positifs en déclarant que celle-ci avait obtenu deux résultats. Premièrement, la conférence s'en est tenue au Protocole de Kyoto, à la CCNUCC, à la Feuille de route de Bali, de même qu'au principe des responsabilités communes, mais différenciées, et elle a garanti qu'en 2011, on poursuivra les négociations à deux voies mises en place par la Feuille de route de Bali. Deuxièmement, les négociations sur les problèmes tels que l'adaptation au changement climatique, le transfert de technologies, le fonds et le renforcement des capacités, principales préoccupations des pays en développement, ont progressé à des degrés différents, et elles ont envoyé des signaux positifs à la communauté internationale.
Selon M. Xie Zhenhua, chef de la délégation chinoise, nous pouvons être certains que la Conférence de Cancún est une réussite. Lors de l'interview qu'il a accordée à notre revue, tard dans la soirée du 9 décembre dernier, il a déclaré que la Conférence de Cancún se doit de réussir. En d'autres termes, celle-ci doit progresser sur la base du Protocole de Kyoto, de la CCNUCC, de la Feuille de route de Bali et de l'Accord de Copenhague. La direction adoptée doit être conservée, et à partir de celle-ci, des progrès devraient être accomplis.
[1] [2] [3] [4] [5]

description.content: Are you running your own business? Do you need a financial aid but do not have any income proof to show to the lender? If your answer is in affirmative, you should go for self employed loans. These loans provide ample amount of money to the self employed people to meet the sudden needs. When you are out of money and you need extra cash, you should rely on these loans. These loans have been designed to fulfil your short-term purposes without any hassle.Self employed loans are availed to you for the amount ranging from 100 pounds to 1500 pounds. The repayment term of these loans is of 2 to 4 weeks. But, because of the short-term nature of these loans, the rate of interest on the loan amount is high with comparison to the other normal loans. Therefore, it is advised to you to go through a proper web research before going for any deal. These loans are unsecured in nature. The lenders do not ask you to pledge any collateral security against the loan amount. These loans are also available for the poor creditors. It does not matter to the lender whether you are holding arrears, defaults, bankruptcy or late payments. There are absolutely no credit checks. There is no verification of credit history. So, feel free to ask for cash even if you are a poor creditor. These loans can be easily accessed through the power tool internet. With this online mode of application, you can fetch funds within less or no time. You just need filling an online application form that provides basic details about the borrower and submit it online. The online lender will approve you the loan after the verification process, if satisfied. The loan will be directly wired into your bank account within 24 hours time.

description.hltext_display: Egypt Attempts to Convict Christian to Justify Muslim Riots
description.content:
(By Mary Abdelmassih AINA) The high profile criminal trial of 21-year-old Christian Copt Girgis Baroumi, accused of sexually assaulting a Muslim girl, is viewed by the Coptic community as an example of how the Egyptian government, using all its organs, including the Attorney General, Interior Minister and Parliament Speaker, has conspired to use him as a scapegoat to justify deadly Muslim assaults on Christians.
Girgis Baroumi, a traveling poultry vendor, is believed to have been framed by State Security (AINA 1-28-2010) in order to use the crime as a pretext for the 3-day rampage by Muslim mobs on Christians in Farshout in November 2009 (AINA 11-22-2009), and most importantly to depict the Christmas Eve Massacre of six Copts in Nag Hammadi in January 2010 as an honor crime rather than a sectarian one.
The criminal court in Qena witnessed on December 13 another stormy session when Baroumi's defense team withdrew from the trial to protest the court's rejection of several requests made to the court over the year, which are vital to prove the defendant's innocence. "This decision was taken in view of these and other requests made at previous sessions, which indicated the lack of a fair and just trial for the accused," said Dr. Chafik, one of the team attorneys who withdrew from the case. "The direction of the court towards the case is not inclined towards Baroumi's innocence but have closely associated it with the crime of Nag Hammadi."
Although the defense team withdrew from the trial the court insisted the defense present its case, so four of the attorneys present withdrew in protest and three remained to plead. "If they all withdrew as intended, the court would appoint other lawyers who might damage the case," said defense attorney George Sobhy.
The Defense had requested an independent medical examination of the defendant, a certificate from the conscription department with the results of his medical examination which led to his rejection from conscription and a survey by court of the crime scene.
All three requests were rejected by the court. "To us it feels like the case is taking a religious orientation and the court plans to hand down a guilty verdict, despite the lack of any evidence, material or otherwise, to convict him," said defense attorney Dr. Siham Abdel-Malak.
Dr. Chafik expressed concern regarding the prosecutor using inflammatory religious language during the proceedings. "The prosecutor accused Baroumi of being the cause of the sectarian strife which took place in Farshout in November 2009, as well as the death of the Copts on Coptic Christmas Eve [Nag Hammadi Massacre] in January 2010, as we predicted all along that he would."
He said the prosecutor cited a more recent case of Al-Nawahed village, "saying that those who cause sectarian strife ought to be killed or crucified -- invoking Sharia Hirabah Penalty. These discriminatory religious expressions in punishment, as well as religious discrimination in criminal proceedings, require us to take a stance, in order to combat religious discrimination in criminal justice."
Attorney Dr. Hanna Hanna said "The prosecutor's statements included some Islamic terms that are far away from the terms of criminal law."
Sobhy believes there are certain forces at play to get Baroumi convicted. "If the court does not change its attitude, we expect Girgis Baroumi to be given the maximum penalty."

description.hltext_display: Debt financing of a wholesale business
description.content:
Whenever talking about business matters one can never forget debt financing. Now a days it has become part of many companies or you can say the whole world is running on debt financing. Wholesale business requires a lot of capital money to just start the business because a wholesaler has to stock different kinds of products in bulk quantity in warehouse. Debt financing actually means to get loans from a number of sources such as banks, government agencies, etc. Studies show that roughly 50 percent of wholesale enterprises depend on debt financing for expenses such as buying ware house space, products, equipment and other assets. The main characteristics of a loan include mandatory return of a fixed rate of interest on the principal amount. Wholesalers get debts from banks and other companies dedicated for this reason and buy products from manufacturers. Wholesalers also get products directly from manufacturers on debt. While on other hand retailers also do the same thing to buy products from wholesalers.
Kinds of Debt Financing
There are two kinds of debt financing; short term debt financing and long term debt financing. In short term financing you will return the capital money with interest within one year. It is usually needed for the day-to-day operations of a wholesale business, such as purchasing supplies, inventory, or paying the salaries of employees. In long term financing the loan is taken for more than a year. It is usually used for buying business assets such as equipment, buildings, land, warehouse or machinery.
Advantages of Debt Financing
There are various advantages of debt financing like when you are taking debt then you are master of your own fate and you are in full control and don't have to share profits with any investors and partners. When investors and partners are involved in your business then for sure they are also part of your business and can ask you questions about your way of running business.
There are many firms who are giving loans to wholesalers and other companies on competitive rates so there are wide opportunities for wholesalers to get loans on the terms which suit them. The other big advantage of debt financing is that you don't have to pay tax on the money taken which ultimately reduces your liability of paying tax every year.
Disadvantages of Debt Financing
On other hand there are many disadvantages of borrowing money in wholesale business. In many cases, the wholesaler is under heavy debt already when he needs new funds. Obviously not making the loan payments will ruin the debtor credit ratings and make borrowing from the creditor in the future difficult or impossible and in business reputation is the only thing which makes you survive in the market. Many banks and other agencies require you to provide some kind of security to obtain the loan successfully. Sometimes many business men end up confiscating their whole properties. Besides there can be a possibility of legal action against debtor at any time. In short we can say when ever a person is getting debt he is going to run his business at risk of bankruptcy.

description.hltext_display: مدير جامعة الملك سعود: ما خصص للجامعة يعد الأكبر في تاريخها
description.content:
رفع مدير جامعة الملك سعود الدكتور عبدالله بن عبدالرحمن العثمان الشكر والتقدير باسمه وباسم منسوبي ومنسوبات الجامعة لخادم الحرمين الشريفين الملك عبدالله بن عبدالعزيز آل سعود ولنائبه الأمير سلطان بن عبدالعزيز ولي العهد وللنائب الثاني الأمير نايف بن عبدالعزيز حفظهم الله على ما خُصص للجامعة من الميزانية العامة للدولة هذا العام 1432/1433.
وقال العثمان: على الرغم من الأزمات الاقتصادية التي هزت العالم ظلت بلادنا بفضل الله ثم بحكمة القيادة الحكيمة بمأمن من ذلك فلم تتأثر بشيء بل وتواصلت فيها جهود البناء والإصلاح وإطلاق المشروعات الكبيرة والتوسع فيها عاماً بعد عام.
وأضاف قائلا تتجلى في كل ميزانية تعلنها الدولة مدى عناية خادم الحرمين الشريفين الملك عبدالله بن عبدالعزيز يحفظه الله ببناء الدولة والإنسان حيث تركَّزت ميزانية هذا العام التي تُعد الأضخم في تاريخ المملكة على البعد الإنساني والبعد التنموي عبر التوسع الكمي والنوعي في أهم الخدمات التي يحتاجها المواطن كالتعليم والرعاية الصحية اللذان يُعدان محورين في سياسة الإصلاح التي انتهجتها حكومة البلاد منذ سنوات إضافة إلى تركيز الميزانية على إطلاق المشروعات التي تعزز استمرار النمو والتنمية وتتيح المزيد من الفرص الوظيفية للمواطنين.
ودلل على ذلك بتخصيص 256 ملياراً لمشروعات جديدة وتوسعات في مشروعات سابقة لتحقيق رفاه المواطن وتوفير حياة كريمة له في بيئة مثالية تتوفر فيها كافة الخدمات.
وأوضح الدكتور عبدالله العثمان أن المتأمل في سجل الأرقام الواردة في إعلان الميزانية يبرز البعد المعرفي ممثلاً في قطاع التعليم بوصفه الأهم بين كافة القطاعات بدليل حجم المخصص له البالغ 137,600,000 ويمثل 24% من مجموع الميزانية وهي النسبة الأكبر بين كل القطاعات، مبينا أن هذه العناية تجسد وعي القيادة برسالة التعليم، وأنه الخيار الوحيد للنهضة بالوطن والمواطن لكون الاستثمار في الإنسان هو أكثر أشكال الاستثمار أهمية وربحية ويعد النجاح في بناء العقل البشري شرطاً لنجاح أي مشروع حضاري أو تنموي.
وزاد بقوله ورد ضمن المشروعات المعتمدة لهذا القطاع تهيئة المحاضن النموذجية لبناء العقل البشري بإنشاء آلاف المدارس الجديدة في قطاع التعليم العام وتزويدها بالأجهزة والمعامل اللازمة لنضج العملية التعليمية وفي قطاع التعليم العالي سيتواصل استكمال إنشاء المدن الجامعية ومستشفياتها ومساكن أعضاء هيئاتها التدريسية في عدد من المناطق، كما سيستمر نشاط برنامج خادم الحرمين الشريفين للابتعاث الخارجي.
وأردف مدير جامعة الملك سعود قائلا انه بالنظر إلى حجم المبالغ المخصصة للجامعات نجد أن جامعة الملك سعود قد حظيت بالميزانية الأكبر حيث خُصص لها مبلغ 7,843,363,000 وهو أكبر مبلغ يُخصص للجامعة منذ تأسيسها قبل أكثر من 54 عاماً مؤكدا أن ما خُصص للجامعة هو أمانة ومسؤولية تلزم ترجمتها بدقة إلى واقع مشاهد ينهض بالإنسان ويتحول بالمجتمع إلى مجتمع معرفي يحتضن ثقافة المعرفة ويؤمن بدورها في تأسيس السمات الجديدة للوطن الحديث.
وانتهى الدكتور عبدالله العثمان الى القول إن جامعة الملك سعود تقرأ الرسالتين بوضوح وتتعهد بالالتزام في مواصلة استراتيجياتها التطويرية الهادفة إلى أن تكون جامعة رائدة على مستوى العالم قادرة على صناعة تحولات في حركة التعليم تبرزه في صورة جديدة وتجعله مؤثراً في سياقات النهضة بالوطن.
ودعا المولى عز وجل أن يحفظ خادم الحرمين الشريفين وأن يمد في عمره وأن يمتعه بالصحة والعافية وأن يكتب الحفظ والرعاية لولي عهده الأمين ولنائبه الثاني وأن يجعلهما في عافية وسلامة دائمة.

description.hltext_display: Omówienie referatów zaprezentowanych podczas seminarium pt. "Innowacyjne rozwiązania w opakowaniach z klasycznych tworzyw polimerowych", zorganizowanym przez COBRO 29 września 2010 r. w Warszawie
Loans for Unemployed: Best Fiscal Option for the Jobless
description.content:
Trying to get cash at the time of when you do not have job. Do you require cash to meet your necessities just because you have lost your job and do not have cash to meet your expenses? For getting cash when you are not earning is little tuff. But now nothing is tuff, you can easily apply for loans for unemployed when not working. These finances are offered in secured and as well as in unsecured form. Therefore a borrower has an alternative while applying for the advance. Even if a person cannot afford to give collateral need not worry because he can apply for unsecured form of loan.
These finances are easily viable on net. The borrowers work is to fill the available online application form with his necessary information and submit it to the lender. The lender on receiving the application form of the borrower verifies them and on finding them true sanctions the loan amount. The borrower gets the loan amount straight in his bank account on its approval. The borrower gets access to the funds on its approval within a short span of time.
The amount accessible in these credits ranges from £1000-£25000 along with the time duration of 1-10 years. These credits are required to be repaid back on the due date of the given time duration. If a person is unable to repay on the given time and needs some more time for the repayment should inform the lender and then the lender grants extra days for repayment. The borrower should keep in mind that these credits are tagged with high interest rates.
The person can easily make use of these finances for satisfying many of his needs and demands such as he can use money for paying his bills of electricity, medical expenses, mobile phone bills, paying of the house rent, paying school fees of the children, buying of the second hand car, repairing your vehicle and so on.

description.hltext_display: Paragary's successor softly opens downtown eatery
description.content:
Hotel Stockton site back in business after 6 months
Sass Bar & Grill owner Sam Ventura greets customer Ava Avione at his restaurant Tuesday evening. A grand opening is planned for Jan. 15.Craig Sanders/The Record
Record Staff Writer
STOCKTON - Rachel Lackey sank her teeth into a pulled pork and potato empanada and declared it delicious. She looked at its $6.95 price tag on the menu and said that, too, was palatable.
Score one small victory for the Sass Bar & Grill, which is trying to succeed downtown in the Hotel Stockton in the same spot where the controversial Paragary's failed.
Six months after owner Sam Ventura bought the lease from Sacramento restaurateur Randy Paragary, Sass had its soft opening Tuesday night. A grand opening is scheduled for Jan. 15, Ventura said.
Tuesday, a half-dozen tables in the plush, spacious eatery - aesthetically unchanged from Paragary's - were filled as of about 6 p.m. Several diners said they previously had eaten at Paragary's but only once each.
Sass' customer's choices Tuesday included a Caesar salad ($7), a "lamburger" ($10.95) and chicken Diablo ($15.95). Ventura said the menu will expand by the time of the grand opening.
"We've tried to make sure there are plenty of items under $15," Ventura said.
Sass did not serve alcohol Tuesday; Ventura said he expects the restaurant's liquor license to be in place today.
Sass will be open for dinner again tonight and Thursday, for lunch Friday, then will close through the holiday weekend before opening again for dinner Tuesday.
Eventually, Ventura said, he plans to be open seven days a week for lunch and dinner - and he added that he believes his restaurant's cuisine will develop a following.
"There's a little more excitement in our menu" than Paragary's, he said.
Also, there's less drama surrounding Sass. Paragary's became for some in the community a lightning rod for the excesses of downtown redevelopment after the city's lease provided it with $2.5 million worth of free rent over five years. Those who disapproved stayed away in droves.
Ventura said he spent recent months courting the Stockton business community, and he is relying on social media such as Facebook and Twitter to promote Sass, at least in its early days.
Lackey said an early-morning Facebook session drew her and her husband, George, to Sass for its opening. George Lackey seemed impressed.
"The prices are good," he said. "And the building is beautiful inside."
Contact Roger Phillips at (209) 546-8299 or rphillips@recordnet.com. Visit his blog at recordnet.com/phillipsblog.

description.hltext_display: ندوة انتقاء المواهب ينظمها اتحاد التربية البدنية
description.content:
ينظم الاتحاد السعودي للتربية البدنية والرياضة ندوة انتقاء المواهب مستقبل الرياضة السعودية” بمشاركة عدد من المتخصصين يوم الثلاثاء 22/1/1432ه.
وقال رئيس مجلس ادارة الاتحاد الدكتور هاشم بن بكر حريري: “الهدف من هذه الندوة السعي الى تأكيد اهمية الاكتشاف المبكر للموهوبين في مختلف الأنشطة الرياضية وهم الناشؤون من ذوي الاستعدادات العالية، التي تمكنهم من الوصول إلى المستويات العالية من الأداء في مجال نشاطهم والتنبؤ بما ستؤول إليه هذه الاستعدادات في المستقبل، وتوجيه الراغبين في ممارسة الأنشطة الرياضية إلي المجالات المناسبة لميولهم واتجاهاتهم واستعداداتهم، وتحديد الصفات النموذجية (البدنية، النفسية المهارية، الخططية) التي تتطلبها الأنشطة الرياضية المختلفة، أي: تحديد المتطلبات الدقيقة التي يجب توافرها في الملاعب حتى يحقق التفوق في نوع معين من النشاط الرياضي، وترسيخ الوقت والجهد والتكاليف في تعليم وتدريب من يتوقع لهم تحقيق مستويات أداء عالية في المستقبل، وتوجيه عمليات التدريب لتنمية وتطوير الصفات والخصائص البدنية والنفسية للاعب، في ضوء ما ينبغي تحقيقه، وتحسين عمليات الانتقاء من حيث الفاعلية والتنظيم”.
واشار الى ان الندوة تضم عدداً من الجلسات الأولى بعنوان: (الموهبة الرياضية وكيفية انتقائها “المفاهيم – الأهداف – أساليب الانتقاء” ويتحدث خلالها المشرف على مختبر فسيولوجيا الجهد البدني في جامعة الملك سعود الدكتور هزاع بن محمد الهزاع، ويدير الجلسة وكيل كلية التربية البدنية والرياضة للشؤون الأكاديمية بجامعة الملك سعود الدكتور علي بن محمد جباري.
وعنوان الجلسة الثانية: (توجهات وزارة التربية والتعليم نحو المواهب الرياضية “التنظيم والدعم، والبرامج ودور معلم التربية البدنية”) ويتحدث فيها مدير عام النشاط الرياضي ومدير النشاط المكلف بوزارة التربية والتعليم الدكتور سعد السند، ويدير الجلسة الدكتور مساعد بن ناصر العلياني.
وعنوان الجلسة الثالثة: (اهتمام الرئاسة العامة لرعاية الشباب والاتحادات الرياضية بالمواهب الرياضية “الاكتشاف والرعاية والتأهيل”) والمتحدث رئيس الاتحاد السعودي للتنس الدكتور عبدالرحمن بن سعد العنقري، ورئيس الاتحاد السعودي للجمباز الدكتور علي بن عبدالله الجفري، ويدير الجلسة رئيس قسم التربية البدنية وعلوم الحركة بجامعة الملك سعود الدكتور جمال بن صالح القروني.
وسيتم عقد الندوة في قاعة المحاضرات بمجمع الملك فيصل الاولمبي.

description.hltext_display: Jaguars head into Christmas break with a win
description.content:
FLORESVILLE -- With an “open” date on its schedule for Dec. 17, the only thing standing between the Floresville Jaguar varsity basketball team and a long Christmas vacation from competition were the Holy Cross Knights. The Jags had little trouble with the Knights, though, and entered their break on the heels of an 86-60 victory. . . .

description.hltext_display: Business Start Up Loans – Now Can Easily Extend Business
description.content: To start a business everyone needs a financial support which may not be availed to all. But now there is nothing to worry as the business start up loans have come up with the scheme to help the novice in starting a business. Thus these schemes provide up with the financial scheme that are meant a perfect monitoring assistance in starting a business. What ever may be the scale of the business this scheme provide the money accordingly for capital investment. Thus these loans are the boon for novice.Business start up loans is also available for poor creditors. The lender does not pay heed even the applicant has tags like bankrupt, arrears, insolvency etc. The money is availed without any clarification or hindrance. The lenders only pay heed to the current knack of the applicant to repay the money. More over these loans are also free from the formalities like preparation of documentation or faxing. Thus these loans are availed in short time by making least efforts. One can easily obtain these loans through online process. All one needs to do is fill the online form and submit it with few proofs like one should de above 18years, posses a valid bank account, permanent house in UK, and employed. After this the loan is approved in an hour or so. The loan is availed in both secured and unsecured form. The borrower can choose anyone according their needs. The hefty loans are availed under secured loans where one has to keep anything as security against the loan obtained. Where as the unsecured loans are availed at higher interest compared to secure as the whole risk is beard by the lender. Thus the applicant can consider the loan according to his need on the capability to repay the loan in time fully.

description.hltext_display: В Петербурге будут судить педофила-лжемилиционера
description.content:
? Санкт-Петербурге предстанет перед судом местный житель, обвиняемый в совершении преступления сексуального характера в отношении 10-летней девочки. Как сообщает пресс-служба Следственного комитета при прокуратуре � Ф (СКП), мужчина представился жертве сотрудником милиции.
По версии следствия, вечером 29 августа 2010 года Королев, представившись сотрудником милиции, завел в подвал одного из жилых домов, расположенных в ?ыборгском районе, 10-летнюю девочку. Там злодей отобрал у нее мобильный телефон, после чего совершил в отношении потерпевшей насильственные действия сексуального характера.
Следствием собрана достаточная доказательственная база, в связи с чем уголовное дело после утверждения обвинительного заключения направлено в суд для рассмотрения по существу.?ело квалифицируется по п. "б" ч.4 ст.132, ч.1 ст.161 УК � Ф (насильственные действия сексуального характера, грабеж).

description.hltext_display: تطوير مهارات الاتصال لموظفي جامعة الملك سعود الأحد القادم
description.content:
تنظم عمادة تطوير المهارات بجامعة الملك سعود دورة (مهارات الاتصال للموظفين) يومي الأحد والاثنين القادمين 21-22/1/1432ه من الساعة العاشرة صباحاً حتى الثانية والنصف ظهرا بمبنى 26 الدور الخامس، لجميع موظفي الادارات والاقسام بمختلف كليات وادارات الجامعة.
واوضح عميد تطوير المهارات الدكتور محمد بن احمد السديري ان المتدرب سيتعرف على مفهوم الاتصال وأشكاله وأهدافه وتحديد عناصر عمليات الاتصال وكذلك معرفة معوقات الاتصال الفعال وإجادة بعض مهارات الاتصال، واستعراض أهم مهارات الاتصال الإداري.
واضاف بان هذه الدورة تأتي تلبيةً لاحتياج الموظفين بأقسام ووحدات جامعة الملك سعود إلى تنمية مهارات الاتصال الفعال في ممارساتهم الشخصية والإدارية من خلال فهم طبيعة الآخر وتبني وسائل التواصل الفاعلة.
واردف بانه يمكن التعرف على مزيد من المعلومات عن مختلف الدورات التي تنظمها العمادة وللتسجيل بهذه الدورات والبرامج، فيتم من خلال زيارة موقع عمادة تطوير المهارات http://dsd.ksu.edu.sa
